name: Cozy & Colorful by Nature (Private Room)
description:
Up in the hill of Montjuïc (a mountain overlooking the city where Jewish people were forced to retire when they were thrown out of town), only 10 minutes by bus from Girona's beautiful Old Town.

Private oom with private bathroom and garden just for you! You also have a wood house in the garden where to store your bike and other sports equipment.

The space
YOU'LL HAVE ONE PRIVATE ROOM WITH A PRIVATE BATHROOM AND GARDEN JUST FOR YOUR USE - IT'S A SHARED APARTMENT, MEANING YOU'RE NOT RENTING THE FULL PROPERTY. WE LIVE HERE, TOO ;)

Cozy, Sunny & colorful apartment with a refreshing garden facing east where to chill out in the hot summer nights.

You will have a private room with a direct and exclusive access to the garden. It has a new very comfy bed (135cm) and you will have your own bathroom.

There is a closet in the room.

The apartment is in a lovely suburb area 2' walk to the entrance of a Natural Park with g
neighborhood_overview: Montjuïc is most likely the best neighborhood in Girona. We are up in a hill, only 15-20 minutes to the center of the city, and surrounded by Nature. it is very safe and quiet.
host_about:
It's hard to define oneself in such a narrow space. I think we people are really complex material. But since I guess it's good I say a bit, I would define myself as someone fascinated about living and getting to know both this planet and its inhabitants. I'm interested in serving people, especially, but not exclusively, my friends. I enjoy good food and if possible better company. My interests are broad and go from traveling, literature, creative writing, philosophy and body "care" to Buddhism.  I'm pushful, curious, a bit narcissist maybe, hahaha, and I guess I tend to dream pies in the sky far too often.

I am original Catalan, from lovely Girona - Costa Brava but I've lived abroad for many long periods: Miami, Dubai, Bali and Melbourne (Australia). My live partner is a lovely aussie-greek Personal Trainer named Stelios and, together we travel the world, when not working.

I like outdoors sports and I am addicted to mountain biking. I also like snowboarding, climbing, hiking, swimming ...; I also do some mat work like yoga and Pilates (of which I am a certified Instructor). 

I read a lot, books facinate me!!

I like to go out eating with my friends from time to time, although I am most of a day-creature and at night I like my sleep. I practice ioga and meditation and have a second level on Reiki. I'm a flexitarian (meaning I eat fish but not meat) by moral reasons and I enjoy a lot good food, if possible made with organic products. Music, all kind of music - depending on the moment - is very important to me; couldn't live without it. But my main and huge passion is travelling and meeting new people, travellers like me, or locals, and learn about them and their experiences in life. 

After many yearts working for others, I am now running my my own company. It's a fresh project dedicated to giving marketing and creativity services & solutions to other companies. I am also a teacher at the University of Girona, where I teach at the Faculties of Tourism and Economics and I run an international women's project named "Grace of No Age", devoted to mature women.

I am pretty busy however I don't complain, as I do what I like.

name: CAN FELIP - Ático loft del s.XVIII
description:
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”

The space
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”: -Piso 1: 156m2 + 33 de terraza. -Piso 2: 114 m2 + 70m2 de preciosa terraza soleada a 4 vientos. -Piso Ático: 76m2 + 47 de fabulosa terraza privada a 3 vientos.

Todas las habitaciones son grandes y frescas. Estas disponen de un ventilador en verano y calefacción en invierno.

“Can Felip” se encuentran situados en el centro del pueblo de Palafrugell a 50 metros de la Iglesia y del Mercado. En una zona tranquila con agradables vistas, situada en el corazón del “Baix Empordà” (Costa Brava).

A 3 Km de las fantásticas playas de Calella de Palafrugell, Llafranc y Tamariu.
neighborhood_overview:
Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial.

El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.

A pie o en bicicleta, y a tu ritmo, explora tanto como desees, por la extensa red de 350km de caminos que hay actualmente en la Costa Brava, por los arrozales, o por las dunas de la playa de Pals a través de miradores privilegiados sobre el mar o bien por los yacimientos del Empordà... y, por supuesto, por los caminos de ronda: un impresionante paseo que acaricia el mar entre acantilados y que une todas las playas d
host_about:
Como representantes de una pequeña empresa familiar que se dedica a la restauración de Casas y Apartamentos nos complace mucho integrarnos en la comunidad Airbnb para poderos ofrecer nuestras viviendas, que esperamos sean el futuro de magníficas experiencias para nuestros invitados...

------------------

As partners of a small family business dedicated to the restoration of properties, we are delighted to become Airbnb members to offer our Houses and Apartments, which we hope will be the future of great experiences for our guests...

name: "La Talaia" Holiday House-BBQ-WiFi-Pool
description:
La Talaia is the perfect choice if you want a relaxing holiday with your family or friends.

The space
This villa with private pool is located in a cul de sac, in the urbanization Serra Brava. Leave your car parked on the street in front of your holiday home.
The house entrance is on the first floor. As you enter through the front door of the apartment you will find living room, kitchen, 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. From the living room have access to the balcony and barbecue.
The house has a modern decor. The interior is bright and has an authentic feel. You will find the pool in front of the house. At your disposal a stone barbecue.
This home is the perfect place to enjoy the sun and stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea and the Costa Brava.

neighborhood_overview: Lloret de Mar is a Spanish municipality in the region of La Selva, in the province of Gerona, Catalonia and next to the sea, on the Costa Brava. It is endowed with excellent beaches of grainy sand. It also has magnificent views of the castle at one end and the other the monument to "La Dona Marinera" which represents the suffering of women waiting for the return of their fishermen husbands.

name: ALMADRAVASOL·COM - Terraced house, A/C & wifi
description:
ALMADRAVASOL·COM
Outstanding sea view terraced house with air conditionning and wifi

The space
ALMADRAVASOL·COM
- First floor: Living room, kitchen, 5m2 rear garden, lavatory with shower (access from rear garden), and 15m2 front terrace with a marvelous views to a sandy beach.
- Second floor: 1 bedroom with a bunch bed + sofa bed & 5m2 sea view terrace, 1 room with one big bed & 4m2 terrace looking to the rear garden, 1 complete bathroom.
- Air conditioning in all rooms
- Free wifi

Other things to note
SURROUNDINGS:
Roses town (5km from the house):
- Animated touristic town with a attractive pedestrian center
- plenty of restaurants and small fancy shops.
- Touristic boat trips and renting.
- Nautic Sports, specially for windsurfing and sailing.

Cadaques (20 km from the house):
- Famous picturesque fishing village.
- Painter Dali's hometown (Portlligat)
- Cultura
neighborhood_overview:
RESIDENTIAL AREA:
- The house is located in a select residential area around a sandy beach
- 5 km away from the town of Roses
- South-east orientation: sunny terrace during all the day!
- Located at the border of the Natural Park of Cap de Creus.
- There is no car road in front of this beach, so it is specially quiet. The beach parking lot is 100m from the shore. You can also reach the beach by walking from the house (10 min. going down, and 20 min. when returning back).
- Safe area and quiet roads where children can play safely.
- Charming neighbors, most of them coming from France.

description:
Beautiful and cozy apartment, inside a rustic house from XVII century, fully restored keeping its stone walls. Decorated will a very cozy atmosphere and romantic!
Located next to the church, in the old part of town, just 1 minute away from the beach and downtown.

The space
The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, dinning room and open kitchen and a nice patio.
Wifi is included in the price.
Parking is not included. Is optional and it costs 10€ each day, its just 3 minutes away from the apartment.
There is room for 4 people, with the following distribution:
Bedroom with double bed
Double sofa bed in the dinning room.
We have cribs and high chairs if needed. Please requested it in advance. Costs 25€ for the hole stay.

Guest access
ADDITIONAL SERVICES

- Cot and high chair.
- Cleaning during the stay
- Personalized pick up at the airport, train station, bus, etc ...
- Get rental of po
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the old part of town, just 2 minutes away from the beach and high quality restaurants.
One minute away you will find the church plaza, where you can enjoy nice meals with a quiet and relaxing atmosphere, at the same time your kids play at the plaza without danger.
Just 2 minutes away, you will find a little supermarket and the commercial zone, where is difficult not to stop and watch the beautiful shops.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go to the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;)

description:
Auf der Spitze des Berges in Massos de Pals lädt "La torre del Capricorno" mit einem (fast) rundum Blick von den Pyreneen über das Tal bis hin zum Meer schlichtweg zum Träumen und entspannen ein. Die einzigartige Lage wird Autoren inspirieren, Paaren Zweisamkeit bieten und Familien entspannen.

License number
HUTG-025420
neighborhood_overview: Mit dem Auto gelangt man innerhalb von 5 Minuten zum Supermarkt Jodofi (mit separater Frischfisch Theke) und in 10 Minuten zum Playa de Pals. Die Altstadt Pals bietet als einer der ältesten mitteralterlichen Orte eine Vielzahl von Boutiquen und Restaurants an. Den wohl besten Cortado und die besten Crépes gibt es im "Dino" gleich gegenüber vom Rathaus im Altstadtkern.
host_about:
Seit mehr als zwei Jahrzehnten bin ich schon als Kind in Pals und der Costa Brava unterwegs gewesen. Nun haben wir als Familie dort unser Domizil und freuen uns über jeden Gast, der diesen zauberhaften Ort mit seinen wudnerbaren Menschen genau so ins Herz schliesst wie wir das bereits getan haben.

Wir sind im schönen Seligenstadt (Hessen) ansässig und vermieten auch dort ein Ferienhaus, direkt gegenüber der Basilika.

name: Great family house, Costa Brava
description:
Registre de turisme: HUTG-021231

The space
HACER DE UNA CASA DE VACACIONES EN EL EMPORDÀ, TU HOGAR LEJOS DE CASA.

La casa está situada en el centro del pueblo de Serra de Daró, a 30 km al este de Girona y a 9 Km de las playas de la Costa Brava.
La casa se compone de planta baja y dos pisos, jardín privado y dispone de calefacción.

En el primer piso hay dos habitaciones, una con cama de matrimonio y la otra con dos camas individuales. name: Medieval castle S.X - the tower apartment
description:
In the center of the Ripollès between rivers, valleys and mountains stands magnificently ancient castle Llaés (sX). A unique place of exceptional beauty, where there is absolute tranquility amidst lush nature.
The apartment is distributed from a distributor hall with an old well, which gives way to the whole, with 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, dining room, living room and a kitchen equipped with a terrace with wonderful views of the immensity of nature.

The space
With over 1000 years of history, Llaés castle has been renovated to enjoy the accommodations in family and / or friends.
We do not offer anything extraordinary, since everything here is quite natural, we will invite you to the castle and its history, to know the corners of the surroundings, waterfalls, ancient house in caves, the uniqueness of the "Bufadors" forest...

Welcome!

Guest access
In ancient Tower of Homage we have enabled an apartment for 10 people, with 4
neighborhood_overview: In the town of Llaés we are 12 inhabitants, and what we like the most about our neighborhood, the tranquility and harmony that is breathed, the green of the mountains with the contrast of the electric blue of the sky. We love quiet afternoons where just looking up you see eagles, owls at dusk, butterflies, hares, moles, foxes, and countless more neighbors running around the neighborhood!
host_about:
Hello!
 We love the rural environment and the variety of activities offered: hiking, mountain biking, climbing, and a lot more.
We are fortunate to be able to receive people from all over the world in this small and incredible X century castle.
Always there, 24 hours 7 days a week, we ensure that our guests feel like royalty!
 We hope you have the best experience during your stay :) Marc & Ginny

Hola!
  Somos una pareja joven, amamos el entorno rural y la variedad de actividades que ofrece: senderismo, ciclismo de montaña, escalada y mucho más.
  ¡Somos afortunados de poder recibir personas de todo el mundo en este pequeño e increíble castillo del siglo X!
  Siempre allí, las 24 horas, los 7 días de la semana, nos aseguramos de que nuestros huéspedes se sientan como la realeza.
  ¡Esperamos que tengas la mejor experiencia durante tu estancia! :) Marc y Ginny

name: Masía en el parque natural de la Garrotxa
description:
NUESTRA ACOGEDORA CASA ESTA DENTRO DEL PARQUE NATURAL DE LA ZONA VOLCANICA DE LA GARROTXA Y A CINCO MINUTOS DE OLOT. TIENE TRES HABITACIONES CON BAÑO EN SU INTERIOR, COCINA, UN AMPLIO SALON CON CHIMENEA Y BARBACOA EN EL JARDIN

The space
Caserío del siglo XIV reformado y totalmente equipado, situado en pleno Parque Natural de la zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa. Es uno de los lugares más bonitos del Parque, combina bosques, pastos y algunos caseríos aislados con chozas y muros de piedra seca de roca volcánica. En este paraje de múltiples leyendas es donde se originaron los primeros volcanes, ahora solo testimoniados por diferentes coladas de lava, ya enfriadas y superpuestas una encima de la otra, que configuran un relieve suave.
A cinco minutos del famoso Hayedo d’en Jordà, Volcán Santa Margarita, Volcán Croscat y la Ciudad de Olot.
Cuenta con un comedor sala de estar con chimenea, un gran distribuidor, una cocina totalmente equipada, tres habitaciones,

It's cozy and just right if you're looking for a quiet escapade but not if you're looking for something as a luxury. What you see in the pictures is what you get.
There are restaurants and supermarket near the apartment.

The space
The apartment is just 1 minute away from the beach La Fosca of Palamós. It has one bedroom with 2 built-in cabinets, 1 bathroom, kitchen with stove and balcony for the washing machine, salon with sofa-bed and an ample balcony overseeing the sea. It can accommodate up to 4 persons. So if you plan to have a quiet vacation far from the maddening crowd this apartment is ideal for you!

The parking is included, the lot is spacious and inside the compound so it is pretty safe.

name: Quiet times by the riverside
description:
Stay in a historical building! Right in the Old Town, you will have shops, restaurants and walks literally round the corner. Very quiet, with wide views on the river. Parking is about 5 minutes walk. Long stays welcome. No late arrival fees.

The space
Days for a great break in the historical centre of a small pretty city!
The apartment is in the heart of the old town, on a privileged location: right in front of the riverside. So you'll see the birds fishing in the morning, and the sun sets will just be yours, on a huge 4 meters wide window on the river.
In addition to the views, the silence is one of the pros of the apartment; the river is very quiet, and as I live on the apartment below your you won't have parties every night (or you'll be one in it! :) )
The place has one big room; on one side the bed, very comfortable and wide, and on the other the sofa-bed and the computer. It doesn't feel small as the ceiling is very high, and a nice (sort of
neighborhood_overview: I believe we live in one of the best places in the world. It has the advantages of a city, but actually is is still a town- in the good way! Iis a lively area with many places to visit, shops, or simply walk around. I specially love the gardens around the city wall, 10 minutes from here. I deeply appreciate that cars are restricted in the area.
host_about:
I am someone who likes very different things, you will see. Let's start: I was born in a small town in l'Empordà, called Torroella de Montgrí. Those were also a mixture of happy and wild times, a bit like Amarcord from Fellini (watch it if you haven't).
Then I studied computer science in Barcelona, and a PhD with a part of it in London, about medical imaging.
In between something entered my life, for good: yoga: I started practicing and soon I was so pationated then when I finished my PhD it was obvious that becoming a teaching would be the best choice of my life.
So I practice yoga every day, and also: I love music, and I play myself the accordeon and the clarinet. Just as an amateur, but the pleasure of making music is amazing. I also like dancing, folk music and lately also Lindy Hop (Girona has a few places to dance if you are into it).
I like eating well and healthy. Not to much meat (I am sorry for those creatures we kill but sometimes it comes and I eat).
I like travelling, in all wild ways, but I am not a traveller that can tell thousands things! I participate as well in the couchsurfing project, from time to time- and when there isn't already someone at my place, a friend or a friend of a friend.
The apartment I rent, Girona Riverside, was planned to be for me as another floor was ment to be the yoga studio. However now I have another, bigger, place for yoga and I rent it. I hope you like it!
As a buddhist (if I can call myself that which I don't know) my motto would be to understand the sources of suffering, and enjoy immediate happyness.
Hola!Soy David!Soy profesor de yoga y os invito a una estancia estupenda en el centro de Girona en un apartamento con unas increibles vistas al rio!Naturaleza y silencio para tu felicidad!

name: Spectacular house at Costa Brava
description:
The space
Mas Alegot is originally a barn built in 1903, which was converted with modern architectural criteria into a residential home, respecting the historical context of the original carácter of construction. The interior spaces are characterized by contemporary comfort, tranquility and spaciousness, they are decorated very tasteful and carefully.
The house has a beautiful view to its sprawling garden and the landscape behind: the maize, rice and sunflower fields, the poplar forests and the mountains of Montgri with its imposing castle. The 1000 m2 large garden offers enough space for relaxing moments with a nice swimming pool, 2 leaves covered patios, barbecue, further lawn, a small organic garden, herbs and trees.
Alegot Mas is located at the end of a very small picturesque and quiet village, Fontclara, in the heart of the Empordà, famous for its medieval stone villages like Peratallada, Pals, Palau Sator or Ullastret.

The space

neighborhood_overview:
The house is located a 10 minutes from de beach, but at the same time quiet and close to everything.
Less than 5 minutes walking, you will reach the commercial street with another big supermarket, excellents shops where you can find fresh fish, perfumes, clothes, gifts and much more.
10 minutes away there is the eldest part of town, the walled city of “Vila Vella”. A really beautiful place.


Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk

name: Cap Bonifaci Vela, CanyellesPetites
description:
The space
Apartment 20 meters from the beach with a superb view.
You just go downstairs to get to the beach, not crowded even in high season.
There are 2 other beaches nearby, at a 5 and 10 minutes walk along the coastal path.
Supermarkets, bars and restaurants are a 5 minute walk.
In Rosas, a 10 minute drive by car, there are all kinds of shops, restaurants and other entertainment.

The coastal path underneath the house allows for hiking, for experts to Cadaqués through the nature reserve of Cap Creus, or to L'Escala.

Other suggestions for excursions are Figueres with the Dali museum, the ruins of Empuries, the Aiguamolls parc.

Other possibly activities include snorkeling, diving, tennis (in L'Almadrava Park Hotel), pitch & putt and golf.

The best part, of course, is to come back to the appartment and enjoy the terrace with the best view in town!

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a centric zona, but at the same time quiet and close to everything.
Distance to the beach is just 1 minute walking, just as a big supermarket and restaurants.
Less than 3 minutes walking, you will reach the commercial street with another big supermarket, excellents shops where you can find fresh fish, perfumes, clothes, gifts and much more.
Five minutes away there is the eldest part of town, the walled city of “Vila Vella”. A really beautiful place.


Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Ba
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;)

name: Together w family·friends in cozy apartment-lofts!
description:
Organize a holiday reunion together with family members or friends. We have 3 apartments for an independent stay use with central-heating for 3 fam. or 13 'pers. You can apart hire an extra separate large room having a wood stove celebrating a party.

The space
Can Banal is a former Catalan farmhouse called "masía" from the XVI century. Since 1987 it has been our home and camping business. Since 2012 we have been able to open up 3 holiday apartments on the upper floor that can be rented all 3 together for a group, specially 3 or 4 families "together but not mixed". The apartments can accommodate 3 '- 5' - 6 '= 14 persons in total. Besides there is a large room, beware rather rustic style, for a party event. We rent it out apart including a simple kitchen, wood stove with firewood and music-equipment. Consult us the price.

The apartments are independent multi space rooms containing bedroom, kitchen with dining area and bathroom. All have central heating
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orchids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bike’s to rent and in a 25' walk
host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  Welcome·Bienvenidos·Welkom·Benvinguts·Välmommen·Bienvenue·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos años. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y María, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde España . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquí en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y ríos. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montañas.

Nos acompaña nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la más diversa; María estudió diseño de interiores y técnicas de vidrio artístico y Stendert estudió para ser ingeniero agrónomo tropical y mas tarde carpintería. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacética , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos más. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudará a cabo el asesoramiento más personal y añadir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

name: APARTMENT SEA VIEWS in COSTA BRAVA
description:
Nice, open and very bright apartment with terrace, from where you will enjoy incredible views of the bay and beautiful sunrises.
Located in a privileged zone for being quiet but at the same time with everything nearby

The space
The apartment has wifi included in the price. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living room, open kitchen fully equipped with dishwasher and washing machine and private access to the terrace. The big terrace has furniture so you can enjoy meals outdoors.
AC in the living room.
It has a private parking lot in the same building.
There is room for 6 people, with the following distribution:
-Bedroom with 2 single beds
-Bedroom with 2 single beds
-Bedroom with 2 single beds
If needed, single beds can be put together to make double beds.

Other things to note
HUTG-011070
We are a couple, we do the management of our properties for more than 20 years ago in Barcelona, Costa Brava, Co
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a residential zone, privileged for being quiet, its incredible views but at the same time near everything.
Distance from the beach is just 8 minutes walking. Restaurants are 4 minutes walking, there is a little supermarket 6 minutes away and a big one, 10 minutes away.
Just 8 minutes away, you can find the old walled city “Vila Vella”. A really beautiful place.
The sensation of being apart from the noises and living that peace in plain summer, listen to the birds sing, and decide when to leave this peace and go to the center, without car, its one of the best qualities of this zone.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do.
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Biorural apartment together forest, with biopool
description:
Can Pol is a corner of peace before the forest, with biopool, inside the Costa Brava, 1 km from the town. It is a single apartment, ideal for couples to enjoy relaxing in harmony with nature, Mediterranean forest, the tranquility of rural tourism

The space
“Can Pol de les Bòries” is an apartment in an isolated bio-constructed family house (1997), and biopool (2020).
It is located a 1 km of Vidreres, farmer in the neighborhood of les Bòries, through fields and woods. The area is exceptional close to Costa Brava and cities like Girona, Barcelona, and Figueres, or the Pyrenees's mountains. We suggest you lots of activities to make the most of your stay: to visit Girona's cathedral and Dali's Museum, to go horse riding, mountain biking, trekking, parachuting, hot air ballooning, to play golf, to enjoy food and wine tourism, and much more.
The Location is a 5 km from Sils's railway station, 17 km from Lloret de Mar, and 20 km from Girona-Costa Brava's Airpor
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Hola,
Som una parella de jubilats. Fa 25 anys vam fer-nos una casa familiar aïllada a pagès, en una pineda, amb criteris bioconstructius: can Pol de les Bòries, a 1 km de Vidreres. 
Ens agrada viure al camp, en contacte amb el bosc, amb respecte i cura de l'entorn.  La casa té un petit  apartament autònom, obert a la natura. 
Tenim un gat; acceptem altres mascotes però també han de dormir fora l'habitacle. 
Ens adaptem en el que podem a les necessitats dels hostes. Ens agrada compartir.
Benvinguts!

name: Torre Can Ripoll
description:
Torre en Sant Hilari Sacalm, rodeada de un magnífico jardín y piscina privada. La vivienda consta de 350 mts construidos. Incluye garaje y está completamente amueblada y equipada para ofrecerle una estancia inolvidable en medio de la naturaleza.

The space
Sant Hilari Sacalm es un pueblo de media montaña reconocido por sus aguas medicinales, y su tranquilidad. Rodeado de montañas y bosques nos ofrece gran cantidad de excursiones para los amantes de la naturaleza. La casa está construida en la cima de una colina, y tiene todo el pueblo a sus pies, siendo un verdadero paseo llegar al centro. Una vivienda cómoda y confortable que cuenta con unas estancias muy espaciosas ideal para encuentros familiares o salidas con el grupo de amigos en busca de intimidad. El jardín que rodea la casa garantiza esta intimidad, al mismo tiempo que les acerca al pueblo.
La piscina privada les garantiza la diversión sobretodo para los más pequeños. Debido a la climatología de la z
neighborhood_overview: El barrio donde se encuentra la casa es una urbanización privada, de carácter familiar, donde residen cuatro famílias más, agradables, dicretas y que aceptan plenamente recibir huéspedes en la propiedad.
host_about: Sóc de Sant Hilari, de les de tota la vida, i  sempre, (vaig néixer el 1968), he viscut allà mateix. Ja fa deu anys que vaig perdre els pares i vaig heretar la casa que llogo. El meu objectiu és que les persones que venen a casa s'hi trobin com a casa seva i puguin passar uns dies innoblidables de descans en família i amics.

description:

Barcelona, the capitol of Catalonia, located in 65 km to the south. You can reach it by bus in an hour, or by the train in 90 minutes or by your own car in 45-50 minutes. The bus station is in 5 minutes walk too. For your convenience we can arrange a transfer from Barcelona and Gerona airports.

description:
Comfortable duplex apartment only 500 m from La Fosca beach. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, perfecly equipped kitchen, living and dining room, confortable terrace with garden furniture and view. Perfect for families and couples all year round

The space
This comfortable apartment is just 500 m from one of the most beautiful beaches on the Costa Brava -¨la Fosca¨. It is a very spacious, comfortable and and tastefully decorated apartment, on the first floor of a large villa which has been converted into 5 units.
The apartment is 130 m2 and takes up two floors. The large living room is furnished with cosy sofas, nestled into a niche near the open fireplace, flatscreen TV and a stereo with speakers in every room. The living room is connected to a dining room with access to the roofed terrace. A wooden staircase leads up to a mezzanine that is also furnished with sofas. This floor also has a laundry room with a washing machine. The adjacent kitchen is very well equip
neighborhood_overview: This lovely apartment is in a quiet residential area, only 500 m from the beach, 400 m from the nearest restaurant and 800 m from the nearest shop. The nearest large beach town Palamós, where there are lots of supermarkets, bars, restaurants, shops and other leisure facilities is just 4 km away. This region is famous for its wonderful beaches in craggy bays with crystal clear blue seas. There are lots of places nearby where you can enjoy water sports and other activities like cycling, hiking, golf, tennis and horse riding.

name: Apartment for rent 2 Lloret de Mar Costa Brava
description:
Apartment duplex of 2 rooms, bathroom, living room, kitchen, large terrace and solarium on the 2nd floor.
It includes a parking space in the garage in the basement of the building (free).
A 5 minutes from the beach Sa Boadella, on foot, 10 min. of Fenals and 20 min. of Santa Cristina.
Located in gated community with 2 swimming pools, sports courts, playgrounds and gardens. ideal for families with children.

The space
The apartment is in the heart of the Costa Brava, next to the beautiful and preserved Cala Sa Boadella in Lloret de Mar, partly naturalistic tradition. The apartment has a large solarium-terrace on the top floor of 59 m2., Has a parking space in the basement of the same block, taking the elevator we arrived directly to the 2nd floor where the floor is. It is located in a private residential area, "Jardins de Sa Boadella", this is an area of ​​selected integrated in nature and surrounded by its own gardens apartments. Enjoy tranquility,
neighborhood_overview:
It is a very quiet neighborhood, built in the wild, mostly second homes, away over 1 km. City of Lloret de Mar, where the party and the environment.
It is in a privileged place among the beautiful natural beaches of Sa Boadella, Santa Cristina, Sant Francesc, Fenals, etc.
In immediaciones we find several spectacular botanical gardens (Martimurtra, Pinya de Rosa, Jardins de Santa Clotilde).
In less than 200 m. we have restaurants, supermarkets, bus stop, on the beach of Fenals we can take a tour boat to visit the beautiful neighboring coastal towns.
host_about:
Soy una mujer servicial y hospitalaria. Me gusta que la gente se sienta cómoda y feliz a mi alrededor. Intento tratar a mis huéspedes como me gustaría que me trataran a mi. 
Me congratula compartir experiencias y una de ellas es ceder mi propiedad de Lloret de Mar para disfrute vacacional y de ocio.
En mi apartamento doy prioridad al confort, la limpieza, una buena dotación de equipamiento doméstico, servicios y un entorno íntimo y agradable para que tanto famílias como parejas disfruten de un alojamiento y estancia immejorable, relajante y placentera... Además, yo estoy siempre disponible presencial y/o telefónicamente por si hay cualquier problema.
Parece que consigo mi objetivo puesto que frecuentemente alojo inquilinos repetidores. Mi premio es ver las caras de mis clientes cuando se marchan (y vuelven!).
Esta es mi mayor satisfacción!

name: Catalan Farmhouse Apartment with Mountain Views
description:
Can Cruanyes (complex of 4 private apartments with shared gardens) is a unique holiday escape, immersed in the rich culture and stunning scenery of the Spanish Pyrenees, and perfectly situated between the mountains and the exquisite beaches of the Costa Brava.

This Catalan farmhouse will be your private slice of rural bliss. We give you everything you'll need to feel at home, while still enjoying the comforts and ease of hotel-style convenience.

The space
From the ruins of the 400 year old farmhouse, three beautifully restored apartments have emerged, each retaining its own individual historic charm, while embracing some of the modern touches of interior design.

Secluded in twenty acres of peaceful woodland and paddocks, this Catalan farmhouse is a perfect destination for families and friends. The large swimming pool, play area and games garden all have views up to the imposing peaks of the mountains or down to the valley beyond.
neighborhood_overview: Can Cruanyes resides within the foothills of the Pyrenees where you can enjoy beautiful rural and mountain surroundings while remaining well connected to local amenities and the beaches of the Costa Brava. We are well connected also the local villages and towns including Tortella where you can buy all the basics including artesan bread and fresh fruit and vegetables. Besalu with many restaurants is only 10 minutes by car.
host_about: I'm Donny from Ireland and I enjoy meeting people from all over the world. I don't travel as much as before I had kids but meeting my guests helps me feel like I'm still travelling and learning about new cultures. I love helping people discover the area, and letting them in on the little local gems that I've discovered over the years.

name: Tamariu: the most exclusive and quiet beach
description:
Only 150 m. to the beach.
The house retains its old charm if well is fully equipped with a modern kitchen and two bathrooms.
Private access.
Terrace and patio to eat and relax.
Perfect interior temperature in Summer (air conditioning not needed)

The space
We are in the heart of Costa Brava. Tamariu is the most exclusive and quiet beach in the coast.

Tamariu is situated in a small secluded bay between the towns of Begur and Palafrugell. Small coves set amongst rugged tree-lined cliffs, crystal clear water and beautiful beaches have made the area famous the world over for its beauty. Originally a small fishing village, Tamariu has not been over developed and has retained its identity and charm.

There are some new villas and apartments on the edge of the village and like everywhere the village center and beach gets busy in August, but you will find no high rise hotels or English pubs.

Our three bedroom,

Nuestro mayor deseo es que nuestros huéspedes se sientan tan felices en casa como nosotros. Haremos todo lo posible para que disfrutéis vuestra estancia en la Costa Brava.

name: Villalloret -vista mar, piscina privada,rural, Bbq
description:
Casa estilo rural vista mar, con piscina privada, barbacoa, huerto, estanque con peces, gran jardín con mucha vegetación, terraza con espectaculares vistas, parking privado, y equipada con todo lo necesario para disfrutar en familia de un entorno seguro, rodeado de tranquilidad, relax y belleza natural.
VILLALLORET es más que una experiencia de naturaleza, rodeados de vegetación despertarse con el trinar de los pájaros, atardeceres soleados donde reina la paz con fragancias de madreselva.

The space
Preciosa casa estilo rural con piscina privada de agua salada, gran jardín y terraza con espectaculares vistas al mar y con espectacular jardín lleno de vegetación.
Se alquila toda la planta baja con amplio jardín de 1700 m2. hay gallinas, estanque con cascada natural y peces y un gato.
Ambiente ideal para familias con niños, entorno natural con bellas vistas al mar, a 5 minutos del pueblo y playa, se recomienda coche.
Amplio dormitorio c
neighborhood_overview: Situada en una urbanización tranquila, en la falda de una colina con vistas al mar y  rodeada de naturaleza,  donde viven vecinos del pueblo todo el año, a 5 minutos en coche de supermercados,  centro y playas.
host_about:
Hola, somos Manolo e Isabel, 
Desde Villalloret queremos  darles  la bienvenida. Este alojamiento que en principio nació para uso personal, para albergar reuniones familiares y vivir momentos únicos con familia y amigos, fue decorado con todo amor, por eso está lleno de pequeños toques con  sabor rural, para  los que utilizamos útiles de labranza propiedad de la familia.
Tiempo después vimos que por la dinámica de la vida diaria  no podíamos hacer uso de él y disfrutarlo nada más que en determinadas ocasiones,  y así fue como decidimos ponerlo a disposición para que otras familias pudieran disfrutarlo y pasar aquí  su tiempo de vacaciones, e incluso teletrabajar si este fuera su caso. 
Por eso nos  encantaría que pudieran conocer la Costa Brava desde  una perspectiva diferente, combinando el sabor de antaño, con lo actual, combinando el mar y la montaña, en un espacio para evadirse y reencontrarse con la naturaleza y con un ritmo más lento en su vida diaria más auténtico y sostenible. Pero a  la vez y cercano a lo urbano, a lugares de ocio y a las mejores playas de la costa Brava

name: Beautiful house with spectacular views
description:
Beautiful house with spectacular views of the bay of El Port de la Selva, on the Costa Brava, and steps away from the Natural Reserve of Cap de Creus.
Sleeps 7 people and is 5 minutes by car from the village and beaches, also reachable by foot.

(HUTG-017508)

The space
Located in the charming fishing village of El Port de la Selva, on the Costa Brava, "Giraluna" is a beautiful rustic-style villa with lots of character. It is situated among pine trees on the top of a hillside and enjoys spectacular views over the village, the bay and the mountains. The location is very tranquil, just 30 meters from the entrance to the protected reserve of the Natural Park of Cap de Creus, though very close to the centre of the village and the beaches, easily accessible by car and on foot.

"Giraluna" has a capacity for seven people distributed between 3 double bedrooms with their respective bathrooms, two with panoramic views. The kitchen is well equipped

description:
It is a rural house, ideal for families or groups of up to 8 people. Located on the Costa Brava, near Girona, Banyoles, Olot i Figueres. For excursions, nature, culture, ... The legal numer of regist. Generalitat de Catalunya is PG-000234

The space
Can Cirera is a farmhouse independent. The whole house is to rent. It has 4 bedrooms (2 double and 2 single beds) with 2 bathrooms.
Kitchen with fireplace, oven, refrigerator, microwave, hot water, washing machine, hairdryer, ...

Great room for leisure, with small team of music, tv, games, ...
One room has been adapted in the block, keeping the dining room, and three layers (a kind of hole wall, where the hens laid eggs).
20 minutes: MUSEUM DALÍ, in Figueres

neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about: La meva família i jo tenim la casa des del 1.997, va ser tan bonic viure-hi, que vam decidir convertir-la amb casa rural, amb l'objectiu de tenir la possibilitat que famílies o grups d'amics, fessin estades d'uns dies per viure la bona energia que té. Va ser construïda al 1.778, és de pedra, l'hem restaurat, adaptant-la a que hi ha totes les comoditats per disfrutar-la. Les cases abans no les feien com ara, tardaven el que fes falta, les construïen amb paciència, les feien al lloc més adequat, tenint en compte el lloc, el sol, la solidesa, la seva energia, ... Té alguna cosa màgica, no és espectacular, però si és bonica, acollidora i a mesura d'estar-hi fa que t'agradi cada vegada més.

name: Apartment in Regencos with beautifull garden
description:
50 m2 apartment located on the first floor. Has: 1 large bedroom with a double bed, 1 complete bathroom and a living area with a fully equipped kitchen and a sofa bed.
Our apartments are located in the beautiful Rectory of Regencos village, very close to begur with private garden and pool for the exclusive use of our guests.

The space
Spacious and fully equipped apartment of 50 m2 with views to our garden and pool. Perfect capacity for 2 adults and 2 child.

Apartment decorated by interior designer Anna Puig. Her vision has managed to turn our rooms into cozy and bright spaces, taking care of every detail accompanied by the practicality and comfort necessary to satisfy the needs of our clients.

Each apartment has:

• 50 m2
• 1 large master bedroom with comfortable double bed
• 1 full bathroom with bathtub and shower
• Living room
• 1.60 m sofa-bed perfect for children
• Kitchen fully equiped.
• Ai
neighborhood_overview:
Place that stands out for the tranquility of the town of Regencos at the same time that it is perfectly located, between the towns of Pals and Begur, just 10 minutes from the places of interest and the best beaches on the Costa Brava.
The perfect enclave for those who want to enjoy nature and the sea, in a dream environment.

The Rectoria de Regencós, as its name suggests, is located in the medieval town of Regencós, characterized by its tranquility. It is the ideal place for those who want to enjoy the village life characteristic of its people, its narrow and cobbled streets and surrounded by cultivated fields with views of the Quarlemany mountain.

It is located just 5 minutes by car from the best beaches such as Sa tuna, Sa Riera, Calella de Palafrugell, LLafranc, Pals and Platja del Castell.
host_about:
Mi nombre es Alicia y soy de Barcelona. Llevo residiendo en Gerona 19 años y me he dedicado siempre a la hostelería y gestion de restauración y eventos.
Mi objetivo es hacer sentir a los huespedes como en casa y recomendarles todos aquellos preciosos y reconditos lugares que alberga la Costa Brava, para pasar unas inolvidables vacaciones.

name: Attic close Llançà Beach. Wifi
description:
Beautiful penthouse in the center of Port de Llançà, 3 minutes walk from the beach. Fully renovated and equipped, sleeps 6, it has 2 bedrooms with 3 double beds in total. Large terrace with barbecue, table and chairs. WIFI.

The space
Beautiful penthouse in the center of Port of Llançà, 3 minutes walk from the beach.
Completely refurbished and equipped for up to 6 people with WIFI, has 2 rooms with 3 beds in total.
Large terrace with sun loungers and barbecue to enjoy a pleasant holiday relaxing on the beach with family or friends.
Third floor without lift.
The apartment is in the center of the port area, but not on the main street that takes us away a little from the noise and traffic, the nearest beach (the principal) is literally a 3 minute walk from home. The following 5, a small private cove and with spectacular views.
On the Costa Brava, sometimes being "near the sea" doesn't mean beach nearby. The apartment has WIFI and Smart TV.

host_about:
¿Qué difícil, verdad?
Pues soy una chica catalana, muy alegre y simpática (o eso dicen...), estoy casada con Juanvi, al que seguro también conoceréis si alquiláis nuestro bonito apartamento en Llançà. 
Me encanta la playa, la montaña y los animalitos! 
Soy una fanática de la música, las series de televisión  y el cine.
Creo que para empezar con esto ya es suficiente. Si queréis saber más de mi, mi marido o mis gatitos, os lo cuento a la entrega de las llaves!

name: Casa rural Siglo XVIII en Pals - Costa Brava
description:
Preciosa casa del siglo XVII en Pals, ubicada dentro del recinto gótico.
Rehabilitada de lujo y decorada con muebles comprados en anticuarios y rebuscando por mercadillos.El resultado es una decoración muy cálida y acogedora.
La casa tiene 150 m2.
3 habitaciones dobles.
2 baños.
Cocina-office con chimenea.
Salon. Dispone de 2 sofás-camas individuales.
Terraza fantástica con unas vistas impresionantes. Dispone de mesas para poder tomar un aperitivo o comida y una zona de chill-out para relajarse.

The space
Magnifica casa del siglo XVII rehabilitada con encanto, dentro del casco antiguo de Pals.
Zona muy céntrica y muy tranquila.
Ideal para parejas o familias con
hijos.
La casa dispone de una distribución muy amplia y tiene todos los medios para poder disfrutar y sentirse como en casa, dentro de un ambiente acogedor y confortable.
Dentro del pueblo y a un paso de la casa caminando, hay de todo, supermerca
neighborhood_overview:
Es una autentica casa de pueblo ubicada en el casco antiguo de Pals, uno de los pueblos medievales con mayor encanto del Ampurdan. Tiene un premio de Bellas Artes.
Excelente comunicación con Barcelona, Gerona y Francia.
La casa esta ubicada en el llamado triangulo de oro, muy cerca de la playa de Pals a 4Km. así como de otras playas de aguas de color turquesa muy bonitas.
Hay innumerables y auténticos pueblos medievales para visitar, así como el Museo Dali ubicado en el pueblo de Figueras y el castillo de Pubol donde se encuentra enterrada Gala la mujer de Dali.
Pals esta a una distancia de 35 Km. de Gerona, una ciudad interesante para conocer ... barrio judío, catedral, etc...
host_about:
Soy Interiorista, Ceramista y Agente Inmobiliario. Me dedico a la rehabilitación de casas , locales, hoteles, etc... Arquitectura en general así como al tema inmobiliario; compra-venta y alquiler de inmuebles.
Alegre y con muchas ganas de vivir y de disfrutar con mis amigos organizando eventos diferentes: comidas con vinito, ver películas, exposiciones de Arte, salidas en bicicleta...

Garden and community swimming pool.

name: COSTA BRAVA, PEACE & 5MIN WALK TO THE BEACH
description:
It is a pleasure to share our Beach House surrounded by Nature 5 min. walk from the beach called Cala Canyelles, on the Costa Brava in a peaceful and unique place.
We offer private room with double bed with private bathroom.
House Exclusively to rest, go to the beach, hammocks to take a siesta, WIFI, Parking. our house has 4 rooms.
These spaces coexist and are shared: terraces, dining rooms, kitchen, gardens.
What to do on the Costa Brava: Hiking, Snorkeling, Kayaking.

The space
Cozy, nice and clean room located 5 MINUTES WALK to the beach at the quiet zone of the Costa Brava.
Authentic Mediterranean beach house of 400m2 where you can discover the Costa Brava beaches, hiking tours along the coast..

You can discover Costa Brava beaches and their unique landscapes.
Spacious house with terraces and gardens where you can have your breakfast or take a nap, living rooms, dining room and common areas with genuine modernistic pai
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet and safe neighborhood. Our neighbors are quite far from us. We offer a lot of privacy.
Local restaurant with Mediterranean gastronomy at the beach under the name Restaurant Cala Canyelles.
Bar at the beach for nice sunsets, daily menu, fresh juices...
Supermarket 5 minutes walk from the house.
Bus stop 5 minutes walk.
host_about: I'm From Lloret de Mar. I studied tourism hospitality and management and I was working in a hotel as a receptionist in barcelona for almost 3 years.  I worked at W Barcelona for 2 years. I like nature and read a good book on the beach.I hope you like the small paradise that we have in the costa brava.

name: Els Racons del Fort: Castle in wine territory
description:
A stone building from 1694 having a shape of a fortified castle in the village of Capmany only 14 minutes away from Figueres and 26 minutes from Roses.

The fortified construction has a big garden, two terraces, and a covered outdoor space with a pergola. Swimming pool will be ready April 2022.

Capmany has more than ten wineries and your host Yves can teach you about local cuisine in form of: private dinners, hands-on cooking classes, or local experiences visiting wineries and food producers.

The space
The house offers a very unique feeling of the history that has happened inside and outside its walls. It has been renovated in a very respectful way and host Eli has decorated the house to make you feel good during your stay.

For family gatherings, it is possible to rent the apartments too and come together in the garden and pool.

There is also a huge diaphanous space very suitable for diverse activities such as retreats
neighborhood_overview: Capmany is a village with 614 inhabitants and more than 10 wine cellers. Beautiful walks can be done and the closest beach is a 26 min drive away.
host_about:
I was born in Switzerland and live in Barcelona since I am 8 years old.  I love cooking and I have decided to move from online marketing (10 years working in the field) to Cooking Workshops and private cooking events, following my passion in life.  
------

Nací en Suiza y vivo en Barcelona desde los 8 años. Me encanta cocinar y he convertido esta afición en mi ocupación principal, después de 10 años de marketing online.

name: Exclusive! only 45 m. from the sandy beach
description:
“Can Casellas” is an exclusive 18th. century village house in Sant Antoni de Calonge. The perfect location of our beach house in Costa Brava makes it the perfect place to stay whether you are visiting our area for leisure or business, as in our rental village house one finds exclusive serviced accommodation.

The space
The property has been carefully restored with charm, preserving as far as possible its original constructional features and preserving the architectural wooden beams, vaulted ceilings and centennial stone walls that gives warmth and authenticity to the house. The property has been refurbished without sacrificing comfort in order to offer the visitor a pleasant stay.
Distribution:
* Ground floor: the main entrance gives way to the living room opened on a nice dining room (for 10 pax) located under the original roof with Catalan vault.
From the entrance of the house, a long vaulted corridor leads the visitor to a beautiful well-equippe
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a very quiet area, the house is close to all shops, excellent restaurants and health services.
Every year the local beaches receive the blue flag granted by the European authorities for their uncontaminated crystalline waters.
host_about:
Hello! I'm so glad you are interested in renting one of my three properties here, in the heart of the Costa Brava. Each one has something special to offer our guests, a rustic village house with lots of character, a modern elegant family house and a stylish beach front apartment. 
What I love most about my place is the location, out of the ordinary and  literally steps away from supermarkets, restaurants, and the most beautiful beaches anywhere in Spain.
I work in a local real estate agency and I live only five minutes away from all the properties, I will help you make your stay perfect, just ask. I like to meet guests’ needs from before they even step foot in the door. Every year, at the end of the summer season, together with my husband, we plan a new improvements.  
I am very fortunate in that I get to enjoy where I live all year-round. Each season is a special time here on the Costa Brava!
neighbourhood: Sant Antoni de Calonge , Catalonia, Spain

name: APARTAMENTO A 17 METROS DE LA PLAYA
description:
Apartamento en primera línea de mar de 39 M2. * 4º piso con ascensor. Restaurado en su totalidad. Servicio de lavandería en vestíbulo. Da a la parte posterior, no tiene vistas de playa. 1 habitación doble con cama-canapé y colchón nuevo de 150 cm, baño, cocina, nevera, microondas, TV de plasma de 32 pulgadas, plancha, Aire Acondicionado, secador de pelo, cafetera eléctrica y normal, tostadora, etc. 1 Sofá cama de 140 cm. En la mejor zona de Sant Antoni de Calonge a 17 metros de la playa.

The space
Todas las actividades propias de playa.
Viajes en barco a motor o vela.
Submarinismo.
Esquí acuático.
Zonas de ocio en Playa de Aro a 3 Km.
Museo Dalí en Figueras a 35 Km.
Ruta Iglesias Románicas.
Gastronomía mediterránea con sus famosas Gambas de Palamós.

neighborhood_overview: It is an "isolated" house with more than 70 hectares of land, where puppies and people can walk to our langillo ... Surrounded by woods and rivers ... a quiet place where silence is only broken by the singing of the Little birds We are 2 kms from Bascara, 14 from Figueres (museum Dali) 19 from the beach (La Rubina, an immense beach where you can go with your pet), 40 from France, 14 from Besalú and Banyoles, ....
host_about:
NIÑOS, PERROS Y CINTAS DE VÍDEO

Mas Torrencito es una casa rural diferente. Una masía del siglo XV, restaurada con un estilo muy personal, y rodeada de campos, bosques y caminos que llegan hasta un río que merece ser escuchado al menos durante un rato. Su propietario, Miguel, se ha encargado de darle su propia personalidad a la casa durante siete años, creando diferentes rincones en los que puedes charlar con tu pareja disfrutando de una buena botella de vino mientras tus hijos juegan libremente por los alrededores, compartir con otros huéspedes costumbres y (Website hidden by Airbnb) de tus mascotas mientras ves cómo ellas disfrutan y se persiguen felices, o subir a la planta de arriba y escoger una de esas películas que tenías pendiente para hacerte un homenaje frente a una gran pantalla. Puedes hacer lo que quieras, porque en Mas Torrencito la libertad se respira a cada momento y en cada lugar.

Marcos, Manuela y Matías, tres de las mascotas de Miguel, son el auténtico espíritu de la casa. Esos tres perros deberían tener contrato indefinido y pensión vitalicia. Ellos muestran la casa a los nuevos huéspedes, sus 8 confortables habitaciones dobles y triples, los baños completos, el salón de techos altos y vigas de madera, el antiguo horno de pan, la sala de entretenimientos, la piscina y el jardín con mobiliario y juegos para niños. Pero también acompañan a los huéspedes durante los paseos, entretienen a mayores y niños con su buen carácter y sus ganas de jugar, y relacionan con las mascotas recién llegadas con paciencia, cariño y una gran amabilidad.

Mientras tanto, Miguel cocina. Y cómo cocina. Platos elaborados con productos de su propia huerta. Recetas que le chivan las madres de los propietarios de los restaurantes de los alrededores. Bizcochos con diferentes sabores, mermeladas, cereales, pan recién hecho y embutidos de la zona, una de las mejores del país en esta especialidad.

Mas Torrencito se puede disfrutar en pareja si te gustan los animales, ya que es una manera de poder disfrutar de su compañía siempre que quieras. También es un lugar ideal para niños, ya que rápidamente se enamorarán de Marcos, Matias y Manuela, probablemente la mejor buscadora de piedras del mundo. Y también es un lugar perfecto para visitar con tu propia mascota, disfrutar de unos días en la naturaleza y que los dos hagáis buenos amigos. En Mas Torrencito te sientes parte de algo, y cada visita es diferente a las demás.

El único problema de Mas Torrencito es que obliga a volver. Yo ya lo he hecho, y no será la única vez.

name: MAS CAMPMOL
description:
MAS CAMPMOL RURAL HOSTEL is the perfect choice for enjoying a quiet holiday in the immediate vicinity of Cistella. It offers spacious rooms with wonderful views, fully equipped kitchen and a variety of modern amenities that enliven your stay.

The space
MAS CAMPMOL RURAL HOSTEL is located outside in a circuit Cistella better, since we are surrounded by mountains, rivers , beaches, lakes ... You can perform a multitude of outdoor activities , suitable for guests of all ages.
 
Hiking
Excursions by mountain rivers
Horseback riding ( with professional oriendador )
Cycling
Pickups wild
 
The hostel is within a circuit of trails that run through dreamlike landscapes . Small mountain villages crossed by crystal clear rivers as Albanyà or San Llorenç de la Muga take us back to the Middle Ages .
Around her, in a radius of about 20 kms you can visit stunning sites like Rodes Monastery , the Cathedral of Castellon de Ampurias Vil
neighborhood_overview:
We are about two kilometers from the village of Cistella. It is a small village of farmers and ranchers, welcoming and full of traditions. And although we have a reputation for being hard workers, always have time to chat with friends and a good celebration!.
In the village we have a small school, a church, a small grocery store (Lydia and Montse), the village café (The Society) is, and a good restaurant (Badó Restaurant), plus a wonderful environment to walk and contemplate dreamy landscapes.
host_about:
A mi marido y a mi nos gusta vivir en el bosque, su serenidad y frescura es nuestra energía. 
Yo siempre les digo a mi familia que soy como un nomo, pero que de vez en cuando necesito visitar a mi amigo el mar.
Puede sonar cursi, pero así es. 
Por eso este lugar donde vivimos es mágico.

Vivimos entre montañas en un precioso enclave,  pero tenemos a un paso magnificas playas donde disfrutar en verano y pasear en invierno. ¡ Qué más podemos pedir!. 
Juntos, nos ocupamos de la finca, sus animales, el huerto, la casa...
¡Nos encanta mimar cada detalle para que las personas que nos visitan puedan sentirse como en la suya propia y puedan así disfrutar de este lugar tan maravilloso!.

Os recibiremos encantados.
¡Bienvenidos al Mas Campmol"

Charo

description:
The space
This apartment is located in Costa Brava, Playa de Aro in Spain and it's situated on the 2nd floor of the building. It is very conveniently located only 50 metres from the beach.

It offers a fully equipped kitchen, living/dining room, 2 bedrooms, and balcony. The kitchen has a microwave, oven, stove and dishwasher, plus a freezer, coffee maker and washing machine. All the apartment have wi fi internet and ACC cold and heat.
Towels and bedding are also included for your convenince. The excellent beach is easily accessible by foot where you can enjoy long walks along the seashore. There are a many good restaurants, bars and other entertaining activities in the vicinity. A parking space is also available near the building.

The coastal resort of Calella de Palafrugell is only a 30 minute drive and the Barcelona airport is an hour drive. Furthermore, the Girona Airport it is about a 40 minutes drive in car. The hotel is 800 meters from a golf
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Hello!!
 
My name is Javier, and although I'm originally from Girona, I've been living in Barcelona for the past 25 years, so I know the city and its surroundings quite well.
 
Traveling is one of my favourites hobbies. I love getting to know different cultures and people from around the world. I had the chance to visit many countries, either for fun or for professional reasons, since my last job was as a publisher for trade magazines.
 
I started the business of rental apartments “The Vintage Rentals”  because as a tourist, I lived first hand the benefits of living a local experience wherever I go, and I know other people search the same type of authentic vacations. This is how I got into the this business and now I have apartments in the best areas of Barcelona with all the necessary facilities for an affordable price.
 
I invite you to come and discover a different and unique experience of Barcelona and all its beautiful locations and sites!
 
For further details, do not hesitate to contact me.
 
Javier
The Vintage Rentals

host_about:
Soy una mujer mediterránea que no podría vivir sin la luz del sol, la buena comida ni muy lejos del mar . Me gusta escribir, leer, la música y el buen cine. Y nadar en las playas de Palamós,  donde he pasado los veranos desde  mi infancia. 
Tengo tres maravillosos hijos: Carola  es músico profesional, Estela es pintora, y Eugeni , el pequeño de 10 años que quiere ser actor.
Con Jaume , mi marido, y con los hijos nos encanta viajar. Amigos europeos nos han hospedado en su casa (Paris, Bremen, London...)igual que nosotros les recibimos en la nuestra. Hace dos años que practicamos el intercambio simultaneo de casa . 
Nos encanta la gente y las tertulias después de una buena comida. 
Estamos muy orgullosos de nuestra segunda residencia y queremos compartir el placer de una estancia reparadora en l'Empordà, una de las zonas mas agradables del Mediterráneo.

neighborhood_overview:
Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial.

El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.

A pie o en bicicleta, y a tu ritmo, explora tanto como desees, por la extensa red de 350km de caminos que hay actualmente en la Costa Brava, por los arrozales, o por las dunas de la playa de Pals a través de miradores privilegiados sobre el mar o bien por los yacimientos del Empordà... y, por supuesto, por los caminos de ronda: un impresionante paseo que acaricia el mar entre acantilados y que une todas las playas d

neighborhood_overview: Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial. El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.A pie o en bicicleta, y a tu ritmo, explora tanto como desees, por la extensa red de 350km de caminos que hay actualmente en la Costa Brava, por los arrozales, o por las dunas de la playa de Pals a través de miradores privilegiados sobre el mar o bien por los yacimientos del Empordà... y, por supuesto, por los caminos de ronda: un impresionante paseo que acaricia el mar entre acantilados y que une todas las playas de la Costa Brava.

neighborhood_overview: The town of Pals is a medieval walled enclosed, now restored and very well conserved. The first reference to the town dates from 889. With just over 2,800 inhabitants Pals and the surrounding area offer you a wide range of things to do, from organised activities to gastronomic routes with the most exquisite recipes. You can play golf, scuba dive or go windsurfing at the beach of Pals. You can enjoy nature by walking over the dunes or cycling through the rice fields.

host_about:
Hace 29 años que me dedico al mundo de Real Estate y tambien desde entonces he pasado mis vacaciones en Tossa de Mar , a mis hijas le gustaba tanto que finalmente me compre una casa en Santa Maria de LLorell ( Tossa de mar) Me encanta, no se si me gusta más en verano para disfrutar de la playa y de la maravillosa agua transparente  o en invierno de esos paseos tranquilos tanto por las playas como por las montañas cercanas, tienes mil cosas por hacer. 
Debido a mi profesión mis vecinos y amigos me dijeron que les ayudara a alquilar sus viviendas  para las vacaciones y desde entonces nos dedicamos hace ya quince años a preparar estos hogares para que personas de todo el mundo vengáis a conocer este maravilloso pueblo marinero. Estaré encantada de recibirte junto a tu familia y de poderte ayudar en buscar restaurantes , tiendas, excursiones  y que el apartamento o casa que hayas elegido se convierta en tu hogar durante tus vacaciones.

description:
This is a 200 year-old historic house rehabilitated by a local architect in the center of medieval town Besalu (Girona), with peaceful garden where to disconnect from the world. County of Garrotxa, a remarkable region plenty of outdoor options.

The space
House is suitable for two families (max capacity is eight), with a private garden and a small natural pool (no chemical depurator). Walking distance from main facilities (supermarket, bakery, press, etc.). Situated in the inner center of old town. Restricted access to cars.

Guest access
Three-level house with private garden. Small natural pool (in the garden). House is fully equipped for self-catering and has washing machine too.

Other things to note
Visit the official Website of Besalu and of the Garrotxa region to learn more about what to do; it's amazing!

description:

Another important detail is the swimming pool, where you can enjoy of the common zone, which you can see from your terrace.

The space
The apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 family bathrooms and a wide and open living room. Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and washing machine. The terrace, has furniture so you can have nice meals outdoors.

The living room has AC, that thanks to its location, can cool all the apartment.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very quiet zone, less than 10 minutes away (walking) from the beach, with an easy and flat access, in the middle of the comercial street.
It is a new neighborhood, very spacious and bright with parks and green areas al around.
Just a 2 minutes walk away from a big supermarket and a restaurant.
Four minutes away, is the beautiful comercial zone, with all kind of shops.
Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Wal
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

Villa del Sol is located in the best area of L´Escala. This area is surrounded by Riells Beach and the magnificent promenade overlooking to the bay and to the Pyrenees.
The villa has a wonderful garden of 870m2 with private pool, a porch for outdoor meals and a barbecue.

The space
Important: In response to Covid-19, this property has extended cleaning & disinfection measures & protocols to guarantee the safety of our guests

neighborhood_overview:
L'Escala has a strategic location - everything is close. Girona, Roses, Cadaques - only 40-45 min; Figueres and Empuriabrava - 20min; Begur and Palamos - 30 min; Pals and Playa de Aro - 40 -50 min; Banyoles, Olot - 40 min - 1 hour. Overall, L'Escala is perfect for exploring the Costa Brava.
L´Escala offers various activities and areas which can be enjoyed with children. The beaches of L´Escala are characterised by their fine sand and shallow waters, which means that they are ideal for children. Also is a paradise for children, with children´s parks, go-karts and horse trip, as well as bicycle hire. What´s more, L´Escala offers a wide range of sports and adventure-based activities - discover new sensations!! Bicing in l´Escala is more than a simply renting bikes service. L'Escala Cycling is a public transport service. It is practical, sustainable and easy to use. Tour and enjoy the l'Escala region free from air and noise pollution. A walk along El Camí Forestal between l´Escala

Hello!
We are Aleksandra, Stela, Raquel and Judith (K3HOMES) and we are dedicated to tourist rentals.
We will help you to spend your best holidays with our agency. The agency is located in the center of L'Escala. Our mission is to give to our customers the opportunity to spend their vacation without worry.
We work for you to rest. We strive to offer the best service to our clients and to our property owners.
Our company is built around the needs of our customers. The owners and guests define the direction of our development. We treat our customers as we would like to be treated.
We hope you will come to visit us and thank you in advance for being our guest!

K3OMES family

RU
Здравствуйте уважаемые гости,
Меня зовут Александра и я менеджер по турестической аренде.
Я и мои коллеги Stela и Paula (K3HOMES) будем помогать Вам провести свой лучший отдых с нашим агентством. Наше агентство находится в центре Л'Эскала. Наша миссия состоит в том, чтобы дать нашим клиентам возможность провести свой отдых без каких-либо забот.
