host_about:
Hola! Som la Laia i en Jofre. Som de Tossa, on vivim i tenim la nostra família. Treballem en el món de la cuina en diferents projectes, un d’ells a Tossa mateix, la Braseria Pini, un restaurant que sense perdre les arrels familiars aposta cada any per una carta més actual. Gaudim menjant bé, ens encanta descobrir llocs i provar nous plats. Fa més de 8 anys que allotgem hostes a Airbnb llogant apartaments i ben aviat també la Baby Blue, una “glamper van”. Ens agrada conèixer i compartir experiències amb altres persones que, com a nosaltres, els agrada viatjar i conèixer nous racons de món. Tossa és el nostre racó, un poble de la Costa Brava que ens dona molta vida a l’estiu i molta pau a l’hivern.
No dubteu a demanar-nos recomanacions.
Fins aviat!

description:
Magnífica casa de planta baja de 2 habitaciones y cocina separada. Casa a 3 vientos equipada con chimenea, patio delantero y una amplia zona ajardinada en su contorno. Situada en una calle sin salida, muy tranquila, ideal para alojarse familias con niños. Puertas de cristal correderas y puertas exteriores de aluminio, totalmente plegables. La casa es totalmente plana, sin escalones. El exterior está equipado con barbacoa, hamacas, sombrilla, mesa y sillas de jardín.

The space
Magnífica casa de planta baja y jardín situada en una calle muy tranquila, sin salida. La casa dispone de un comedor con chimenea, aseo con ducha, cocina separada y 2 habitaciones (una doble y la otra con dos camas individuales).

La cocina dispone de utensilios para 6 personas y está equipada con lavavajillas, encimera de gas con 4 fuegos, extractor, nevera con congelador, cafetera eléctrica y microondas.

El acceso al comedor es por 2 puertas correderas acristaladas

description:
Los Geraniums: Sea view apartment for 4 with shared pool, 5 minutes walk to the beach, supermarket, bars and restaurants. 8 minutes drive to the medieval old town of Pals, little beaches and Begur. It is one out of 2 apartments rented in the house, situated in a quiet residencial neighbourhood close to forrest and beach. Enjoy a cosy break in the green garden and by the salt water pool!

The space
The apartment is just a 7 min. walk from the beach and the beginning of the small beaches, restaurants and bars. There are many small, historic towns and villages in the area, many of which still have buildings dating back to the medieval period. Some of these towns are Pals and Begur (8-10 minutes drive), Peratallada o Monells. All of the local villages have restaurants of all tastes and prices as well as local shops. There is a supermarket within walking distance and a further one nearby.

It is situated on the top of the hill, next to another 1 bedroom apar

Very nice house located in a small residence in front of the sea in Empuriabrava.
Comfortable and well equipped.
It has a community pool, WIFI, air conditioning and private garage.
Privileged location and magnificent views from its various terraces.

Beautiful house located in a private residence with swimming pool.
Privileged location, on the seafront in Empuriabrava and on the canal.
House divided into 3 floors.
On the ground floor, there is a private garage with an extra bedroom and a large terrace with garden furniture and barbecue. This room is not air conditioned and is not recommended for young children, as it is independent from the rest of the house.
The first floor consists of a spacious living / dining room with terrace, an open kitchen and a bathroom with shower.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in the first line for sea views and at the same time, right next to the “Vila Vella”, the walled city.
For those who don’t know Tossa, you don’t have to worry about noises for being at the first line. Not much later than midnight all restaurant are close and the street is really quiet.
Distance from the beach is less than 1 minute. There is a little supermarket a minute away and another one, a little bit bigger 4 minutes away. The biggest is 10 minutes walking.
This zone belongs to the old neighborhood, so you will find narrow streets, nice shops and much more.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the ol
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: near the beach, old little village
description:
109 m2 attic flat for 3 pers. Lounge/dining area,1 bedroom, 1 sofabed,
1 bathroom, 2 terraces. Spacious and light, this apartment has everything you need to make your holiday comfortable. Situated in a quieter part of the medieval village Peratallada.

The space
Spacious and light, this apartment has everything you need to make your holiday comfortable. Situated In a quieter part of a small but famous medieval village, offering lots of restaurants and bars within easy walking distance.
Consisting of a en-suite bathroom,large double bedroom which leads to outside terrace. Large open plan living room and dining area with access to terrace. There is an extra GEM of a roof terrace. kitchen is fully and tastefully equipped.
This apartment has everything you need to savour
wonderful memories.


Beaches, golf: Many wonderful beaches can be reached within 10-20 min depending on your choice. 4 golf courses within easy reach. Definite
neighborhood_overview:
Peratallada is one of Catalonia's most prized and charming villages.
Beautiful to walk through, lots of restaurants to choose from and a number of festivals during the holiday season.
Free musical events are held in the castle square in August celebrating the Catalan culture.

Many wonderful beaches can be reached within 10-20 mins depending on your choice.
4 golf courses within easy reach. Definitely a great choice.

Other Activities: Music festivals, local markets, wonderful beaches near by.
host_about:
I am from Austria and have lived in various different countries.
My first home is switzerland and my second home is in Spain in Peratallada, near the beach.
I love cooking , reading, sports, walking with my lovely labrador dog, my home, family and friends.
I enjoy meeting people of all nationalities and I love to share a glass of wine with them whilst telling them about  this lovely area.

name: close the beach - medieval village Pertallada
description:
This charming, stylishly renovated 1st floor apartment is in a typical beautiful 100 year old building.
It has a very pretty patio with beautiful views,
great for a wonderful bottle of wine or dinner.

The space
Spacious, bright 1st floor apartment built in 18th century stone and set in glorious surroundings. Consisting of an open-plan kitchen and living area leading to a charming outdoor patio.
The property is in the quieter part of a small but famous, medieval village offering plenty of restaurants & bars all within walking distance
.
The apartment consists of one big double bedroom ensuite, bathroom with shower and washbasin and a separate WC. There is a double sofabed in the lounge area.
Outdoor breakfast/dining on patio is possible. There are comfortable deck chairs, parasol and candle lanterns.
Central heating for the colder months is available and charged separately at cost price.
The kitchen is equipped with hob/
neighborhood_overview:
Peratallada is one of Catalonia's most prized and charming villages.
Beautiful to walk through, lots of restaurants to choose from and a number of festivals during the holiday season.
Free musical events are held in the castle square in August celebrating the Catalan culture.

Many wonderful beaches can be reached within 10-20 mins depending on your choice.
4 golf courses within easy reach. Definitely a great choice.

Other Activities: Music festivals, local markets, wonderful beaches near by.
host_about:
I am from Austria and have lived in various different countries.
My first home is switzerland and my second home is in Spain in Peratallada, near the beach.
I love cooking , reading, sports, walking with my lovely labrador dog, my home, family and friends.
I enjoy meeting people of all nationalities and I love to share a glass of wine with them whilst telling them about  this lovely area.

name: Stay in a bright, colorful and comfy apartment
description:
It is a small but nice apartment: very bright, cheerful and comfortable. It is high, so the wind flows much more than on the ground floor and, therefore, it is not hot. Green and spacious views through all the windows. No air conditioning (all rooms are exterior so you open and the air runs) but there's a fan just in case. There's room for 4 people. Look further down ("other highlights") for more information on the house and area.

The space
The apartment is small but nice; it is a second floor all exterior: very bright, cheerful and comfortable. Being high runs more wind than on the ground floor, it is not so hot and it is very quiet and private.
The apartment has a "main room" (entrance, living room, dining room), a room with a double bed, a room with two single beds, a bathroom and a small kitchen (renovated in 2011). In my opinion the best of my house is:
- it's walking distance everywhere (this is very important in summer in this area since finding
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is on the highest floor of what used to be a family home. The garden is still shared. The land in front of the garden is also mine and you can also park there if you come with more than one car.
host_about: I'm from Barcelona. I love all kind of art, animals, the sea and travelling. I'm cheerful and easy going.

name: Private villa with pool & sea view for families
description:
Villa with great sea views overlooking the valley of Palamos and St Antoni de Calonge. We accept families and guests 30+.
Top floor: kitchen, living room, WC, roof terrace and small balcony.
Lower floor: 4 bedrooms w/ double beds - two new bathrooms.
Large terraced garden with pergola and generous pool area.

Quote from previous guest: "French riviera meets vintage Hollywood Hills."

The space
Villa Mariposa is very private - set on the end of the street Carrer Om in the urbanization of Rio de Oro - located on the hillside of Calonge. The house offers a spectacular view over the valley of Calonge and bay of St Antoni de Calonge/Palamos.

The house have a large landscaped garden with pergola for comfortable shade and a pool area with space for 8 pool beds.
The partly refurbished (2013) terraced house is 190+ sqm over two floors. Upper floor with a brand new kitchen, a large roof terrace, spacious living room area with
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the quiet urbanization Eio de Oro - only 10 minutes with car from the ocean front. Two good supermercados in the village of Calonge - only five minutes with car. Eurospar the closest one and Suma by the entrance to the village.
There is a great restaurant in the urbanization - Restaurant Rio de Oro.
host_about:
Villa Mariposa is our dream project. After searching for both the right area and then the right house - we found Villa Mariposa in febuary 2013. The house was in bad shape but we saw the potential.

We planned the renovation with an architect from Barcelona and finished the first renovation phase for the summer of 2013 - and we will continue with more renovation projects along with time.

We travel a lot - New York, Sydney, Europe, Asia - and over the years we have come to places where we have found special details or fantastic ambience or great views. These "moments" have been the inspiration for Villa Mariposa. Spacious, not to much furniture, a garden garden that tells a story over the year - and a view that takes the breath away.

name: BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT BY THE SEA
description:
Lovely apartment at the exclusive development Cap Sa Sal, former luxury hotel right by the sea, astonishing views, seawater swimming pool, coast for the exclusive use of Cap Sa Sal. Begur is one of the most beautiful towns of Costa Brava.

The space
Beautiful apartment, 45m2, perfect for 2 to 5 people. Right by the sea, with breathtaking views. It has one main bedroom and a living-room/dining room, part of which can be converted into a second bedroom by closing a sliding door. There is also a mezzanine with another bed. Very well equipped kitchen, balcony with impressive views of the sea (Aiguafreda and the Meda Islands).
The apartment is fully equipped (air conditioning, dishwasher, washing machine, vitro…) and has Wifi and cable TV.

Guest access
Cap Sa Sal used to be a luxury hotel. It has direct access to the sea from the lift. The estate has 30,000m2 of common areas, including a paradisiacal swimming pool with seawater right by the
neighborhood_overview:
Begur is a typical, small town that started out as a fishing village. It is the proud location of some of the prettiest bays on the Mediterranean coast, all offering the crystalline water and pine forests that have made the Costa Brava famous. This area is also known for its many medieval towns, some of which (e.g. Peratallada) were declared historical and artistic monuments in 1975. In addition to the many small coves (Aigua Blava, Aigua Feda, Aigua Gélida, Sa Tuna, Fornells, etc.), Begur also has excellent sandy beaches (Sa Riera, Playa Pals, etc.) and even a nudist beach – the red island. There are many picturesque coastal towns that are worth a visit such as Calella de Palafrugell and Tamariu, and attractive harbours such as Llafranc.

The ruins of Begur castle offer one of the Costa Brava’s most spectacular views. The castle was the scene of pirate attacks that led the local inhabitants to turn their village away from the sea. The towers they built in the 16th and 17th
host_about:
Soy de Madrid, casada con un catalán. He viajado por todo el mundo y me encanta compartir mi apartamento con quienes saben disfrutar de lugares muy especiales para mí.

I am from Madrid, married to a Catalan. I have travelled all over the world and I love to share my apartment with those who know how to enjoy places that are very special to me.

name: Hab Vinyoli, descanso y silencio
description:
Excelente masía catalana, ubicada estratégicamente a 5km de la autopista (Escala salida 5), con vistas excepcionales del Empordà.
Habitación con cama doble, con baño y posibilidad cuna para bebe (suplemento 15€)
Con jardín, museo/tienda de aceite, sala masajes y terapias.
Posibilidad de masaje terapéutico, reserva previa por teléfono.
Posibilidad de desayuno con incremento de 6€/persona y día.
Posibilidad de animales de compañía con previo aviso y con incremento de 20€ por mascota y estancia.

The space
Masía catalana en plena naturaleza, céntrica pero a la vez discreta, con zona ajardinada.
Tiene muy buenos accesos, a 5km de la autopista (salida 5 l'Escala), y de la N-II.
Privilegiadas vistas del molino de aceite (de 200 años de antigüedad) convertido en museo.
También se puede visitar la iglesia románica que está a 50m de la masía.

Guest access
Posibilidad de desayuno con incremento de 6€/persona y d
neighborhood_overview:
Es una zona en plena naturaleza, característica por su tranquilidad, silencio, harmonía. Es un lugar ideal para descansar y disfrutar de la naturaleza.
A 30 minutos de Girona (donde pueden disfrutar de su casco antiguo, su muralla, la catedral y el barrio judío) y Figueras (museo Dalí, museo del juguete, castillo de San Ferran considerado el castillo más grande de Europa) así como disfrutar de sus zonas comerciales.
A 30 minutos de la playa en coche (l'Escala, Estartit, Sant Pere Pescador, Roses, etc) y de 45 minutos de la montaña (Olot donde pueden visitar la Fageda d'en Jordà con sus parajes y su Zona Volcanica, Santa Pau, etc).
Y a 25 minutos de Banyoles, famoso por su lago.

name: CS01 Luxury villa, 500 m Sant Pol beach, S´Agaró
description:
Fully renovated luxury villa, located in one of the most prestigious areas of the Costa Brava - S'Agaró, just 500 meters from the unique and beautiful beach of Sant Pol. The villa is fully equipped with everything you need for holidays in family and is within walking distance of all services.

The space
The house has a total area of ​​about 250 m2 and is divided into 3 floors:

1st floor: entrance hall, through which you can go directly to the kitchen or living room, living room with dining room and access to a large sunny terrace with direct access to the pool, fully equipped modern kitchen, 3 spacious double bedrooms (one of them with own dressing room), a large bathroom with bathtub and shower and a guest toilet.

2nd floor: large master bedroom with built-in wardrobe and desk, bathroom with shower, large solarium overlooking S´agaró.

Basement: study with its own bathroom and a small equipped kitchen, games room, laundry, addition
neighborhood_overview:
S’Agaró is a luxury residential area located in the heart of laqa Costa Brava, between the towns of Sant Feliu de Guíxols and Playa de Aro.

S’Agaró has two main beaches: Sa Conca and San Pol, one of the most beautiful on the Costa Brava. Sa Conca is even officially considered one of the best beaches in Europe, surrounded by beautiful houses between pines and rocks.

The beach has all the services: bathrooms, showers, Red Cross, bars, sun beds and umbrellas for rent, playgrounds, adaptation for people with disabilities. Cafes and restaurants serving Mediterranean cuisine are located on the beach promenade of Sant Pol.

Guests of S’Agaró should definitely visit the promenade of Cami de Ronda. The 1.8 km long route is immersed in vegetation and has several viewpoints with spectacular views of the sea and the landscape of the Costa Brava.
host_about: Hello! My name is Verónica. I live in Lloret de Mar, Costa Brava and I am in love with this wonderful place. I love traveling! I am dedicated to vacation rentals in Lloret de Mar, Playa de Aro and Sagaro. Since 2009 we have hosted travelers from all over the world in our accommodations and we love our work. We will be happy to welcome new travelers on the Costa Brava and provide them with the best conditions and advice for an unforgettable stay.

name: Habitación doble en La Trobada Hotel Ripoll
description:
Somos un hotel familiar, con historia y de alta calidad. Estamos ubicados en el centro de Ripoll, sobre el río Ter, a 2 minutos a pie del Monasterio, a 5 minutos de la estación de trenes y autobuses, y con aparcamiento gratuito justo en frente.

The space
Nuestras habitaciones dobles superiores han sido totalmente remodeladas con el objetivo de ofrecer un espacio perfecto para nuestros clientes. Equipadas con una cama doble o dos camas individuales, cuentan con un cálido suelo de parquet y ropa de cama de algodón. Asimismo, los baños han sido diseñados pensando en el máximo confort, para ello cuentan con una amplia ducha o bañera de fácil acceso. Disponen de un escritorio preparado para para las nuevas tecnologías. Debido a su buena relación calidad-precio, las habitaciones dobles superiores son nuestras habitaciones más populares.

License number
HG-002103
neighborhood_overview:
Ripoll y El Ripollès, punto de nacimiento y confluencia de los Ríos Ter y Freser, es ideal para diferentes actividades de naturaleza y cultura.
En este sentido, cabe destacar la Vía Verde Ruta del Hierro y del Carbón, que comienza en el mismo paseo del hotel, la puerta principal del monasterio de Ripoll, ahora candidata al reconocimiento como Patrimonio Mundial de la UNESCO, el Museo Etnográfico de Ripoll,
y nuestra querida Vall de Núria. Somos buenos conocedores de nuestro territorio y estaremos encantados de recomendar a nuestros clientes los mejores lugares y actividades dirigidas y libres según sus intereses.
host_about:
Soy Jaume Farrés. Nací y crecí en La Trobada, el hotel que fundó mi abuelo junto con mi abuela y mi madre durante los años ochenta en Ripoll, en pleno corazón del Pirineo Catalán. Estudié arquitectura en Girona, preciosa ciudad donde viví seis años. Mi pasión por el hoquei patines, deporte me ha acompañado toda mi vida, me llevó a vivir en Barcelona durante dos años más. Ahora vivo de nuevo en Ripoll, en el hotel de mi familia. Combino mi profesión, arquitectura, con el negocio familiar, y el hoquei sobre patines. 

Me interesa el contraste entre lo local y lo global, y me gusta ser el anfitrión de los viajeros que llegan a Ripoll. 

Si quereis hacer excursiones, a pie o en bicicleta, os daré detalles de varias rutas que conozco perfectamente, y os recomendaré una u otra según vuestras preferencias!

host_about:
Gracias por interesarte en nuestra casa. A nosotros nos encantaría disfrutar todo el tiempo de ella y siempre nos pareció una buena idea que en el tiempo que no pudiéramos ir, otras personas la aprovecharan y disfrutaran del entorno. 
Trabajamos  en el sector de internet y medios de comunicación.Nos encanta el Ampurdan porque nos gusta la vida, y allí encontramos todo lo que nos hace sentirla intensamente: el mar, sus playas, sus bonitas calas, los infinitos campos  de amapolas, sus pueblos con encanto, su clima mediterráneo, su gastronomía y sus dulces paisajes. Nos esforzamos en tratar a nuestros huespedes  como nos gustaría ser tratados a nosotros y hemos preparado la casa para que, una familia como la nuestra o personas con ganas de conocer la zona ,se sientan cómodas y disfruten de todo lo que brinda ¿ os animáis?

name: LUXURY RUSTIC HOUSE with POOL in TOSSA DE MAR
description:
Spectacular house from XIV century, inside the walled neighborhood of Vila Vella, fully restored, keeping details from back then and decorated with beautiful old furniture.
Located at the entrance, just 1 minute from the beach and 2 from downtown

The space
Rustic house with wifi included in the price, with 6 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, toiliete, dinning room, big fully equipped kitchen and a huge and beautiful terrace with BBQ and a covered part with furniture for you to enjoy excelent moments relaxing outdoors, dinners, fresh nights and more.

IDEAL FOR 2 FAMILIES, since it has 2 floors with 3 bedrooms with 1 bathroom on each floor.

Private parking for 1 car, 5 minutes walking from the house. Possibility of a second parking space with additional cost.

There is room for 12 people, with the following distribution:

Bedroom with 1 double bed

Bedroom with 1 double bed

Bedroom with 2 single bed
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located inside the emblematic walled neighborhood of “Vila Vella”, declared historic-artistic national monument, with lovely narrow streets. An area full of magic where is a privilege to stay.
One minute walking, you have the beach, restaurants next to the wall and 4 minutes away there is the commercial area, where is hard not to stop and see the beautiful shops.

The house is located inside Vila Vella, therefore, it is not possible to reach the door of the house with the car.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

Las vistas que se pueden contemplar desde su emplazamiento privilegiado entre la montaña y el mar, proporcionando una amplia panorámica.

Se le pedirá una copia del documento de identidad al huésped principal y a las personas mayores de edad que ocupen el piso. Se ruega a los huéspedes llevar las copias.

Our contemporary two bedroom apartment accommodates 4 people comfortably. It is situated in a quiet residential area and is a short distance (2km) to the great beach of Estartit. The apartment has it's own secluded courtyard and private parking.

The space
The apartment has a fully equipped modern kitchen. It has a very comfortable double bedroom with walk in closet and the second bedroom with two single beds and built in wardrobe. The lounge comprises of a spacious seating and dining area. The apartment accommodates 4 people very comfortably. The apartment is situated in a quiet residential area just outside Estartit and is only a short distance from many attractions that the area offers.

Guest access
Guests have complete private access to the apartment with their own private entrance and private parking. There is a private courtyard area exclusively for the use of guests, attached to the apartment where guests can dine in complete p
neighborhood_overview: The Costa Brava has a wealth of wonderful places and cuisine for the visitor to experience.  The area has some of the most beautiful beaches and hidden coves in Europe, for guests to explore.  There is an unlimited amount of water sports from kayaking, boat hire, windsurfing/boarding and other water-borne sports.  The Illes Medes islands, just off the coast of Estartit, is a protected marine area and has some of the best diving experiences in the Mediterranean.  Examples of occupying civilisations from the ancient Iberians to the Greeks and Romans have all left their mark on the landscape of this area.  There are great cycling routes and for the more tranquil pursuits, there are wonderful walks and bird watching opportunities.  The area also has a wealth of wonderful historical buildings/architecture for guests who wish to explore the history and culture.  The Medieval towns/villages of Castello d'Empuries, Pals, Peratallada and Torroella de Montgri are all within short distances of th
host_about: Hello, my name is Brent , I am a retired nurse from the United Kingdom.  My partner and I love meeting new people and gain great satisfaction from making people's holidays memorable ones.  We would like to welcome you to the Costa Brava and all that it has to offer.

name: Apartamento nuevo frente al mar en Palamós
description:
Apartamento nuevo en Palamós delante del mar totalmente reformado en 2023. Situado en el centro y frente a la Pltaja Gran, encontrarás todo tipo de comercios y restaurantes. Ubicación ideal para no utilizar el coche durante toda la estadía. El apartamento consta de un salón-comedor y cocina con acceso a una terraza privada y 3 habitaciones dobles con todas las comodidades. Un baño completo con ducha. Dispone de aire centralizado. Acabados de máxima calidad.

The space
El apartamento consta de 3 habitaciones, dos con camas de matrimonio y una con literas. Cada una tiene armarios hechos a medida y con luces led. El amplio salón-comedor conecta con la terraza y la cocina abierta. La cocina está totalmente equipada, cafetera Nespresso, lavavajillas, lavadora, utensillos de cocina y acabado en cuarzo. El baño cuenta con todas las comididades necesarias. El apartamento ha sido decorado por profesionales.

Guest access
Los huéspedes disponen de tod
neighborhood_overview: La ubicación es uno de los puntos fuertes del apartamento. Situado frente al mar y en el casco antiguo, corazón de todo el ocio del pueblo. Encontrarás todo lo que necesites a menos de 5 minutos a pie.

name: Can Barraca VentÓs

CAN BARRACA (alojamiento+paseo*)
Situado a 5 km de Figueres. Dispone de cocina, comedor, baño y dos dormitorios, uno de cama doble, y otro de dos camas individuales.
*Con estancia de 3 noches, se ofrece paseo en carro y mulas con desayuno.

The space
El apartamento Ventós, ubicado en la planta baja de Can Barraca, en el centro del pequeño pueblo de Avinyonet de Puigventós, es un alojamiento acogedor, totalmente equipado y con conexión wifi gratuita.
La cocina está totalmente equipada con horno, lavavajillas, nevera con congelador, microondas,vitro-cerámica y otros pequeños electrodomésticos. El apartamento tiene dos dormitorios: una habitación con cama de matrimonio y un espacioso armario, y el otro dormitorio dispone de una litera con dos camas individuales y un pequeño escritorio. name: Primera línea de mar Sant Antoni de Calonge
description:
Apartamento en 1ª línea de mar, en Sant Antoni de Calonge. Recién reformado. Gran terraza con vistas al mar. 2 habitaciones, una de matrimonio y una habitación con una cama nido y escritorio, ambas con armarios empotrados. 1 baño completo y amplio salón-comedor con sofá cama. Cocina con barra americana, nevera, horno, vitrocerámica y lavavajillas. Lavadora, aire acondicionado, persianas eléctricas, TV, wifi. El edificio dispone de ascensor desde la 1ª planta (hay que subir un tramo de escaleras)

The space
Situado en una zona privilegiada de la bahía de Palamós-Sant Antoni, muy céntrico, en la zona de restaurantes!
neighborhood_overview:
Sant Antoni de Calonge es un pueblo muy tranquilo durante la temporada de invierno y con mucho turismo en la temporada de verano. El turismo es de tipo familiar y el Ayuntamiento organiza muchas actividades de todo tipo para la familia: yoga, gimnasia en la playa, actividades infantiles, ...
El pueblo dispone de muchos restaurantes y cafeterías, así como un Mercadona (a 5 minutos a pie del apartamento), un Carrefour market, un Esclat,...

name: Can Barraca Puig
description:
Nuestro apartamento, recién rehabilitado, se encuentra en un pequeño pueblo del Alt Empordà. Dispone de cocina, comedor (con sofá-cama), habitación doble, baño y terraza.

*Con estancia de 3 noches, se ofrece paseo en carro y mulas con desayuno.

The space
El apartamento Puig, se encuentra en la primera planta de Can Barraca, ubicado en un pequeño pueblo del Alt Empordà. Dispone de TV, conexión wifi gratuita y un pequeño porche exterior con vistas al jardín.
Esta propiedad consiste en un salón con sofá-cama italiano de 135cm, una amplia cocina equipada con horno, lavavajillas, nevera-congelador, microondas, cocina vitrocerámica y otros pequeños electrodomésticos, también dispone de utensilios y productos básicos como sal, azúcar, aceite o productos de limpieza. Un dormitorio con cama doble de 150cm, y finalmente el baño, con ducha, lavabo e inodoro.
Además, el apartamento está equipado con una lavadora-secadora, plancha y tendedero de ropa.

une petite supérette vous offre le pain et croissants chauds tous les matins, et nous dépanne si besoin!

soyez les bienvenus!!

name: Domus Lloret
description:
-

The space
Hello and Welcome :)
Bright spacious apartment with air conditioner, is on the first floor and newly renovated with one bedroom, living room , bathroom and complete kitchen.
Very comfortable, located near parks and gardens, in just 3 minutes walk to the beach. Lots of restaurants and bars close by.
This apartment is perfect for people who want to stay near the city center but not in the main center.

Kitchen: has Cooker, Microwave, Refrigerator / freezer, Coffee maker, kettle, etc.
We provide towels + basics for toilet and kitchen. Also has iron, washing machine, hairdryer.
Bedding: 2 single beds in the room, and 1 sofa bed in the living room.
Everything you need to have a very comfortable stay! (if there´s something you don´t find just let us know, we´ll be willing to do the best we can to make you feel at home).

Please enjoy your holidays with us and remember, if you need further information

name: Studio Coll 3
description:
Recommended for travelers who value the place where they are staying, new, impeccably designed, comfortable and functional, this studio will be perfect. Like other accommodations in our complex, it is just a few meters from the beach and the center of Sant Martí d'Empúries. It is divided into three zones; terrace, kitchen-living room and bedroom-bathroom. The terrace overlooking the garden, facing south, has outdoor furniture (table and chairs), solarium, barbecue and drying rack. The kitchen, ample and well equipped, having all the necessary utensils, shares the space with the living room; It has a coffee table, TV with national and international channels and a three-seater sofa.As for the bedroom, separated from a sliding door, is equipped with a bed of two people and a bathroom "en suite" with large Italian shower.

name: Habitación individual en La Trobada Hotel Sport
description:
Hola! Soy Jaume Farrés. Mi hogar es un poco especial. Como todos tiene cocina, salón, comedor... pero en casa tengo muchas habitaciones! Si queréis descubrir Ripoll y su entorno, os ofrezco una habitación privada y económica, con cama de 135cm y baño completo.

The space
Habitación cómoda, equipada con todo lo necesario. Ropa de cama, baño completo y toallas. También armario, escritorio... Wifi gratuito TV de pantalla plana.

Guest access
Desayuno opcional
Recomendaciones de Restaurantes y actividades (bicicleta, excursiones, piscinas naturales...)

License number
HG-002103
neighborhood_overview: La vila de Ripoll se encuentra en un espacio natural privilegiado, ríos y montañas invitan al viajero a conocerles. El románico está muy presente en nuestra comarca, varios municipios cuentan con puente o iglesia románica. El monasterio de Santa María de Ripoll es destacable por su gran peso histórico y cultural.
host_about:
Soy Jaume Farrés. Nací y crecí en La Trobada, el hotel que fundó mi abuelo junto con mi abuela y mi madre durante los años ochenta en Ripoll, en pleno corazón del Pirineo Catalán. Estudié arquitectura en Girona, preciosa ciudad donde viví seis años. Mi pasión por el hoquei patines, deporte me ha acompañado toda mi vida, me llevó a vivir en Barcelona durante dos años más. Ahora vivo de nuevo en Ripoll, en el hotel de mi familia. Combino mi profesión, arquitectura, con el negocio familiar, y el hoquei sobre patines. 

Me interesa el contraste entre lo local y lo global, y me gusta ser el anfitrión de los viajeros que llegan a Ripoll. 

Si quereis hacer excursiones, a pie o en bicicleta, os daré detalles de varias rutas que conozco perfectamente, y os recomendaré una u otra según vuestras preferencias!

name: Charming Seaside Family Home, 2 Min Walk to Beach
description:
Our eclectic, charming family home is located in a picturesque vibrant seaside village, just a couple of minute's walk from the fabulous local beaches. Situated in the "old-town" centre, our townhouse retains original features e.g. patterned ceramic floor tiles, vaulted ceilings & characteristic window shutters. You'll benefit from the "home from home" (as in family home/not a hotel!) atmosphere while immersing yourself in village life, with an array of cafes & bars on your doorstep. Enjoy :)

The space
Our home is located in the "old town" of L'Escala, a former fishing village, on the beautiful Costa Brava. This is not a hotel style rental but rather it is our family home.

The accommodation is situated over three floors, with kitchen and dining room on the ground floor. The 4 bedrooms (one with kingsize bed and 3 with single beds) and the WC and bathroom are found on the middle floor. The sitting room is located on the top floor and leads onto
neighborhood_overview:
The house is situated in a peaceful residential area in the "old town" of L'Escala, close to several beaches. The sandy family beach, surrounded by a variety of cafes and restaurants, is located just beyond the bottom of our road. A short stroll away are a number of independent boutiques, jewellery and craft shops, also shops selling local Anchovies of L'Escala. Creu Cove, a minute's walk away (to the left of our house), is great for snorkelling. The larger, sandy crescent beaches of Empúries are a short walk away, and if you want a bit of culture you can visit the nearby Greco-Roman ruins of Empúries. Also within walking distance (a bit of a hike, but worth the walk!), along the beautiful scenic coastal path, is Sant Marti d'Empúries, a charming hill top hamlet with a selection of fabulous restaurants, overlooking the Golf of Roses.

If you drive, there is free parking in our street but the residents use the spaces so you will most likely have to park your car at the to
host_about:
Hello from Seeta and John!

I'm an editor and John is an architect who undertook the renovations on our house which hadn't been lived in for 40 years.  We hope you will enjoy our home as much as we do :)

name: Cal Ouaire House
description:
Casa con chimenea , patio privado y piscina compartida.
Cal Ouaire ofrece una experiencia auténtica en el corazón del Empordà. Se trata de una casa restaurada, rodeada de bosques y pequeñas casas que conforman el tranquilo barrio de Diana. El edificio un antiguo pajar se ha reformado con la premisa de preservar su estructura original como sus paredes de piedra, buscando siempre serenidad y confort. El resultado no es más que un hogar tranquilo que transmite una sensación de simplicida...

The space
Cal Ouaire es una masia Catalana restaurada rodeada de pequeñas casas que conforman el tranquilo vecindario de Diana.
El edificio ha sido renovado a partir de la ruina de una antigua granja. Las renovaciones se llevaron a cabo con las premisas de preservar sus paredes de piedra, buscando siempre la serenidad y comodidad. El resultado no es más que un hogar tranquilo que transmite una sensación de simplicidad y calma. La casa está amueblada con un estilo na
neighborhood_overview:
Todo se reduce a una experiencia sencilla y pura. Huimos de las aglomeraciones y buscamos la discreción. Queremos que nuestros huéspedes formen parte de esta tierra, la vivan y la disfruten de una forma especial. Buscamos ser parte del recuerdo que te llevarás.
La desconexión y el descanso lo encontramos en una puesta de sol, en el ruido de los árboles, en el aire y la energía del viento del Empordà.La casa está emplazada en un camino a 2 kilómetros de Sant Jordi Desvalls. Es un lugar donde reina la tranquilidad y el silencio. Un precioso paisaje de interior, rodeado de campos, huertos y bosques donde disfrutar de agradables paseos.
A escasos kilómetros de la casa se encuentran las playas más bonitas de la Costa Brava. A tan sólo 20 minutos en coche de l'Estartit, i l'Escala, y a 25 minutos de Girona. También podrás visitar numerosos pueblos con encanto. En la casa encontraríes varias ediciones de la Guia de l'Empordà y recomandaciones.
En el pueblo de Sant Jordi Desva
host_about:
Nuestra familia siempre trabajó en el campo y nuestra ilusión de dar nueva vida a antiguos espacios utilizados para el ganado y sus cultivos nos llevaron a construir estas magníficas casas, respetando siempre el entorno y los lugares, con materiales honestos y de calidad.. 
Estaremos encantados de daros la bienvenida y explicaros lo que creemos es lo mejor y más bonito de la zona del Empordà y el Gironès.

name: CA LA REIA 3 habitacions-TERRAZA CON VISTAS
description:
Casa rural del siglo XVII en Castellfollit de la Roca dividida en dos apartamentos independientes que pueden alquilarse juntas o separadas segun sus necesidades.
•Situada en un lugar tranquilo, en la entrada del antiguo camino romano
•Fantásticas vistas al Parque Natural de la Garrotxa
•Ideal para amantes de la naturaleza y para hacer excursiones

RESERVA MINIMA 2 NOCHES

The space
Espacioso apartamento de dos plantas de 90 m cada una magnifica terraza con capacidad para 7 personas. Situada al final de la parte antigua de este bonito pueblo, por lo que casi se encuentra en pleno campo. Rodeada de magnificas vistas de colinas y con inmediato acceso a excursiones en la naturaleza
Lugar tranquilo y relajante, sin tráfico
Situada en un extremo del magnifico Parque Natural de la Garrotxa, con sus espectaculares volcanes, bosques y las vistas espectaculares de los Pirineos
reserva mínima de 2 noches. En el pueblo hay uma magini
neighborhood_overview:
La casa está en el extremo del pintoresco pueblo de Castellfollit de la Rocas, desde donde que podemos admirar unas maravillosas vistas del Parque Natural de la Garrotxa. Esta situada en el centro historico de Castellfollit devla Roca muy cerca de la Iglesia antigua desde dondevse pueden ver magnificas vistas desde su campanario.
A 8 minutos de distancia de Olot, capital comarcal y del Parque natural y de la zona volcánica. Destaca su tradicional mercado , y su variedad de tiendas, restaurantes …etc.
A 12 minutos de Besalú maravilloso pueblo medieval .
Club de golf a 15 minutos (Navata) y a 30 minutos (Gerona).
Figueres y el Museo Dalí a 30 minutos.
Gerona a 45 minutos.
Costa Brava al Oeste y Francia al Norte, a menos de una hora.
Barcelona en el sur a 90 minutos
Dirección:
'Cala Reia',
Carrer de la Font 5,
Castellfollit de la Roca,
Garrotxa, Girona,
Catalonia, Spain

name: Habitación con terraza
description:
En Sant Pere Pescador rodeado de campos fruteros, al principio de la reserva natural “Parc de Mig de Dos Rius” dónde hay una gran diversidad de fauna, al lado del río Fluvià i cerca de la playa, en el corazón de los Aiguamolls de l'Empordà.

The space
El mas se encuentra en Sant Pere Pescador rodeado de campos fruteros, al principio de la reserva natural “Parc de Mig de Dos Rius” dónde hay una gran diversidad de fauna, al lado del río Fluvià i cerca de la playa, en el corazón de los Aiguamolls de l’Empordà.

La masía está situada en la comarca del Alt Empordà, en la población de Sant Pere Pescador, en el Baix Fluvià. El pueblo se encuentra a unos 300 m y se puede ir dando un paseo. Aproximadamente a un kilómetro tenemos la desembocadura del Fluvià de gran valor ecológico y la playa que tiene una extensión de 6 km. de dunas de arena fina. Es una de las pocas playas que se mantienen vírgenes en la Costa Brava.

El camino que pasa por delante de
neighborhood_overview:
Desde Sant Pere podrá hacer muchas visitas turísticas, como son por ejemplo:
Figueres (19 km): Museu Dalí, museo del juguete, de la técnica, del Empordà, Castillo de Sant Ferran, ….
Castelló d’Empúries (8,5 km): villa condal, basílica de Santa María, la harinera, …
L’Escala (12 km): ruinas greco-romanas de Empúries, fábricas de anchoas,…
Roses (17 km): castillo de la Trinidad, Ciutadella, monumentos megalíticos, puerto pesquero, …
Sant Pere de Rodes (28 km): monasterio románico.
Cap de Creus (38 km): Parque Natural.
Besalú (38 km): pueblo medieval, Puente Viejo, baños judíos, ….
Girona (50 km): catedral, barrio judío, la Rambla, la Devesa, …
Barcelona: 147 km.
Perpiñán: 76 km.
host_about:
M'agrada llegir, cuinar, la natura, passejar amb els gossos i quan tinc un moment sortir a córrer pels voltants del mas. 
També m'encanta viatjar però des que tenim la casa rural no ens queda massa temps per fer-ho.

El alojamiento està equipado con todas las comodidades incluyendo calefacción central y estufa de leña. Se accede por la puerta principal de la casa por una escalera antigua de mármol del travertino,al primer piso. El alojamiento consta de comedor cafetera , hervidor y microondas i una suite con baño.

Tiene chimenea de leña. Se entra por la puerta principal de la masía. Se accede al primer piso por una escalera de piedra de travertino del 1771.

name: AL01 Studio 250 m from Fenals Beach, Costa Brava
description:
Nice and cozy studio, tastefully decorated, situated in an enclosed grounds with swimming pool only 250 meters from the beach in one of the best areas of Lloret de Mar - Fenals. It has a bright living room with a comfortable sofa bed of 160 cm, a fully equipped kitchen with appliances and cooking utensils, TV, WI-FI internet (included in the price), iron, air conditioning etc., and a bathroom with bath and hairdryer.

The space
The studio has a bright room with a very comfortable 160 cm sofa-bed, a fully equipped kitchen with appliances and kitchen utensils, TV, Wi-Fi internet (included in the price), iron, air conditioning etc., and a bathroom with bathtub and dryer.

neighborhood_overview: The Fenals area is very quiet and perfect for family holidays. It has a very complete infrastructure: restaurants, cafeterias, shops, supermarkets, playgrounds, transport stops and multiple places of leisure. It is 15 minutes walk from the center of the village and its nightlife, for those who wish to go out to spend a fun and enjoyable time. A few meters away are the beaches of Fenals and Sa Boadella, recognized as one of the most beautiful beaches of the Costa Brava.
host_about: Hello! My name is Verónica. I live in Lloret de Mar, Costa Brava and I am in love with this wonderful place. I love traveling! I am dedicated to vacation rentals in Lloret de Mar, Playa de Aro and Sagaro. Since 2009 we have hosted travelers from all over the world in our accommodations and we love our work. We will be happy to welcome new travelers on the Costa Brava and provide them with the best conditions and advice for an unforgettable stay.

host_about:
Nací en un pueblecito de León, hace ya muchísimos años. Llegué joven a Rosas, donde tras varios trabajos temporales, comencé a trabajar como maestro en la escuela. Y desde entonces, hace ya más de 35 años, aquí continúo, disfrutando de esta magnífica zona donde confluyen el mar, la llanura y las montañas! Un enclave realmente afortunado!

Cuando vengas a visitarnos, muy posiblemente seré yo quien te atienda a tu llegada. Repasaremos junto el apartamento y sus características, y te explicaré dónde puedes encontrar los principales supermercados, así como el Centro de Información Turística. 

!Será un placer tenerte como inquilino!

name: Casa Rural en la Costa Brava - 6/8 Pax
description:
The space
RURAL HOUSE IN CCan Ginesta (Tramuntana) is a rural house that offers all the comforts to rest and to know the region.
The house is distributed on two floors. On the first floor there is the kitchen, fully equipped, the dining room, the living room, a room with a double bed and a bathroom.
This room communicates with an ample porch for exclusive use.
On the upper floor there are the other two bedrooms, one with a double bed that has a large sun terrace, and another with two single beds, to which two extra beds can be added. All rooms have their own bathroom.

Sant Feliu de Boada, has a privileged situation, since it offers the tranquility of a small rural town, and at the same time allows in 10 minutes to be located in any of the most beautiful coves and beaches of the Costa Brava, as well as the main towns of the region as La Bisbal, Palamós, Torroella de Montgrí, Palafrugell, Begur, Pals, Peratallada ...

name: Casita con vistas espectaculares al Mediterraneo
description:
La casa está inserida dentro de un gran jardín Mediterráneo con las mejores vistas sobre la Bahía de Roses y los Pirineos. Incluye una habitación doble, un baño completo, un Salón con cocina americana y una gran terraza- jardín. Ideal para una pareja. La casa es el equivalente a una casa rural pero dentro de una localidad de costa con acceso separado y ningún servicio compartido asegurando total tranquilidad en estos momentos post covid19.

The space
El espacio tiene unas vistas espectaculares y está hecho con una decoración que combina aspectos rústicos con mediterráneos contemporáneos primando el confort total. Incluye TV digital, wifi y todos los instrumentos de cocina necesarios para disfrutarla como si fuera su propia casa.

Guest access
La casa está a 5 minutos a pie de la playa de los palangrers frecuentada por los locales de Rosas y a 10 minutos del centro del pueblo volviéndose una perfecta base para conocer todas las atracciones d
neighborhood_overview: El barrio puramente residencial es super tranquilo y disfruta de las mejores puestas de sol de toda la Costa Brava ya que el sol se pone frente a la  terraza principal detrás del mar y de las montañas de los Pirineos.
host_about:
Me llamo Carolina soy la gerente de Thalassa Sport en Roses que tiene un spa en el que además de circuito de aguas, hacemos todo tipo de tratamientos y estamos especializados en programas anti-estrés y adelgazante, un hotel de 8 habitaciones, 1 apartamento y una casita en la zona residencial del puerto con vistas espectaculares.
En este complejo familiar hacemos todo lo posible para que haya un antes y un después de sus vacaciones con nosotros.

name: Charming Apartment. Sea views. Pool. Pkg. 6 people
description:
Cozy and cute apartment with fireplace. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, fits 6 people. Very sunny, with a balcony overlooking at sea views and pine trees. 20 m to big swimming pool. Parking included. Situated at 800m of el Golfet, one of the most beautiful beaches of Costa Brava with amazing crystal water. The area is very quiet and relaxing area through an exceptionally beautiful path along the coastline that will take you to the centre of Calella in 25-30 min walk. Going by car is less than 3 minutes

The space
Ideal place for families with children that want to enjoy the beauty of Costa Brava but want a quite and relaxing place.

Surrounded by truly Mediterranean vegetation, all rooms overlook at pine trees, cypress and other trees, with views of the sea from the balcony. This community was awarded with the well-known architectural design FAD awards, with a very good distribution that allows space for six people for a medium-size apartment. Beautiful kitche
neighborhood_overview: The area is very quite with beautiful houses and their swimming pools. The type of vacationers are mostly families with children. The closer beach is el Golfet, 800m away, 2 minutes by car, quite easily to park or 10 minutes walking. This is considered one of the most beautiful beaches in Costa Brava.
host_about:
I live close to Barcelona and spend my weekends in this apartment. During summer I love travelling with my family and this is why I rent it. I always go to apartments and love to have advices from places to visit or recommendations on restaurants so I am very pleased to do the same with my guests. 

I love travelling with my family and showing my kids the beauty of learning different cultures, learning few words from new languages and making friends from other cultures. Few years ago I lived in London for a couple of years and I have great memories of that time. 

I also love painting, and the apartment has some of my collection on the walls. I also love dancing salsa and all type of music too. Recently I've just started Kundalini yoga which I love too. Next to the apartment there is a beach, el Golfet, which is an amazing place to meditate in the morning with the rising sun. That's unbeliveable!

I love sharing my apartment with my guests and feel extremely happy when they are experiencing the 'good vibes' it transmits.

name: Yes yes Portbou, come to our house!
description:
Second floor apartment, cozy, bright, comfortable and well equipped, but you can not offer sea views, the street is very quiet, you can have a good rest. No lift. Balconies and windows all exterior.
Only 2 minutes walk to the beach!!

The space
3 bedrooms:
1 bedroom with double bed 160cm Flutua, Design Daniel Lago.
1 room with 2 beds of 80cm
1 room with 1 sofabed 140cm

Bedding is natural cotton.

Kitchen:
has all the standard equipment,
large fridge-freezer, microwave, dishwasher, oven, hob, washer-dryer
machine, toaster, squeezer, pots, pans, dishes, glasses, cutlery and everything necessary to be a good gourmet.

Bathroom :
with hair dryer, shampoo, gel and towels for each guest.

Complementary:
Wifi internet, smartTV55", services in streaming NetFlix, radio vintage, air conditioning, heating, smoke and CO2 detector by Nest.

Mini-library with detailed tourist info
neighborhood_overview:
a 2 minutes from the beach, a 3 the municipal market and the centrum town, a 6 minutes from the railway station.

The town of Portbou is well connected by road and railway, the winding road follows the rocky coast, a perfect site to explore the northern and southern Catalonia.

20km from Cadaqués
20km from Collioure (France)
30km from Figueres (Dali Museum)
60km from Girona (Jewish Quarter and cathedrals)
60km from Perpingnan (France)
100km from Barcelona (Sagrada Familia , Park Guell and Palace, Gothic Quarter, Museum Picasso, Foundation Miro, La Pedrera, Palau de la Música...)

From Figueres you can take the high speed train (AVE and TGV) to contact:

Girona in 15 minutes
Barcelona in 55 minutes
Perpingnan (France) in 20 minutes

It is a comfortable journey and fast travel.
host_about:
Som parella desde fa uns anys, francesa ella, català jo, ella treballa en el sector de salud, el meu en el sector de telecomunicacions.

Ens agrada viatjar i descobrir, molt propers al nostre entorn natural, amb el que ens relacionem sobretot practicant esport. 

Viatgem on podem quan podem, ens desplacem fent cicloturisme, amb autocaravana, o caminant, sempre tot és millor caminant plegats!!!

Aficionats al "make your self", som uns bojos del brico! tenim el nostre propi hortet, fem la nostre mermelada, recollim plantes remeires...

Si vens com hoste et trobaràs ven acollit i quasi com a casa teva...!!!

The space
Costabravaforrent Masramon is a beautiful villa with its own private swimming pool of 6x3, with views of the Montgrí Park and 900 metres from the beach.

It consists of a suite and four double bedrooms, two with double beds, one with two single beds and one with two bunk beds. The living room and dining room look out on and have access to the terrace and garden. In the living room there are two sofas, two armchairs and a fireplace. The dining room has space for up to twelve people. There are three complete bathrooms, one in the suite with a bath and the other two with showers. The kitchen is fully equipped.

Costabravaforrent Masramon is situated in the neighbourhood of Montgó, 900 metres from the beach of Cala Montgó and 3 km from the centre of L’Escala. Here you can find a path which leads from Mateua Island to the port in L’Escala.

Cala Montgó has supermarkets, bakeries, bars, restaurants and shops.

name: Vue sur sommets - Joli appartement
description:
Appartement de caractère au coeur de la Cerdagne avec vue 360 sur tous les sommets -

The space
L'appartement est situé à Llivia au coeur de la Cerdagne - Au 3ème étage, sous les toits, très lumineux (300 jours de soleil par an en moyenne), la baie vitrée et les ouvertures offrant une vue 360 sur les sommets de la Cerdagne - Très agréable et calme, il dispose d'une chambre entièrement mansardée avec un lit double - 1 autre chambre contient 1 (voire 2) lit(s) simple (s), le séjour peut recevoir un matelas double de grande taille et dispose d'un fauteuil déployable en lit simple - Pour les enfants en bas âge, la chambre principale peut recevoir un lit ou un matelas pour bébé en plus du lit double - Cuisine équipée, salle de bain avec 2 lavabos et petite baignoire faisant douche - Cheminée dans un séjour chaleureux orienté plein sud avec grandes baie vitrée - Un vidéoprojecteur est à disposition à la demande (projection sur murs blancs dans la grande pièce ou la cha
neighborhood_overview: Tous commerces d'alimentation, petits supermarchés, pharmacie, tabac, journaux (catalan), coiffure, nombreux restaurants, cafés, pizzerias et crêperies à proximité - La plupart ouverts le dimanche matin - Un commerce de plats à emporter ouvert le dimanche toute la journée - Un commerce de boisson, alimentation de base et produits de nécessité ouvert le dimanche toute la journée l'été - Supermarché Charter Consum ouvert toute la journée non-stop y compris lundi - Parc situé à 200 mètres pour activités ludiques, sportives ou de détente, barbecue et piscine -
host_about: Musicien classique (instrumentiste à cordes interprète) passionné de sports outdoor, hiking et alpinisme (ski), sports de raquettes (tennis, padel,etc.), golf et voile - A fait de Llivia et de la Cerdagne son "centre d'entraînement en altitude" - Simple, discret, accueillant et très heureux de faire profiter son appartement qui peut se prêter aussi bien à un esprit familial et de détente qu'à des activités orientées outdoor et montagne ou enfin à une recherche de calme et de tranquilité -

This cosy apartment is in the middle of Cap Ras, in Llançà, near to the natural park, the beaches ant the seaside paths and a 10 minutes of the Port's urban centre, where you will find the principal shops and restaurant, the Port and Gola beaches, the marina port and other important see sights.
Llançà is a coast and familiar village, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their
neighborhood_overview:
Incredible seafront apartment in the quiet zone of Cap Ras!

This magnificent apartment with fantastic sea views it’s located at Cap Ras zone in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) ant mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.

The annex contains three big suites, each suitable for up to 4 people. The suites all include a double bed and in one a single bed with guest bed underneath w
neighborhood_overview:
GPS Coordenades: 42.034452554751766, 2.9899871349334717

Can Carrió is located in the northern part of Foixà, in the neighbourhood of Cuells, in a residential zone surrounded by fields and pine and oak woodland which give a magical air of tranquillity.

4Km away is the Gala/Dali foundation in Púbol Castle, vertex of the Dali triangle with Figueres and Port- Lligat. 35km away is the town of Figueres and the Museo Dalí.

20 Km from Foixà are the beaches of Empúries, Escala, Estartit and Pals, and the Costa Brava stretching out before you. Estartit offers an important base for Scuba diving in the protected surroundings of the Medes Islands. Also 20km away is the historic city of Girona.

Around the village there are different cycle routes and footpaths which allow you to explore the local area.

Hello! I'm Ismael and this is my wife Oksana. We are young family which like to travel, active sports, music, beach and enjoying the life...  Bending with people from different countries and cultures is one of our passions, cause we are international family ;)
We are sociable, outgoing, friendly, hospitable and we love good conversation.
We love Lloret de Mar with great beaches, good food, wine and friendly people. We invite you to come here - a beautiful Mediterranean city. We want that you enjoy your vacations. Here are many activities available ranging from boat rental, rock climbing, kayaking, sailing, day trips to other cities, wine tasting tours, scooter rental to explore more of the our city and many more things.
We can organise anything you may want to do during your stay with us.

name: Masia de Can Creus (1.890) Vilanna- Bescanó
description:
Can Creus és una masia construida en 1890 de paredes muy gruesas de piedra i ventanas pequeñas típicas de las casas de labradores de la época, se para preservar la temperatura del interior tanto en verano como en invierno. La casa se restauro hace unos 40 años i se terminó de reformar de nuevo en el 2010.
Situada en un pequeño bosque.
Decorada con encanto.
Capacidad para 8 personas, con todo lo necesario.
Para reservas de una semana precio especial. Ponerse en contacto con el propietario

The space
La masia de Can Creus és especial por;
1- su construcción de paredes de piedra y gruesas en el exterior y tambien en parte del interior. Agunas puertas bajas que se han conservado como las originales Festejador en la ventana principal. El techo de la planta baja con vigas de madera.
En la planta baja hay una entrada grande , cocina , comedor i salon en una sola pieza, un labavo amplio i una estancia con sofà.
En la planta s
neighborhood_overview:
La masia està envuelta de bosque y tiene zonas de pradera para poder jugar.
Una zona del bosque con hamacas para descansar , leer o relajarse.
Bescanó , és un pueblo a pocos kilometros donde hay restaurantes, supermercado y todo lo que tiene un pueblo.
host_about:
Jo i el meu marit som professors de secundària jubilats.
A mi m'agrada viatjar, llegir i el cinema.
Al meu marit li agrada tot el món del motor, la tranquil·litat, la música, etc.

name: SANT GENIS 1 Fantastic apartment with beautiful sea views
description:
Fantastic apartment with beautiful sea views.

The space
This apartment is located at the quite zone of Sant Genis, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.

name: La maison de Casa de Campo, Begur
description:
Idéalement située sur les hauteurs entre Palafrugell et Begur, maison de famille à louer à la semaine ou longs week-ends, au dessus des plages de Tamariu, Llafranch et Calella.
Idéal pour deux couples et enfants ou trois couples.

The space
Maison de 160 m2 comprenant :
Une chambre grand lit (150) ouverte sur le jardin
Une chambre grand lit (150), lit enfant avec sa salle de douche, ouvrant sur le jardin (possibilité lit bébé)
Une chambre grand lit (150) et possibilité lit bébé
Une chambre enfants dite la tour (2 lits en 90)
Une salle de bain, baignoire, deux vasques, WC, lave-linge (+ sèche-cheveux, pèse-personne)
Un WC indépendant
Un salon avec grand canapé, TV écran plat (TNT française et chaines espagnoles), mini-chaîne station d'accueil Ipod..
Une salle à manger
Une cuisine bien équipée avec four, lave-vaisselle, deux plaques vitrocéramique, deux feux au gaz, micro-ondes, machine Nespresso et cafetière, grille
neighborhood_overview:
Notre villa, Tamarina, est située dans un ensemble résidentiel au calme et privilégié entre les villages de Palafrugell et Begur.
Possibilité d'aller à Tamariu à pieds à travers la campagne (denivellé) en 30 minutes
Supermarché Jodofi à 2 minutes en voiture ouvert toute l'année et à des prix très raisonnables.
host_about:
Passionnée d'Espagne depuis toujours, amoureuse de la Catalogne et plus particulièrement de l'Empurdan pour la diversité de ses paysages, sa culture, sa gastronomie, ses fêtes locales, les céramiques et antiquités de La Bisbal...
Tamarina est une maison de famille que nous entretenons avec soin et avec Airbnb nous essayons de faire découvrir ce superbe coin de la Costa Brava.
Nous sommes une famille avec deux adolescents et vivons à Nîmes.

name: Cal Cesc Breda. House for family Holidays
description:
Great house Breda, in quiet area. Large garden with pool and area for football, basketball, pingpong. Organic garden, chickens and rabbits. Ideal for a very quiet days in the countryside, outdoors and nature, close to Montseny Natural Park.

The space
Although the house is large and comfortable, at just one level, what we like is the outside, the large garden and swimming pool, where we spent most of the time.

Guest access
As guests, you will have whole house (except one room for our personal things) and the garden, all to yourselves.

Other things to note
We will send you a little guide over the house, the town and the area.

neighborhood_overview: The house is in the village, in a very quiet area. There are bakeries, supermarkets, kiosks, shops, bars, restaurants and shops dedicated to ceramics. Breda is a historic medieval town, which retains the Monastery of Sant Salvador, the eleventh century, and the Church of Santa Maria, in Romanesque style. The village is a few minutes from the Montseny Natural Park, where you can make many excursions.

name: L'Estartit - 2 bedroom house and private pool(1)
description:
2 bedroom villa with private pool. Spacious lounge/dining area. It is located in a quiet residential urbanisation, 2 km from L'Estartit and it's wonderful golden beach. It has private parking. Fully enclosed garden.

The space
A beautiful 2 bedroom villa with private swimming pool. The villa has a fully equipped modern kitchen. It has a double bedroom and another bedroom with two single beds. The villa enjoys a comfortable living/dining area. There are great views of the Castell Montgri from the garden. The outside area comprises of a fully enclosed garden with private secure parking and a large terrace with a covered/shaded area. There is also a barbeque located in the garden.

Guest access
Guests have full access to all areas of this property.

Other things to note

Ideally placed between the holiday coastal village of Estartit and the medieval market town of Torroella de Montgri.  The Costa Brava has a wealth of wonderful places and cuisine for the visitor to experience.  The area has some of the most beautiful beaches and hidden coves in Europe, for guests to explore.  There is an unlimited amount of water sports from kayaking, boat hire, windsurfing/boarding and other water-borne sports to enjoy. Apartamento ideal para pasar un fin de semana en la montaña. Tiene 2 hab. , 1 baño, salón comedor y cocina abierta. Totalmente equipado con roba de cama, toallas, utensilios de cocina. A 4 minutos en coche de la estación de esquí. Wifi. Pk según disponibilidad y trastero

The space
Apartamento ideal para venir a pasar unos días en la montaña. Muy cuidado. En una zona tranquila y ideal para todo tipo de actividades en familia, pareja o amigos.

Guest access
El único servio comun es la lavadora y la secadora. Dentro del apartamento hay lavaplatos.

Other things to note
Los apartamentos son muy nuevos y modernos. Tenemos descuentos en forfaits en La Molina y Masella y en verano en todas las actividades que se hacen en La Molina: piscina, tennis, bikepark, el parque de aventura en los árboles, tiro con arco, paseos en barca o poni, cars, quads...

neighborhood_overview: Es una zona tranquila. Justo delante hay una zona verde con juegos para los niños. Está a 4 minutos en coche de la estación de esquí donde en verano hacen un monton de actividades. A 5 minutos en coche está el pueblo de Alp donde hay tiendas, supermercado, buenos restaurantes...
host_about: Somos una empresa que se dedica a los alquileres hace mas de 15 años. Lo primordial para nosotros es  que nuestros huéspedes esten a gusto ennuestros apartamentos y quieran repetir. Creo que tenemos unos apartamentos muy bonitos y intentamos que no les falte de nada, que esten limpios y que nuestros clientes esten comodos y confortables. Tenemos servicio 24h donde ayudamos en todo lo que nos pidan:  información de actividades, restaurantes y todo lo que puedan necesitar.

description:
Es una casa maravillosa con vistas que invitan al descanso de la ajetreada ciudad, cerca del centro de Puigcerdà, al pie de la montaña y muy cerca de las pistas de esquí. Ideal para un fin de semana especial o unas semanas de vacaciones.

Es un sitio espectacular para hacer excursiones, rutas a caballo o simplemente tumbarse y disfrutar de la tranquilidad que nos brinda estar en medio de la naturaleza.

The space
Se trata de una preciosa casa de dos plantas, en la planta superior, por donde la casa tiene la entrada se encuentran el comedor, la cocina abierta, el salón y la zona de juegos, donde tenemos la mesa de billar.

En el comedor hay una mesa para 10 personas de madera maciza y unas vistas muy especiales.

En el salón hay un fuego a tierra que dejamos equipado con unos tronquitos para que podáis preparar un fuego y disfrutar de una película al lado del fuego.

name: Estudio con encanto
description:
Pequeño estudio de 35m2 con capacidad para dos plazas, totalmente reformado conservando el estilo rustico, dispone de todos los servicios independientes (cocina, baño con ducha hidromasaje, chimenea, etc)

The space
Can Barrina, es una atigua casa Pairal situada en la plaza del fantástico pueblo de Ventalló, conocido por el encanto de sus calles y casas de piedra de estilo rustico.

La casa ha sido totalmente reformada en 2014 conservando su caracter y autenticidad.
En la segunda planta del edificio encontramos este pequeño estudio de un solo ambiente con una cama doble, un sofa cama y chimenea.Con un total de 2-4 plazas

Guest access
En la parte superior del edificio una amplia terraza desde dónde se puede ver todo el golf de rosas con el mar y las montañas del cap de Creus.
También se pone a disposición de los huéspedes una zona común de lavanderia

Other things to note
Botella de cava, vino, bombon
neighborhood_overview: Ventallo, es un precioso pueblo situado en pleno empordà, a tan solo 5 minutos de las playas en coche y muy cercano a los principales atractivos turísticos de la zona (aiguamolls de l'emporda, empuries, figueres y museo dali, etc)

name: Cargols de Mar 6 - Empuriabrava
description:
Very nice house located in a small residence in front of the sea in Empuriabrava.
Comfortable and well equipped.
It has a community pool, WIFI, air conditioning and private garage.
Privileged location and magnificent views from its various terraces.

The space
Beautiful house, in a private residence with swimming pool.
Privileged location, on the seafront in Empuriabrava and on the canal.
House divided into 3 floors.
On the ground floor is a private garage with one bedroom and a large terrace with garden furniture and barbecue. This room is not air conditioned and is not recommended for young children, as it is independent from the rest of the house.
The first floor consists of a spacious living / dining room with terrace, a modern open-plan kitchen and a bathroom with shower.
Stairs give access to the second floor where you will find two double bedrooms with air conditioning, one bedroom with bunk beds and a second bathroom
neighborhood_overview:
Very calm area in front of the sea and the maritime promenade.
A few steps from the city center of Empuriabrava and tourist activities.
host_about:
COSTA BRAVA RELAX: une équipe de professionnels à votre service.
Nous nous ferons un plaisir de vous aider à planifier vos vacances dans notre résidence CARGOLS DE MAR, et nous vous accueillerons en français, anglais, allemand, espagnol et catalan.

name: PORT 6 Great apartment in front of the beach
description:
Great apartment in front of the beach.

The space
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Port, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.
This aparment it's located in the seafr
neighborhood_overview:
This fabulous apartment is located in the urban centre of the Port’s zone, in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) ant mountain activities (GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.

Nuestro objetivo es claro: que cada cliente se sienta como en su propia casa! Ofrecemos una atención personalizada y profesional, capaz de gestionar cualquier incidencia en el menor tiempo posible. Lejos de las inmobiliarias totalmente impersonales, nuestro trato y proximidad son nuestras señas de identidad. Esperamos conocerte y poderte ayudar en tus próximas vacaciones!

name: PORT 8 Apartment in the urban centre, close to the beach
description:
Apartment in the urban centre, close to the beach.

The space
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Port, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.

neighborhood_overview:
Torre Vella is located between Torroella (3km) and l'Estartit (3km). It is a very quiet and beautiful urbanization surrounded by forest and mountains. At the entrance there is a supermarket open all year.
You can do activities such as: scuba diving to the Medes islands, surfing, kayaking, snorkeling, horseback riding, tennis, paddle tennis, ultra light... 8, consists of a floor and attic, kitchen-dining-living room in one and airy feel, with three bedrooms, a king suite with full bath and wood stove, double (double) and one quadruple (ideal children ).

Fantastic garden (2060 m2) private and intimate, ideal for lovers of relaxation, sport, tranquility, fami
neighborhood_overview:
Campelles is part of the Ripollès region, in the province of Girona.
It is a very well-preserved natural area with all kinds of fauna, ideal for short excursions along the river, with the option of bathing in its refreshing waters in summer. During the fall, it is a very good place to go looking for mushrooms, or in winter to ski on the nearby slopes of Vall de Núria, La Molina, Masella or Vallter 2000.The town also offers a great variety of local gastronomic products, they highlight its sausages and cheeses, honey or biscuits from Camprodon, near Campelles, are also highly appreciated.

name: El Sorrall 3. 1 bedroom apartment. Sea Views
description:
The ´Apartments El Sorrall´ are the type of apartments for clients who want to have a quiet or family holiday by the sea. A place for our clients to feel at ease. They are located in the quiet but touristic town of Blanes, in the Costa Brava. An ideal place to spend a family vacation by the sea and only a stone's throw away from the beach. All the apartments have a balcony with spectacular views of the promenade and beach.

The space
El Sorrall is a building with several types of apartments, in this case the one bedroom apartments are for two persons. The building has an elevator for easier access. There is a bedroom with 2 beds. Complete bathroom with sink, toilet , bidet and bath . Electric boiler for the hot water system. American Kitchen with refrigerator, two electric cooking hobs, extractor fan, microwave and sink. Dining room with sofa for three persons , table with three chairs and a flat screen TV. Balcony with a table and two chairs.
The apartments
neighborhood_overview: These apartments are only 300m away from the center of Blanes and its immediate surroundings and everyday facilities: supermarket, bakery, daily fruit and vegetable markets, butchers, and other small shops. Also, within the vicinity there are facilities such as a sports hall, children´s playground, parking, etc.

Apartment 100 meters from the beach, with exquisite decoration.
Two bedrooms (one double with bathroom and the other with two single beds). Two bathrooms (one of them in the bedroom). Large terrace with table, parking, elevator, all air-conditioned, and WIFI. Kitchen equipped with state-of-the-art appliances, and perfectly preserved. In one of the best areas of Tossa de Mar.
Comfortable apartment with beds for 4 people, and a very easy to open sofa bed for 2 people.
