neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Hace 29 años que me dedico al mundo de Real Estate y tambien desde entonces he pasado mis vacaciones en Tossa de Mar , a mis hijas le gustaba tanto que finalmente me compre una casa en Santa Maria de LLorell ( Tossa de mar) Me encanta, no se si me gusta más en verano para disfrutar de la playa y de la maravillosa agua transparente  o en invierno de esos paseos tranquilos tanto por las playas como por las montañas cercanas, tienes mil cosas por hacer. 
Debido a mi profesión mis vecinos y amigos me dijeron que les ayudara a alquilar sus viviendas  para las vacaciones y desde entonces nos dedicamos hace ya quince años a preparar estos hogares para que personas de todo el mundo vengáis a conocer este maravilloso pueblo marinero. Estaré encantada de recibirte junto a tu familia y de poderte ayudar en buscar restaurantes , tiendas, excursiones  y que el apartamento o casa que hayas elegido se convierta en tu hogar durante tus vacaciones.

name: Confortable apartamento Llivia, La Cerdanya. WiFi
description:
La limpieza del apartamento se realiza según recomendaciones de las autoridades sanitarias.
Este confortable apartamento recientemente reformado, ubicado en la población pirenaica de Llivia, Valle de La Cerdanya y cerca de diferentes estaciones de esquí, españolas, francesas y andorranas.
Tiene tres habitaciones y dos baños con capacidad para 8 personas. El amplio salón comedor, con chimenea, está abierto a la cocina muy completa.

The space
Este amplio y luminoso apartamento está ubicado en un edificio, con zona común ajardinada y piscina, dentro de la pueblo de Llivia, en el Valle de La Cerdanya, cerca de diferentes estaciones de esquí, españolas, francesas y andorranas.
Es un lugar muy agradable para familias con niños que les gusta la tranquilidad de la montaña y la práctica de deportes al aire libre.
El apartamento ha sido recientemente reformado por completo. Tiene capacidad para 8 huéspedes. Al entrar a través del pasillo, encontramo
neighborhood_overview: El pueblo de Llivia está ubicado, en el valle de La Cerdanya, dentro del territorio francés, cerca de la antigua frontera entre España y Francia. Encontrará muchos de los servicios que precise tales como restaurantes, tiendas, la famosa farmacia de Llivia, etc. De todas formas, está a pocos kilómetros de Puigcerdá, la capital de la comarca.
host_about:
Soy ingeniero de profesión, lo que hace que sea muy meticuloso y perfeccionista. Soy extrovertido, me encanta conocer nuevas gentes y culturas de las que aprendo muchas cosas.
Una de mis pasiones es viajar, que comparto con mi mujer. Juntos hemos visitado muchas de las hermosas ciudades europeas. Me encanta conocer mundo, soy un enamorado del continente africano, he viajado por diferentes países de ese continente.
Practico varios deportes pero sobre todo que sean al aire libre: esquí, tenis y golf, pero mi gran pasión es la pesca a mosca.
Me encanta el cine, las obras maestras las veo varias veces para no perder los detalles, y la lectura de novelas.

description:
New and bright apartment in Lloret de Mar. Perfect for a romantic evening, weekends, holidays! Аvailable WiFi. It features a pool in the common part of the building. Near the beach Fenals and within walking distance city center.

The space
New and bright apartment in Lloret de Mar (for 1 - 2 people)

Guest access
- Cozy living room with bed (160x200 cm), TV 48", DVD player, dining table and chairs, cupboard; including baby crib if needed. The room with elegant decor features lots of natural light and ventilation, panoramic view of the playground.
- Electric kitchen fully equipped with all the necessary implements to cook during your stay: fridge, oven, microwave, kettle, coffee maker, sandwich maker and washing machine.
- Bathroom with bath, hairdryer.
- Internet Wi-Fi.
- Has common pool of the building.

Other things to note
* Arrival at the apart
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the popular district of Fenals, is a quiet comfortable area to access and close to everything:
CAPRABO supermarket, Carrefour-EXPRESS, DIA, CONSUM; Fruteria, pharmacy, cafes, restaurants, souvenir shops and beach accessories, playground, weekly market (Tuesday), bus (to go to Blanes, Barcelona, Girona, Figueres and etc).
Close to all major attractions of Lloret:
• beaches, variety of water sports, diving, sightseeing boats;
• discos, games and Casino Lloret;
• aquapark (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• dolphinarium;
• playground "Gnome Park";
• karting "GO KARTS Lloret" (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• Botanical Gardens of Santa Clotilde, with a magnificent view of the sea.
Perfect to be near the beach Fenals (400 m) and within walking distance of the city center, you can enjoy the nightlife in the center and walk back to the apartment.

name: Casa Buckingham C - 4/5 pers.
description:
Nice apartment for 4/5 person. with 2 bedrooms and additional sofa bed, on the first floor. With a very large terrace and a spectacular view! Own parking

Located in Torre Vella, a very quiet urbanization with views. Next to the woods and olive fields, ideal for walking.
At the entrance of the urbanization is the GP supermarket, open all year round. It is located between Torroella de Montgrí and L'Estartit, 3.5 km from the beach.

The space
Open kitchen, living room with fireplace. Separate toilet, bathroom with bathtub. Two rooms with 4 single beds and a sofa bed.

Guest access
You can use the swimming pool of the restaurant Torre vella. The swimming pool is not included in the rent. You can buy tickets per day or per week

Other things to note
Towels and sheets are not included.
You can rent these (8.00 Euro, 10.00 Euro per person, per week.)
Or you can bring your own.

We kindly ask
neighborhood_overview:
Torre Vella is situated on a hill; it is very calm and has beautiful views. Located next to the woods and olive fields, lovely for walks. At the entrance is a large supermarket, open every day of the week. It is 3,5 km to Torroella de Montgrí, typical Catalan village. And 3,5 km to L´Estartit, beach and centre.
Lovely weekly markets, city’s to visit Barcelona, Girona and Figueres.
Plenty of nice old villages you can visit but also beautiful small bays.
Estartit has a large Sandy beach, which slowly goes into the deep, so ideal for children. There is also a large free parking place at the beach. Estartit is known for diving around the Medes Islands but you can practice all sorts of water sports.

In L´estartit on the Boulevard are different restaurants you can find that are realy good. There is N´gruna and Gelatone. The prices are really good and the food is excellent. A N´gruna they serve different plates and at Gelatone you can have a lovely pizza of pasta.
host_about:
Dear guests,

We are Torre Vella Properties.
An agency located in the Costa Brava with more than 30 years experience in holiday rentals. 
We are specialized in privat owned homes and appartments. 
Torre Vella Properties provides you locally with all services you need during your stay.
neighbourhood: Estartit - La Torre Vella, Catalunya, Spain

name: Apartment in Regencos with garden and pool
description:
Stay in a typically Empordanese house located in the heart of the Costa Brava. This beautiful 18th century rectory has been transformed into four cozy apartments that preserve the historical essence of the establishment.

Our apartments are 50 m2, have 1 large bedroom with a double bed, 1 full bathroom and a living area with a fully equipped kitchen.

The rectory of regencos, where our apartments are located, has a beautiful garden with a swimming pool.

The space
Spacious and fully equipped apartment of 50 m2, overlooking our garden with pool. Perfect capacity for 2 adults and 1 child.

Apartment decorated by interior designer Anna Puig. Her vision has managed to turn our rooms into cozy and bright spaces, taking care of every detail accompanied by the practicality and comfort necessary to satisfy the needs of our clients.


Each apartment has:

• 50 m2
• 1 large master bedroom with comfortable double be
neighborhood_overview:
Our customers can park their car esaily, few meters from the apartment.

Place that stands out for the tranquility of the town of Regencos at the same time that it is perfectly located, between the towns of Pals and Begur, just 10 minutes from the places of interest and the best beaches on the Costa Brava.

The Rectoria de Regencós, as its name suggests, is located in the medieval town of Regencós, characterized by its tranquility. It is the perfect enclave for those who want to enjoy the typical village life of its people, its narrow and cobbled streets and surrounded by fields with views of the Quarlemany mountain.

We are in the small and cozy medieval town of Regencós, between the well-known towns of Begur and Pals. The perfect enclave for those who want to enjoy nature and the sea, in a dream environment.

It is located just 5 minutes by car from the best beaches such as Sa tuna, Sa Riera, Calella de Palafrugell, LLafranc, Pals and Platja
host_about:
Mi nombre es Alicia y soy de Barcelona. Llevo residiendo en Gerona 19 años y me he dedicado siempre a la hostelería y gestion de restauración y eventos.
Mi objetivo es hacer sentir a los huespedes como en casa y recomendarles todos aquellos preciosos y reconditos lugares que alberga la Costa Brava, para pasar unas inolvidables vacaciones.

description:
The space
Tourist apartment with two bedrooms (one with a double bed and the other with two single beds). For 4 people in an unbeatable area of ​​Tossa de Mar.
Living room with access to the terrace. Kitchen fully equiped. Double bedroom with air conditioning and access to the terrace. Bathroom with bathtub. Air conditioning in the living room and in the master bedroom. Terrace with two hammocks. Elevator, parking in the same building, and wifi included in the price.
Three minutes from the center and the beach, and less than 10 minutes from the medieval castle.
Ideal for a family with two children or two couples.

host_about:
Hace 29 años que me dedico al mundo de Real Estate y tambien desde entonces he pasado mis vacaciones en Tossa de Mar , a mis hijas le gustaba tanto que finalmente me compre una casa en Santa Maria de LLorell ( Tossa de mar) Me encanta, no se si me gusta más en verano para disfrutar de la playa y de la maravillosa agua transparente  o en invierno de esos paseos tranquilos tanto por las playas como por las montañas cercanas, tienes mil cosas por hacer. 
Debido a mi profesión mis vecinos y amigos me dijeron que les ayudara a alquilar sus viviendas  para las vacaciones y desde entonces nos dedicamos hace ya quince años a preparar estos hogares para que personas de todo el mundo vengáis a conocer este maravilloso pueblo marinero. Estaré encantada de recibirte junto a tu familia y de poderte ayudar en buscar restaurantes , tiendas, excursiones  y que el apartamento o casa que hayas elegido se convierta en tu hogar durante tus vacaciones.

Arrels d'Emporda es un aparthotel moderno con piscina al aire libre y está situado en Palafrugell. Los apartamentos tienen aire acondicionado, están a 4 km de la playa de Llafranc y disponen de conexión Wi-Fi gratuita.

Cada apartamento cuenta con balcón,  sala de estar con sofá y TV de pantalla plana. La cocina está equipada con vitrocerámica y microondas. El baño privado dispone de ducha y secador de pelo.

Arrels d'Emporda cuenta con un bar y una sala de reuniones para alquilar. Hay un mercado de productos tradicionales a 500 metros de los apartamentos.

Hay varias playas de la Costa Brava a 10 minutos en coche. El aeropuerto de Girona está a 40 km y el establecimiento ofrece servicio de traslado.

description:

A 5 minutos andando de la playa, 3 minutos de la terminal de autobuses y cerca de la zona de ambiente nocturno y ocio. Wifi, A/C, ascensor y cocina equipada. Estancia mínima: 3 noches. Temp.alta: 1 semana. Posibilidad de cama extra plegatín (suplemento de 10€/noche).

The space
Ático luminoso, decorado con encanto y una terraza maravillosa. Apartamento nuevo, moderno, bien equipado y funcional. Inmejorable situación, cerca de todo lo que se pueda necesitar.
Su privilegiada situación. Bienvenida personal del propietario.

MEDIDAS ESPECIALES COVID-19

Terminal de autobuses a 3 minutos andando y la playa se encuentra a 5 minutos andando, así como la zona de ocio nocturno.

name: Apartment overlooking the sea
description:
Our high standing apartment has beautiful views over the Bay of Roses. The apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms a large living room, and a terrace overlooking the Mediterranean.
The kitchen has all modern comforts. A garage for 2 cars is available

The space
The apartment has been recently renovated and has a high quality finish. It is situated on the 2nd floor of a small apartment block with swimming pool. Six people can easily be accommodated and we can provide a cot for small children and high chair. The views across the bay never gets boring. The terrace is large and has a dining corner and lounge chairs.
The apartment is airconditioned and heated in the colder months. A garage for 2 cars is available on the ground floor. A separate space for a washing machine is in the apartment.

Guest access
Guests have access to all rooms, however there
may be some cupboards locked in the living room. They can use the swimming pool an
neighborhood_overview:
What do we love about Roses. I suppose the beautiful sea, the fishing fleet, which leaves port everyday to return in the late afternoon, which is a lovely sight from our terrace. The sunsets. The restaurants and the nice boulevard of Roses.
The nice villages to visit near Roses, such as Cadaques, Figueres with its Dali museum, the National Parks of Cap de Creus and Aiguamolls.
host_about:
Twenty five years ago we wanted to buy a house in France for our holidays and we found Le Coustal. We restored first the old farmhouse dated 1870 and this is the place we used to live in ourselves. Now this beautiful  farmhouse is also for rent and we named it La Ferme.  We ourselves moved to Château Preyssac in Thenon,  which we are renovating right now.  We started to restore all the other buildings on the domaine. Many years later we could buy the land of our neighbors and we were able to completely renovate the Maison de Maitre and opening it for guests six years ago. 
We are originally from the Netherlands, however 16 years ago we moved from Holland to the United Arab Emirates with our daughter Sanne. 
Nowadays I spend my time between France and the Emirates and together with my daughter Sanne and a dedicated team we take care of our guests in France and Spain, where we also have a family property ( las Rocas) hosted by my cousin Gijb.
Apart from las Rocas we now manage 3 more properties in Rosas: 
Belleza del Mar, Casa Diaz, and Casa Flamenco. 
in the future we hope to add some more treehouses at the domaine Lalande-Laborie. At the moment there are two and maybe in the future in the forests of Preyssac !!

name: Meer(-blick) erleben - Ferienhaus mit Pool
description:
In unserem 2014 renoviertem Haus fühlt man sich gleich wohl. Modern und hell eingerichtetes Haus im typischen Cadaques Style mit atemberaubenden Blick auf das Cap Creus und das wilde Mittelmeer. Umgeben von einem schönen Garten mit privatem Pool.Die großzügige Fensterfronten mit Schiebelementen, garantieren bei jedem Wetter einen herrlichen Blick auf das Mittelmeer.
Große überdachte Terrasse mit Meer Blick.

The space
Neu renovierte Zimmer. Zwei Schlafzimmer und zwei Bäder bieten reichlich Platz für 4 Personen. Ein großes stielvoll eingerichtetes Wohnzimmer in offener Bauweise und übergehender Küche bieten viel Raum. Eine große Terrasse mit Meerblick rundes den Flair vom Haus am Meer ab. Über eine offene Treppe im Wohnraum gelangt man auf eine Empore, die weiteren Raum für 1 Gast ermöglichen.

Guest access
Ihnen steht die komplette obere Wohnung des alleinstehenden Hauses inkl. tollen Garten und privatem Pool zur verfügung.
neighborhood_overview: Sehr ruhig gelegen, direkt an der legendären Hippieinsel. Hier kann man die Natur geniessen, herrliche Spaziergänge unternehmen, tauchen, schwimmen…..15 min zu Fuß ist man in Port Lligat wo sich das berühmte Dali Museum befindet.

name: SANT CARLES 7 Fantastic apartment in the seafront
description:
Fantastic apartment in the seafront.

The space
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Sant Carles, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.
This ground floor is in the Port zo
neighborhood_overview:
This fabulous apartment with sea views it’s located at the calm zone of Sant Carles in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) and mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres’ shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.
host_about: Somos una agencia inmobiliaria con mas de 50 años de experiencia en el sector turístico y especializados en alquiler vacacional. Nuestro objetivo es claro: que cada cliente se sienta como en su propia casa! Ofrecemos una atención personalizada y profesional, capaz de gestionar cualquier incidencia en el menor tiempo posible. Lejos de las inmobiliarias totalmente impersonales, nuestro trato y proximidad son nuestras señas de identidad. Esperamos conocerte y poderte ayudar en tus próximas vacaciones!

name: Garbí Apartment
description:
Spacious apartment with all the amenities in Palafrugell, near the unique beaches of Calella de Palafrugell, Llafranch, Tamariu and Castell. That makes it perfect for a family, romantic or sporty holidays.

The space
This roomy and light-filled flat has been renovated recently.
Up to 5 people can comfortably stay in the 3 bedrooms.
You can enjoy the sun or even have breakfast or dinner in the large balcony-terrace.
It is very well connected: the main road leading to the beaches and everywhere is just around the corner.
Cheaper weekly prices (7 nights stays at least).

Guest access
Lift and disabled access.

Other things to note
We strongly recommend June and September stays. The weather is excellent, the area is not as crowded as in July and August, and the prices are more affordable!

neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood with all the services you may need. There are a supermarket, a pharmacy, a restaurant and some shops in the same street of the apartment. The City Stadium, other sport facilities and a Medical Center are within walking distance from the apartment (100 mts).
host_about:
Hola! Sóc Marc López, de Palafrugell, però actualment resident a Girona. 
Sóc compositor, i treballo de professor de música en un institut de secundària i de professor d'harmonia i guitarra a escoles de música. M'agrada molt practicar esport i tota mena d'activitats a l'aire lliure, cosa que vaig fent en funció del temps lliure del que disposo. 
Conec molt bé Palafrugell. És el poble on he crescut i on he viscut tota la meva infantesa i adolescència. Tinc meravellosos records dels estius d'aquella època: les anades i vingudes diàries a les platges de Calella, la sal i la flaire del mar sobre la pell bronzejada pel sol, els vespres de Festa Major a Plaça Nova... No hi ha res com passar l'estiu en un poble de la costa mediterrània com Palafrugell. De fet, malgrat tenir la residència habitual a Girona, cada any hi torno a l'estiu i intento passar-hi tant temps com sigui possible. Això em permet reviure totes aquelles meravelloses sensacions vitals!  
Més que no pas un allotjament en sí mateix, aquestes sensacions són l'essència del que Airbnb em permet compartir amb tots vosaltres. L'apartament, si bé és molt  important, només és el mitjà que ha de fer possible que els hostes vingueu fins aquí i conegueu el poble i els paratges únics que hi ha a les rodalies. Però la finalitat, allò que és realment important aconseguir, és gaudir de les vivències i sensacions úniques que, com jo, tindreu el plaer i el privilegi d'experimentar passant l'estiu en un poble de la costa catalana com aquest.
Per mi serà tot un plaer ser el vostre cicerone, compartir aquestes experiències i guiar-vos a través de tot aquest tresor de sensacions mediterrànies. Benvinguts a l'estiu! Benvinguts a Palafrugell!

Semi-detached house located in 'les flors'-urb. Residential Begur-Costa brava. The complex is made up of 16 cases combined with a community pool

The space
In the heart of the Empordà region, the town of Begur and its municipality form one of the most wonderful places on the Costa Brava. Bounded by the Gavarres massif and the sea, with an area that extends inland to the foot of the mountain and the other open to the most beautiful seafront of the coast, the municipality of Begur, along with the small town of Esclanyà and the coves that make it up, form a set and a unique landscape environment.
Holiday home for up to 8 people. Located in the Urb. 'Residencial Begur' in a small community of bungalows, called 'les flores', with communal garden and pool for 17 homes, all homes have in addition to their private garden with direct access to the community area. Quiet location.

neighborhood_overview:
It is an area integrated into a natural environment near the beaches of Sa Boadella, Fenals and Santa Cristina de Lloret de Mar, one of the most beautiful on the Costa Brava.
Very quiet and exclusive neighborhood, away from the festive atmosphere of the center of Lloret de Mar.
200 m. There is a local bus stop and a tourist stop, with a circuit through the botanical gardens, and supermarkets 300 m away. At Fenals beach you can take boats with a tour of the beaches of the Costa Brava.
host_about:
Soy una mujer servicial y hospitalaria. Me gusta que la gente se sienta cómoda y feliz a mi alrededor. Intento tratar a mis huéspedes como me gustaría que me trataran a mi. 
Me congratula compartir experiencias y una de ellas es ceder mi propiedad de Lloret de Mar para disfrute vacacional y de ocio.
En mi apartamento doy prioridad al confort, la limpieza, una buena dotación de equipamiento doméstico, servicios y un entorno íntimo y agradable para que tanto famílias como parejas disfruten de un alojamiento y estancia immejorable, relajante y placentera... Además, yo estoy siempre disponible presencial y/o telefónicamente por si hay cualquier problema.
Parece que consigo mi objetivo puesto que frecuentemente alojo inquilinos repetidores. Mi premio es ver las caras de mis clientes cuando se marchan (y vuelven!).
Esta es mi mayor satisfacción!

name: Ca la Mula, Cap de Creus
description:
Pide tu oferta a partir de la tercera noche, Casa en entorno rural, con calefacción, 3 dormitorios, 2 baños (bañera para dos personas, no jacuzzi), jardín con barbacoa, vistas al monasterio de Sant Pere de Rodes.
Ideal para desconectar, pueblo tranquilo a 2 km de la playa. Perfecto para 1 o 2 parejas o familia con niños.

The space
La casa se reformo en 2013, con calefacción mediante bomba de calor, instalada en enero de 2016, dispone de un comedor-cocina con chimenea (35 m2), en la planta primera, con vista a la montaña y al monasterio de Sant Pere de Roda y de Sant Salvador, dispone de 3 dormitorios, 1 doble (15 m2) y 2 individuales (6 m2), con dos camas de matrimonio y una litera, 2 baños completos, uno de los baños dispone de bañera para 2 personas, no es un jacuzzi, los chorros de agua y las burbujas estan desconectados, con las paredes de piedra y iluminación led de colores, perfecto para descansar después de una ruta a pie por los caminos que recorren
neighborhood_overview:
El pueblo de La Vall de la Santa Creu, data del siglo XVI, ubicado a 17 km de Cadaqués, se trata de un entorno rural, protegido por el departamento de patrimonio de la Generalitat, dentro del parque natural del Cap de Creus, con vista al monasterio de Sant Pere de Rodes. Se ubica a unos 2,5 km de la playa.
El pueblo dispone de un restaurante, abierto en verano, especializado en arroz con bogavante y paellas.

name: Apartamento "PLATJA MAR 3"
description:
Nice apartment building first line sea. Third floor with beautiful views over the sea. Practical and well localiazado near the lively area Riells with its small and varied shops , bars and cafes . Guaranteed fun !

The space

neighborhood_overview: It is the lively Riells . Near the marina, harbor and beach . Ideal for callejar and shopping in the little shops offering everything or drink in one of the bars .
host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

name: A house with pool and a view on the sea
description:
A house facing the sea with a large private garden and swimming pool. Two bedrooms with a private solarium terrace, a large bedroom with view to the sea and a kids bedroom.
Perfect for families and friends on vacation. 200m from the sea, ideal temperature and a gentle breeze for pleasant nights. Next to many restaurants, a pine forest, golf course and tennis court, 5 minutes from the center of Palamos.

The space
The house is clean, bright and in summer colors. Numerous cupboards and storage spaces at your disposal, an equipped kitchen, a gas BBQ, a balcony dining room with a view. The garden is partially shaded to take a nap under the trees. The pool, 3m deep, has sun most of the day to sunbathe on the sun loungers, with a computer-managed salt chlorination system for softer water for the skin. The residence is isolated with a green curtain of 28 poplars that hide the neighbors. You quickly feel at home.

Guest access
The whole house ex
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet residential area made up of typical white houses and a single 3-storey building. Many forests and footpaths surround the house. The residence is outside the noise of Palamos and La Fosca and there is very little traffic in the street.

name: Sea view - jacuzzi - walking distance to the beach
description:
Modern villa for those who love the outdoor life: cook in the spacious outdoor kitchen with BBQ and relax in the Jacuzzi after a day of swimming and snorkeling. The sheltered and heated terrace is very pleasant even on cooler evenings.

+ Outdoor kitchen with BBQ 🍽🐟🥗
+ (heated) Jacuzzi
+ Walk to the beach in 5 minutes
+ We speak English and know the area
+ Beach package available (Beach umbrella) 🏖
+ Sea view and beautiful surroundings
+ Walking distance to restaurants and supermarket

The space
Villa with 5 double bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 kitchens + a fully equipped outdoor kitchen, jacuzzi, covered terrace, BBQ and outdoor shower within walking distance of Sa Riera, one of the most beautiful beaches of the Costa Brava.

What makes our house unique is that it is surrounded by terraces. Everything is equipped for outdoor living: the outdoor kitchen even has a dishwasher!

During colder months the pati
neighborhood_overview:
The villa is built against the hills adjoining the sea. The terraces surrounding the house offer sea views. From the house is a staircase to the bottom of the village, allowing guests to walk down to the beach in a straight line.

Just before arriving at the beach one passes a row of terraces, of which our favorite, the red restaurant, offers great food for a very reasonable price. Try one of the dishes with fresh fish or "arròs" (the Catalan variant of the Spanish 'paella', prepared with rice from Pals, the next village) de marisc (with seafood).

neighborhood_overview: It is the lively Riells . Near the marina, harbor and beach . Ideal for callejar and shopping in the little shops offering everything or drink in one of the bars .
host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

name: Apartment Riells Blau D201
description:
The Riells blau apartments are located around 700m to the beach of Riells. The apartment complex has a large communal pool located in beautiful gardens with both plenty of sun and shade. The apartment complex is ideal for children as there is a childrens play area.
Our apartment is on the first floor and overlooks the pool. It consists of two bedrooms with double beds, and one bedroom with twin beds. A fully fitted open style kitchen with oven, electric hob, fridge/freezer, dishwasher and microwave. There is a separate shower room and utility room with washing machine.
The lounge and diner are combined and have a set of patio doors which open onto a large terrace/balcony which overlooks the communal gardens and to sit and watch the kids in the pool while enjoying a glass of wine in the shade! There is communal WiFi and Local TV and CD player, In the lounge there is a big sofa and easy chair to comfortably sit 6 people.
This is a large roomy apartment that sleeps 6

In the heart of the Empordà region, the town of Begur ,one of the most wonderful places on the Costa Brava. Bounded by the massif of Les Gavarres and the sea, with an area that extends inland, to the foot of the mountain and the other open to the most beautiful seafront of the coast, Begur, with the small town of Esclanyà and the coves that make it up, form a set and a unique landscape environment.
House located on the 2nd line of the sea, 50 m from SA TUNA beach. Splendid sea views.
CASA 8 PAX House on three floors:
Grown floor: entrance hall,
1 bathroom with polybanon / WC / bidet.
1 bedroom with double bed with direct access to the bathroom, sea views.
1 bedroom with 2 single beds overlooking the sea.

name: Casa Chifranca, Begur, Costa Brava
description:
Beautiful house for 8 people located in Residencial Begur, with garden and private pool.

The space
In the heart of the Empordà region, the town of Begur and its municipality form one of the most wonderful places on the Costa Brava. Bounded by the massif of Les Gavarres and the sea, with an area that extends inland to the foot of the mountain and the other open to the most beautiful seafront of the coast, the municipality of Begur, along with the small town of Esclanyà and the coves that make it up, form a set and a unique landscape environment.
Casa Chifranca is located in the Begur residential area, 2 km from the village and 3 km from Aiguablava cove and a supermarket 400m away. Very quiet, sunny location, 1000m2 garden with private pool.
The house is composed of:Living-dining room with TV and exit to the terrace
Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, washing machine, fridge and oven.
4 bedrooms
3 bathrooms
The villa has
neighborhood_overview: the Residencial Begur urbanization begins near the village extending between large tracts of pine forests. It is a very quiet both in winter and in summer while in summer you can enjoy the coolness produced by the trees that surround it. In the same area there are public swimming pool and tennis (extra) can also enjoy a tasty meal at the restaurant located at the entrance " La Galena".

The space

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
The best area of the Costa Brava. Tamariu is very relaxed, with only some excellent small restaurants animating the small bay.

People come from far away to taste the delicious paellas, fresh fish and seafood in front of the sea. A unique experience.

Tamariu has 2 small supermarkets, both selling fresh products: fruits, vegetables and meat, 2 bakeries, hairdressing, international press, shops and bars (some of them with free wifi).The region where Tamariu is situated is simply amazing. You have the best virgin beaches of the Costa Brava around, and if you go inland, most of the villages are medieval, declared historic-artistic monument. The walks around the coastal paths are also highly recommended, with secluded coves to be discovered.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very quiet zone, less than 10 minutes away (walking) from the beach, with an easy and flat access, in the middle of the comercial street.
It is a new neighborhood, very spacious and bright with parks and green areas al around.
Just a 2 minutes walk away from a big supermarket and a restaurant.
Four minutes away, is the beautiful comercial zone, with all kind of shops.
Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Wal
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

host_about:
Llançà és una petita vila mediterrània situada enmig d’un paisatge únic. Està envoltada per dos espais naturals protegits, el Parc Natural del Cap de Creus i el de l'Albera.
L’excel·lent oferta de petites platges i tranquil·les cales que ofereix Llançà, i la riquesa d’elements significatius de patrimoni cultural, des del megalític (amb dòlmens i restes prehistòriques) a restes significatives de l'arquitectura pre-romànica, fan de Llançà un destí ideal per unes vacances familiars plenes d’activitats. 
Us convidem a descobrir aquest meravellós poble de la costa brava i la  bellesa de les seves platges !!!

Quiet area, from the house you can walk to the supermarket. Open every day all year round. At 3.5 km you have Estartit the beach and at 3.5 km you have Torroella de Montgri.

Nice weekly markets, cities to visit Barcelona, Girona and Figueres.
Numerous nice old villages that you can visit, but also beautiful small bays.
Estartit has a large sandy beach that slowly goes into the depths, so ideal for children. There is also a large free car park near the beach. Estartit is known for diving around the Medes Islands, but you can practice all kinds of water sports there.

host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

neighborhood_overview:
L'Escala has a strategic location - everything is close. Girona, Roses, Cadaques - only 40-45 min; Figueres and Empuriabrava - 20min; Begur and Palamos - 30 min; Pals and Playa de Aro - 40 -50 min; Banyoles, Olot - 40 min - 1 hour. Overall, L'Escala is perfect for exploring the Costa Brava.
L´Escala offers various activities and areas which can be enjoyed with children. The beaches of L´Escala are characterised by their fine sand and shallow waters, which means that they are ideal for children. Also is a paradise for children, with children´s parks, go-karts and horse trip, as well as bicycle hire. What´s more, L´Escala offers a wide range of sports and adventure-based activities - discover new sensations!! Bicing in l´Escala is more than a simply renting bikes service. L'Escala Cycling is a public transport service. It is practical, sustainable and easy to use. Tour and enjoy the l'Escala region free from air and noise pollution. A walk along El Camí Forestal between l´Escala
host_about:
ES 
Apreciado Huésped:
Somos Aleksandra, Stela, Raquel y Judith (K3HOMES) y nos dedicamos a alquiler turístico.
Nosotras vamos a ayudarle a pasar sus mejores vacaciones con nuestra agencia.  Nuestra empresa se ha construido alrededor de las necesidades de nuestros clientes. Tratamos a nuestros clientes como nos gustaría que otros nos tratasen a nosotros.  Nosotras trabajamos con el placer y el optimismo. Nuestro trabajo, nuestro entusiasmo y nuestra profesionalidad son la garantía de prosperidad y satisfacción de nuestros clientes.
¡Esperamos que vendrá a visitarnos y le agradecemos de antemano por ser nuestro invitado!
Atentamente,
Familia K3HOMES

FR
Cher hôte:
Nous sommes Aleksandra, Stela, Raquel et Judith  (K3HOMES) et nous travaillons avec location de vacances.
Nous allons vous aider à passer vos meilleures vacances avec notre agence. Notre société est construite autour des besoins de nos clients. Nous traitons nos clients comme nous aimerions être traités. Nous travaillons avec plaisir et optimisme.  Notre travail, notre enthousiasme et le professionnalisme sont les garants de la prospérité et de la satisfaction de nos clients.
Nous espérons que vous viendrez nous rendre visite et nous vous remercions à l'avance pour être notre invité!
Famille K3HOMES

EN
Hello!
We are Aleksandra, Stela, Raquel and Judith (K3HOMES) and we are dedicated to tourist rentals.
We will help you to spend your best holidays with our agency. The agency is located in the center of L'Escala. Our mission is to give to our customers the opportunity to spend their vacation without worry.
We work for you to rest. We strive to offer the best service to our clients and to our property owners.
Our company is built around the needs of our customers. The owners and guests define the direction of our development. We treat our customers as we would like to be treated.
We hope you will come to visit us and thank you in advance for being our guest!
Warmest wishes,
K3OMES family

RU
Здравствуйте уважаемые гости,
Меня зовут Александра и я менеджер по турестической аренде.
Я и мои коллеги Stela и Paula (K3HOMES) будем помогать Вам провести свой лучший отдых с нашим агентством. Наше агентство находится в центре Л'Эскала. Наша миссия состоит в том, чтобы дать нашим клиентам возможность провести свой отдых без каких-либо забот.
Мы работаем для того, чтобы Вы отдыхали. 
Наш бизнес и наша компания построены вокруг потребностей наших клиентов. Мы относимся к нашим клиентам так, как хотели бы, чтобы другие относились к нам. 
Мы работаем с удовольствием и оптимизмом. Мы верим в себя, в будущее и активно работаем для улучшения нашего сервиса. Наш труд, наш энтузиазм и наш професионализм являются гарантией нашего собственного процветания и служат 100% гарантией удовлетворенности для наших клиентов. 
Мы надеемся, что Вы придете к нам и благодарим Вас заранее, за то, что Вы являетесь нашем гостем!
С уважением и наилучшими пожеланиями,
Семья K3HOMES

name: Sleep & Stay deluxe aptmt old town
description:
Make your visit to Girona memorable staying in this fantastic deluxe apartment that is overlooking the main square of the town hall, Placa del Vi and on walking distance of all shops, restaurants and Jewish quarter.

We are looking forward hosting you in our beautiful medieval city!

The space
The apartment is beautifully decorated, with a spacious open dining, kitchen and living room with a super relaxing modern seating area featuring windows and balconies that overlook one of the main squares of the old town, Barri Vell.
The kitchen is recently renovated with all appliances needed and has plenty of kitchen wear. There's a Dolce Gusto coffee machine, oven, microwave, dishwasher, air-con and washing machine. In the living room there is a sofa bed for an extra 3rd and 4th guest.
There is one spacious double bedroom with a kingsize bed (160x200m) and lots of wardrobe space. The mattress is off a high quality, purchased in 2021 We provide high
neighborhood_overview: Located in Plaza del Vi,  this is the center of all cultural activities in Girona.  You'll have all markets, shops and landmarks walking 2 min away from the building.
host_about:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lot’s of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

That’s why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a week’s stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

description:
Enjoy everything Girona has to offer: culture, museums, great food, beautiful beaches, and world-famous cycling from a home base that’s conveniently located and ready to welcome your family or group.

There are three bedrooms, one with a queen size bed and two smaller bedrooms that each have two singles that can be put together if you like and one bathroom with a shower and heated floor. The living room has a fireplace for the winter months to keep you warm and cozy. The kitchen has everyth...

The space
The apartment overlooks the Girona Cathedral and the trees of the San Daniel Valley, and you can enjoy the spectacular views from either the balcony or the private rooftop terrace. There is a barbecue, you can park for FREE in front of the building and there is air-conditioning and a fire place for the winter months. It is very calm with only the sounds of the birds and bells from the cathedral below. There is a big entrance, which is perfect to bring up

name: Historic Girona  apartment
description:
The space
Rent for days, for weeks or weekends an apartment fully equipped and independent for up to 4 people.
The beautiful and comfortable loft rented furnished. It is located right in the heart of historic downtown and beside the most emblematic spaces and buildings of Girona: the Cathedral, the Jewish Call (Jewish Quarter of Girona) and houses overhanging the river Onyar.
Also 5 minutes walk from the nightlife, perfect for having a nightcap. It also offers free public parking 3 minutes away.

The apartment is equipped with TV, washing machine, fully equipped kitchen (microwave, fridge, toaster ...) you have everything you need to cook.
To sleep has a double room with a comfortable and spacious bed 150 cm x 200 cm and a sofa bed for two in the dining room.
Bathroom with shower, available for private use. Sheets and towels included.

I live just a few minutes of this apartment and I will be available at all times to help and assist

name: Apartment near the beach
description:
Completely equiped apartment of 80 m2 aprox. with lot of space, fresh and very luminouse. View to the beach of S'Agaro, elevator, pool and garden on the buiding, private parking and only 3 min. by car to the shops and the beach. Cradle and chair o.d.

The space
The apartment has about 80 square meters and is fully equipped for an unforgettable stay on the Costa Brava. The kitchen is fully equipped with washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, oven, gas hob, microwave and fridge-freezer.
There is a Flat TV and DVD, and a PlayStation upon request.
There are two separate bedrooms, a room with double bed and the other one with two single beds. One bathroom is inside of a bedroom and one bathroom in the hallway.
There is a large dining area by the living room and a bright terrace with overlooking to the sea and the beach of S'Agaro, Playa de Aro and Sant Feliu de Guixols.

Guest access
The apartment has a community pool and garden and a
neighborhood_overview:
S'Agaró is situated between Playa de Aro and Sant Feliu de Guixols, two very idyllic and typical towns on the Costa Brava in the province of Girona. Playa de Aro is ideal for shopping and has a lot of brand shops, spend a day at the beach or go for drinks and dancing at night.
The apartment is located just 30 min. from Girona and 40 min. from Figueras, two capitals with a special charm and great cultural value.

name: The Loft @lovelyhousesdiana
description:
El loft es un pequeño refugio para descansar, desconectar y relajarse. Un espacio único de planta baja con un diseño minimalista. Es un solo espacio para ser vivido con intimidad. Es el lugar perfecto para disfrutar en cualquier momento del día.
Más información y fotos @lovelyhousesdiana

The space
Más información y fotos @lovelyhousesdiana
Dispone de una cocina americana totalmente equipada, el dormitorio está separado del resto de la vivienda por una cortina de madera blanca que da intimidad, con cama doble de látex más un topper de 160cm, un baño con ducha y un gran patio privado con amplias vistas a los campos.
Es el lugar perfecto para disfrutar en cualquier momento del día.
COMODIDADES
Capacidad para 2 personas y un bebé

Wifi gratuito, Sábanas y toallas, Secador de pelo y tabla de planchar, Lavadora, Bola para lavar ecológica, Tendedero, Frigorífico y congelador, Vitrocerámica, Horno, Microondas, Aspiradora, Ollas, Sart
neighborhood_overview:
El loft está emplazado en un camino a 2 kilómetros de Sant Jordi Desvalls. Es un lugar donde reina la tranquilidad y el silencio. Un precioso paisaje de interior, rodeado de campos, huertos y bosques donde disfrutar de agradables paseos.
A escasos kilómetros de la casa se encuentran las playas más bonitas de la Costa Brava. A tan sólo 20 minutos en coche de l'Estartit, i l'Escala, y a 25 minutos de Girona. También podrás visitar numerosos pueblos con encanto. En la casa encontraríes la Guia de l'Empordà y recomandaciones.
En el pueblo de Sant Jordi Desvalls hay un pequeño supermercado de pueblo abierto todos los días; incluso los domingos.
host_about:
Nuestra familia siempre trabajó en el campo y nuestra ilusión de dar nueva vida a antiguos espacios utilizados para el ganado y sus cultivos nos llevaron a construir estas magníficas casas, respetando siempre el entorno y los lugares, con materiales honestos y de calidad.. 
Estaremos encantados de daros la bienvenida y explicaros lo que creemos es lo mejor y más bonito de la zona del Empordà y el Gironès.

name: Villa vue mer piscine sécurisée
description:
Villa 12/14 pers. Indépendante, très spacieuse avec décoration moderne, située dans le quartier très calme de Sa Riera. Magnifique jardin plat (très rare) avec piscine sécurisée. Plage à 5mn à pied. 5 chambres et 4 SdB. Parking 2/3 voitures.

The space
Magnifique villa idéale pour les séjours en famille ou entre amis, au coeur d'un lieu très privilégié de la Costa Brava réputé pour ses calanques, ses plages et ses golfs, Elle comporte de nombreux couchages pour accueillir les visiteurs, au sein d'une décoration moderne et chaleureuse. Les pièces à vivre sont spacieuses et parfaitement équipées pour des vacances de rêve.
Au RDC on trouve un grand salon avec cheminée, une salle a manger, une cuisine américaine équipée et deux suites parentales avec leurs salles de bain privatives. Toutes les pièces ont vue sur mer et ouvrent sur une large terrasse en partie couverte qui vous permettra de vous protéger du soleil aux heures les plus chaudes de la journée dans u
neighborhood_overview:
La maison est à 2,5km de Begur, charmant village médiéval avec de nombreux bons restaurants / bars et petites boutiques chics et beaucoup d'ambiance en saison.
Begur dessert de nombreuses criques toutes plus belles les unes que les autres (Sa Tuna, Aiguablava, Tamariu, Aiguafreda, ...). La très longe plage de Pals située à 2km permet de nombreuses activités nautiques : planche à voile, kite-surf, catamaran, ski-nautique, etc.

La villa est située dans un quartier très calme à 5/10mn à pied de la plage de Sa Riera. Un escalier permet de descendre à pied à la plage de manière très sécurisée, en particulier pour les enfants qui peuvent être ainsi indépendants.

L'environnement est d'une grande beauté naturelle, avec de nombreuses activités possibles comme la plongée, le tennis et le golf (Golf International d'Emporda, Golf de Pals, etc). C’est aussi une destination très appréciée des randonneurs toute l’année.
Par ailleurs, la richesse culturelle et gastron

- What to do ??? Enjoy the Beaches, the Nightlife, and the Shopping !!!
Also rich natural, Cultural Heritage, and interesting events !!!


- Enjoy the BEACHES: Beaches like Lloret, Fenals, Sa Boadella, Santa Cristina or Canyelles make this town the best place to spend the holidays in the sun of the Costa Brava.

- NIGHTLIFE: night of Lloret de Mar is ideal for live experiences: dance, enjoy a cocktail, try your luck at the casino, go to a concert on the beach.

- SHOPPING: walk around the trendy shops of the old part of town, or stroll through the lively streets as street or San Pere de la Vila. Singular spaces, unusual sites, cliffs, beautiful walkways, small inhospitable corners.

host_about:
1) Me encanta hacer fotos de Farmacias Antiguas, y comprar aparamenta antigua de Farmacia y Medicina en Anticuarios, Mercadillos y Rastros.

2) Me entusiasman los coches antiguos, aunque no la velocidad.

3) Los relojes me han llamado siempre la atención: cuanto más originales y fuera de lo común: mejor !!!

4) Me licencié en Farmacia en la Universidad de Barcelona.

5) He estado trabajando en la Indústria Farmacéutica durante 15 años.

6) Alojo visitantes en la ciudad de Barcelona, en la Costa Brava (Lloret de Mar y Palamós), y en el Valle de Camprodón junto a las pistas de ski Vallter2000 (Llanars).

name: 13 Calle Santa Maria In the heart of old Cadaqués
description:
In the heart of old Cadaqués, between the sea, 100 meters away, and Santa Maria Church, with its baroque altarpiece 23 m high, this family house can accommodate up to 10 people. Built on two floors, it has a large patio where between sun and shade you can have lunch and take a nap. On the second floor, a bay window overlooking the Riba Pitxot with its famous arcade painted by Dali, Picasso and many other painters who made Cadaqués their place of inspiration.

The space
This is an old house bought by my family in the 1950s when fresh water arrived by tanker. The current kitchen is installed in the old cistern. We tried to maintain the house in its original appearance by equipping it with a kitchen and modern bathrooms.

Guest access
The house is entirely up to you.

Other things to note
It is not possible to reach the house directly by car.
We advise you to park at Port-Alguer while you carry your luggage inside.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in the old Cadaqués next to the Santa Maria church to visit for its altarpiece, near the town hall where often floats the Catalan flag and offers a beautiful view of the whole bay. This area is full of craft shops and small restaurants. The beach of Port-Alguer is a hundred meters where Ribat Pixot is famous for its arch and its view of the church and its tapas bar.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is really well located, in a very centric zone but at the same time very quiet.
Less than a minute walking you can find the beach, restaurants, supermarkets and more.
Just 2 minutes away you can find the commercial area where is really hard not to stop and look at the nice shops.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk around the comercial area, full of little shops, incredible tours to the mountain, bike rides, ship to
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.

name: El Xiprer, Biert, Canet d’Adri (prov.of Girona)
description:
El Xiprer is a place to relax and enjoy its surroundings weather you bike, hike or rest with your family. An energetically autonomous house, 25 minutes away from Girona, in the heart of the Biert Valley under the Rocacorba mountain. This farmhouse is in the middle of the woods, remote area but 25 minutes from Girona, 45 minutes from la Costa Brava, 35 minutes from Banyoles and 1h25 min from Barcelona. El Xiprés is in the middle of the forest, great for a driving adventure if you have a jeep.

The space
The house, El Xiprés de Can Soler is a XIX Century Catalan Masia that used to be a stable. The Catalan vault, its 100 hundred year's old stones and the enormous wood beams define the place's architecture. The house has three rooms, two bathrooms, kitchen, living room and dining room. There is a small balcony with a private garden as well as a barbecue, a fireplace and access to the pool shared with the family. Pool; Children have to be supervised while swimming a
neighborhood_overview: We live in a remote area, we have several neighbours, we are not alone, even though it seems like it. This location is unique, Rocacorba is an hour and half hiking trip away, beautiful view of Girona, Banyoles, the Golf of Roses (the Mediterranean Sea). Canet d'Adri (5-10 minutes away by car) has a waterfall and natural pool and there are several restaurants in the area. Banyoles and the lake (“L’estany”) are 30 minutes away by car; La Garrotxa, a hiking and cultural paradise with medieval villages is 25 minutes away; La Costa Brava, its picturesque fishing villages and beautiful beaches are 35-40 minutes away; The Catalan Pyrenees are 1h 30 minutes away; The French border (north) and the beautiful city of Barcelona (south) are 1h 20 minutes away.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the old part of town, just 2 minutes away from the beach and high quality restaurants.
One minute away you will find the church plaza, where you can enjoy nice meals with a quiet and relaxing atmosphere, at the same time your kids play at the plaza without danger.
Just 2 minutes away, you will find a little supermarket and the commercial zone, where is difficult not to stop and watch the beautiful shops.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go to the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rug
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

The space
Our home is located in Rupià, a beautiful medieval village that combines the best of the past with the best of today. Enjoy it!
The house preserves the village wall and has 3 bathrooms, 3 bedrooms, interior patio, equipped kitchen, laundry room, dining room, and 3 living rooms.
It also has a large terrace. All this divided in three floors.
The house has been recently remodeled. It is within the village, in a very quiet area surrounded by nature. The bells of the village can be clearly heard.
It has a fully equipped kitchen with oven, fridge, dishwasher and microwave, and a laundry room with washing machine and dryer.
It also has 3 equipped double bedrooms. As well as the bathrooms. There is a full bathroom, and two toilets.
In the patio there is a shower to clean and refresh you

The space

neighborhood_overview:
This area of the coast of Costa Brava is just beautiful! I have traveled all over the world and this area is hard to beat!
There are many things to see and do in this area including most types of water sports, boat trips, water park, go karts, horse riding, cycling, sky diving (wind tunnel also available) in Empuriabrava plus much more.
Out of season it is very quiet and a superb location for walking.
If you like walking then it's perfect to enjoy the stunning scenery along the coastal path or up into the national park of Cap de Creus or take a boat trip along the coast round to Cadaques which is really worth while.

You can walk to the sandy cove of Palangrers (7 mins), Canyelles Petites (10-15 mins), Almadrava (20-30 mins) or Roses main beach and town in under 15 minutes. If you want to hike further you can walk to many other coves along the coastal path including Cala Montjoi, Cala Joncols, walk to Cadaques or even further afield time permitting!
It i
host_about:
Hi, I love to travel although do not do enough of it nowadays! I like to think that our guests have the best experience in our accommodations, that they have everything they need and a very comfortable stay.
This area is fantastic to explore and we do all we can to make sure you enjoy it as much as we do. We have lived her for 18 years+!
I hope we meet soon!

name: Sleep & Stay Duplex apt in Old Town
description:
Cozy city apartment, divided over two levels with one bedroom. Beautifully decorated, to make you feel at home in Girona straight away! Located close to the Sant Feliu church in Calle Barca.

The space
Cozy city apartment, divided over two levels with one bedroom. Beautifully decorated, to make you feel at home in Girona straight away! Located close to the Sant Feliu church in Calle Barca.

This beautifully apartment is located on the third floor. The apartment has high ceilings and has a bright and spacious living space on the first level. There is an open kitchen, with an open bar to the big dining table suitable for 6 guests. There is a sleeping sofa for an extra 2 guests and a cot available on demand. On the second level there is a bathroom with a bath, a little office area and main bedroom. This bedroom is not on the main street side, so a nice and quit room for a good nights rest after a long day in Girona’s old town!

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lot’s of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

That’s why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a week’s stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

name: Loft con encanto cerca de Girona "Immaguesthouse"
description:
Ven a disfrutar de este pequeño apartamento privado de 40 m2, relájate con la chimenea de leña y desconecta. Ideal para parejas.Tienes barbacoa , aire acondicionado para el verano y piscina compartida. Hay wifi en toda la casa y podrás aparcar el coche delante de casa sin ningún problema.El apartamento se encuentra en la planta baja de mi casa en una zona residencial muy tranquila y bien comunicada, a 15" en coche de Girona a 10" de Besalú y 5" de Banyolas.
Nº Registro HUTG-020565

The space
Este acogedor apartamento te permitirá sentirte como en casa consta de una amplia cocina-comedor, salón con un sofa y dos butacas, chimenea de leña, aire acondicionado, calefacción cama doble de 1,80x2, dos armarios, lavabo y ducha.
Solo tendrás que llevar el equipaje.
Hay todo los utensilios necesarios de cocina: tostadora, exprimidor, batidora, picadora, cafetera, microondas... también encontraréis aliños, especies y café .
En el baño dispon
neighborhood_overview:
Lo que mas me gusta de donde vivo es que estoy lo bastante lejos del ajetreo y tráfico de la ciudad, pero muy cerca de todo. Todos los servicios (supermercados, farmacias, tiendas, restaurantes, bares,etc...) los tienes a 5 minutos en coche.
Es una zona residencial muy tranquila. Con una plaza delante de casa y sin problemas para aparcar.
Hay un Hostal que tiene servicio de bar y restaurante a 1 minuto a pie de casa.
Para hacer las compras puedes ir a Cornella del Terri que hay un pequeño supermercado, carnicería, verdulería, panadería, farmácia y dos bancos "La CAIXA" y Banco Popular se encuentra a unos 800m de casa (mejor en coche). La otra opción es ir a comprar en Banyoles, esta a 3km, 5minutos en coche. Donde encontraras todos los supermercados en el mismo lugar ( Mercadona, Aldi, Dia, Lidl, Bon Preu,etc ....)
En 10 minutos estas en el lago de Banyoles donde podrás relajarte, pasear y respirar tranquilamente.
A 15 minutos estas en el centro de Girona,
host_about:
Tengo 44 años, dos hijas estupendas y  dos gatos .
Soy positiva y alegre. Me gusta hacer deporte y todo lo relacionado con la salud.
Intercambiar experiencias con otras personas me encanta.
Cada día es una oportunidad y cada oportunidad una experiencia.

name: Apartament Lluna St. Feliu Guíxols
description:
Apartament en primera planta, amb terrasseta, tres habitacions (una de matrimoni, una doble i una individual). Disposa d'una sala d'estar-menjador amb llum natural i aire condicionat, una cuina ben equipada i un bany. Pàrquing privat a 90 metres. Es troba a 3 minuts de la platja.

The space
Apartament en primera planta que disposa de 3 habitacions i un bany. Disposa de pàrquing a 50 metres. Ideal per a famílies. Ben situat en la fantàstica localitat de Sant Feliu de Guíxols, a la Costa Brava. Cèntric. La cuina està ben equipada. Rentadora. A 3 min. del passeig del mar i a 3 min. de la preciosa platja de Sant Pol i S'Agaró, amb cotxe.

Mercat el diumenges molt concorregut, amples platges amb molts serveis. Port esportiu amb possibilitat de lloguer d'embarcacions d'oci o rutes marítimes per la Costa Brava fins a Tossa de Mar.

Apartament molt a prop de S'Agaró, Platja d'Aro (zona d'oci nocturn, shopping, bowling, multicines...) i Palamós.

This recently renovated house is located in a quiet area, 10 minutes walking to the Natural Park of Montgí and at the same time only 13 minutes walking to the beach of Riells in L'Escala. It is ideal for children! The Paseo de la Playa Riells offers a wide variety of shops, restaurants, entertainment places for children, supermarkets, water activities, etc.

Girona, Roses, Cadaques - only 40-45 min; Figueres and Empuriabrava - 20min; Begur and Palamos - 30 min; Pals and Playa de Aro - 40 -50 min; Banyoles, Olot - 40 min - 1 hour. Overall, L'Escala is perfect for exploring the Costa Brava.

name: Enginy Apartament 3-5 personas
description:
El apartamento se encuentra en el centro de Figueres, a menos de 500 metros del famoso Museo Dalí. Este apartamento está bien equipado y dispone de TV vía satélite y conexión a internet gratuita con cable y wifi.

The space
El apartamento dispone en su interior de dos plantas que se comunican por una escalera. La planta baja esta formada por una cocina completa con nevera, microondas y lavadora y una zona de estar independente con sofás cama y un baño completo con toallas y secador de pelo. En la parte superior hay otra habitación con un baño tambien completo.

Other things to note
Cualquier información turística sobre la zona se da.
Al llegar se debe pagar la tasa turística correspondiente a 0,50 céntimos de Euro por persona adulta y noche. La tasa turística se paga por un máximo de 7 noches si corresponde.

License number
HUTG-012467
neighborhood_overview:
El apartamento esta situado en la calle Tapis con esquina en la calle Caputxins. La calle Tapis comunica con la calle Perelada que es donde empieza el núcleo de tiendas de compras de la ciudad y el centro neuralgico con los museos, rambla, iglesia de Sant Pere, ...
A 400 metros se encuentra el fabuloso Museo Dalí.

Junto a la estación de Esqui La Masella, a 5 km del pueblo de Alp y a 12 de Puigcerdà, donde puedes encontrar todo lo que necesites, supermercados, farmacia, bares y restaurantes.

Lugar maravillosos para hacer excursiones por la montaña y respirar el aire de la montaña. Lugar muy tranquilo ideal para desconectar

name: Relax and feel Girona
description:
Estudio totalmente reformado, en pleno casco antiguo de Girona, entre el rio y la catedral a 5 minutos de todos los puntos de interes de la ciudad. Un espacio donde relajarse, sentir y descansar.

The space
Distribuido en dos espacios, tu decides si abrirlos o cerrarlos. Divididos por dos puertas correderas, mi consejo... no las cierres! Salón y cocina totalmente equipados, habitación con cama doble y escritorio con material de papelería por si te inspiras., baño y dos balcones al casco antiguo. El apartmento es soleado, con mucha luz y porticones con vidrios dobles. Dispone de calefacción, wifi, sábanas y toallas, Cafetera Dolche Gusto, café, lavadora, secador de pelo, plancha y productos mínimos necesarios para que la estancia no sea interrumpida.

Other things to note
Disponemos de parquing privado muy cerca del apartamento. Preguntanos si quieres que tu coche no duerma en la calle y descanse como tu. ( precio a parte )

Licen
neighborhood_overview: Una vez llegues, Laura, la anfitriona, te aconsejará sobre los mejores lugares donde ir según tus intenciones. Locales de copas, restaurantes, heladerias, creperias, parques, rincones tranquilos, los mejores lugares para ver las puestas de sol, rutas de montaña o playa, y algunas excursiones cerca de la ciudad.
host_about:
Hola! soy Jorge, Diseñador y Acrobata aéreo de profesión, dedico mi tiempo al arte, dirijo Onair, la primera escuela de danza aerea de España afincada en Barcelona. Me apasionan los colores, este año sobretodo el amarillo, soy detallista, impulsivo, obserbador, gran anfitrion y amigo de mi gente. Vivo con Julieta mi querida perra en Barcelona y nuestro estudio en Girona en pleno casco antiguo es nuestro refugio para el descanso, el paseo y el lugar donde nos inspiran historias nuevas.
Hemos decidido compartir con todos vosotros nuestro espacio para que podais disfrutar y sentir lo magnifico que es pasar unos dias en esta ciudad, rodeada de historia, entre las grandes montañas y las mejores playas. Si algo tiene Girona, es que enamora. 

Si quieres conocer más sobre mi y mi trabajo puedes entrar en este enlace, (Website hidden by Airbnb) , no hay mayor reflejo sobre mi que mi propio trabajo.

description:
Habitación luminosa, amplia y tranquila. En la que podrás disfrutar de descanso y relajación. Escucha el canto de los pajaritos y una brisa suave. El silencio te acoge en esta habitación tan especial. Un jardín, una biblioteca, una vía romana autentica y un museo de aceite te espera.

El baño es privado pero el acceso esta fuera de la habitación.
Atendemos personalmente a los huéspedes.
