name: Can Font Olives - Turisme rural
description:
Acogedora masía ampurdanesa, muy bien restaurada y equipada. Está situada a muy poca distancia de Banyoles, Girona y de las playas de la Costa Brava, por lo que permite hacer visitas culturales, rutas gastronómicas y numerosas actividades al aire libre.

Masía del siglo XVIII rodeada de jardín con piscina, bosques y campos de cultivo. La casa cuenta con cuatro habitaciones, todas con baño privado, y las estancias, que conservan los bonitos techos abovedados, están decoradas con un estilo rústico y elegante. La cocina abierta con el comedor y también la sala de estar cuentan con chimenea.

Cottage form the seventeenth century restored in 2015. The house is in a quiet area surrounded by nature.
It has 4 bedrooms with private bathrooms, kitchen, living room and large garden with pool.

Inside the house you will find: fully equipped kitchen, dining room, lounge (with TV, DVD and games) and common toilet on the ground floor.
In the first floor there a
neighborhood_overview: Can Font Olives está ubicada en el pequeño núcleo urbano de Olives, a ocho kilómetros de Vilademuls, en pleno Empordà. Su situación permite llegar rápidamente a Banyoles, en cuyo lago se puede hacer senderismo, ciclismo, remo y natación, y a Girona, donde se puede visitar su bonito centro histórico. También tiene fácil acceso a las playas de la Costa Brava, donde se pueden practicar deportes acuáticos y disfrutar de su gastronomía y de los excelentes vinos DO Empordà.
host_about:
Hello! We are a family of 5 that we reformed an old farm house, we hope that you love it and you enjoy very much the house in your holidays. 
The house smells holidays, nature, calm and comfort :)

Estem situats a Olives, Vilademuls. Pla de l'estany. 
Capacitat per 10 persones (4 habitacions amb bany privat)

name: CENTRIC APARTMENT NEAR BEACH TOSSA
description:
Beautiful and centric apartment, very close to the beach, at a very quiet zone.
Perfectly located, just 2 minutes walking to the beach and really close to shops, supermakets, restaurants and more.

The space
The apartment has wifi included in the price. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, dinning room, big kitchen and a terrace where you can see a little part of the sea.
Fully equipped with all the necessary amenities: dishwasher, terrace furniture, comfortable matresses and more. This will make your stay really comfortable.
Wonderful awning at the terrace, with microperforated material, will give you protection from the sun, but won’t bother the views.
AC in the entire apartment.
There is room for 8 people, with the following distribution:
-Bedroom with 1 double bed.
-Bedroom with 1 double bed.
-Bedroom with 2 single beds.
-Double sofabed in the living room.
We have cribs and high chairs. Please request it in advance
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is very well located, in a very centric zone and at the same time very quiet.
Less than 2 minutes walking you have the beach, restaurants, supermarkets and much more.
Two minutes away you have the commercial area, where is really hard not to stop and check all the beautiful shops

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk around the comercial area, full of little shops, incredible tours to the mountain, bike rides, ship tours
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: A lovely double room in designer flat
description:
Habitació doble en un pis amb encant i personalitat. Enorme terrassa de 70 m2 i petita de 18m2 on podràs esmorzar o pendre una copa relaxant al vespre. Això sí, recorda que per arribar a aquest oasi has de pujar a peu, no tenim ascenssor.

The space
La nostra terrassa és única a la zona. Gaudeix d'una intimitat total. És ideal per a relaxar-se després d'un dia d'activitat, llegir, perdre una copa i fins i tot gaudir d'una barbacoa. També és un bon lloc per a començar el dia, amb un bon esmorzar!
Això sí penseu que no hi ha ascensor.

Guest access
Pots demanar-nos l'esmorzar bio, per un petit increment,si ho prefereixes perquè seguim aquest estil de vida, si no igualment et cuidarem!
El bany està separat del servei, la qual cosa resulta molt pràctic.
Si vens amb bicis i ens avises la podràs guardar en edifici proper, ja que el nostre és un edifici antic i no disposa de parquing.

Other things to note
En ca

name: Beautiful apartment in the old town
description:
Completely renovated respecting the original design of the spaces , the apartment perfectly combines the comfort and luxury of modernity with the charm of the old items .

The space
Spacious , comfortable, quiet and with a special charm, this apartment is located in a traditional building of the old town of Girona . Completely refurbished to offer all the comforts of today's architecture and design, has a modern kitchen, two bathrooms and two fully equipped rooms.

The hydraulic mosaic floors , its high ceilings , the classic woodwork doors and windows, provide all the spaces special warmth and personality.

Both the master bedroom which has its own bathroom , and the double room have natural light. The first and the living room have large windows that open onto a balcony above the Rambla .

Guest access

heating
fridge
kitchen
microwave oven
washer
Hair dr
neighborhood_overview: On the Rambla de Girona, one of the most beautiful and popular city streets full of shops , bars and restaurants ; the apartment is located in the old town , 5 minutes walk from the Cathedral, the Jewish quarter and 10 minutes from the ancient city Wall. Also, being next to the river that separates the old part of the new part of the city , its just a 1-minute walk from the picturesque houses of Onyar river and the main shopping streets.
host_about: Our only objective is to ensure that your stay is even better than you imagined. We are Oscar from Barcelona and Maria from Girona, we married in 2013 and we have 2 wonderful children. Also, together we started Flateli, a little group of properties we love to manage to host our guests and make them feel like home. Ask anything you need and we will make our best to get it for you!

name: LOFT Can Barraca en Figueres Centro
description:
Situat al centre de la ciutat de Figueres, l’apatament CAN BARRACA LOFT és una antiga impremta avui rehabilitada com a loft amb capacitat per a 8 persones.

The space
Apartamento estilo loft situado en el centro de Figueres, a 500m de la Rambla y el Museo Dalí. Se encuentra muy cerca de las bonitas playas de la Costa Brava (16Km). Dispone de TV, WIFI, toallas, y todos los utensilios básicos de cocina y baño.

Ubicado en una antigua imprenta, el local ha sido recientemente reformado para convertirse en un alojamiento muy práctico y cómodo en el centro de Figueres. La decoración, provista tanto de mobiliario nuevo como de muebles antiguos restaurados, crea una mezcla que garantiza una estancia especial y con encanto.

El apartamento, de 85m2, ofrece un gran espacio común comedor-sala de estar, cocina y baño nuevos y completamente equipados, y dos habitaciones: una de matrimonio con cama doble (para 2pax), y otra con 2 literas (para 4pax). Dispon

host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

name: La Posada
description:
Ihre Urlaubstage fernab vom Massentourismus müssen kein Traum bleiben. Die Landschaft verzaubert durch tradidioneller Architektur und ständig wandelbarer Atmosphäre von Landschaft zu Licht. In unserem individuellen Ferienhaus genießen Sie alle Vorzüge des Dorfes und die Ruhe abseits der Städte. Touristische "Magnete" wie Gerona, Cadaques, Barcelona und viele andere Orte bleiben in schnell ereichbaren Nähe.
Mit Auto sind Sie in 5 Min am großen Strand und flaniermeile verschiedener Dörfer.

The space
Regenerieren Sie sich bei uns , um den Alltag danach relaxter entgegentreten zu können. Und - so wie es Ihnen gefällt - Grillen Sie draußen alle regionale Produkte. Die wunderbar große Terrase mit Ausblick auf die herrliche Natur bringt Erholung vom Alltag, Entspannung und Gelassenheit. Geneßen Sie Ihren Urlaub so richtig.
Auch für Biker ist es ein idealer Standpunkt für Touren bis hin zu den Pyrenäen.

Guest access
Das Ferienhaus st

name: BEACHFRONT APARTMENT in TOSSA
description:
Nice apartment, very close to the beach, with beautiful sea views.
Excellently located just 1 minut walk from the beach, and very close to the shops, supermarkets, restaurants.

The space
The apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, living room, kitchen and balcony equipped with furniture, where you can enjoy magnificent views.
It has ability to sleep up to 4 people, with the following distribution:
Bedroom with 1 double bed
Bedroom with 2 single beds
We have cribs and high charis if needed. Please requested it in advance. Costs 25€ for the hole stay.

Guest access
ADDITIONAL SERVICES

- Cot and high chair.
- Cleaning during the stay
- Personalized pick up at the airport, train station, bus, etc ...
- Get rental of portable wifi routers for use outside the accommodation.
- Excursions or personalized transfers.
- Recommendations of unique experiences, with local people
- HIGHLIGHT A
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is very well located, right next to the beach, supermarket, restaurants.
In less than 3 minutes walk find, most central area with all kinds of shops, banks.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go to the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk around the commercial area, full of little shops, incredible tours to the mountain, bike rides, ship tours, visit all the little and hidden beaches around, and so many other things we can recommend, according to your needs.
For yo
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

neighborhood_overview:
The Old Town of Girona is considered the historical center of the city, bounded by the medieval city wall, part of which was demolished in the nineteenth century, and is where we find the most important historic and cultural attractions of the city.
The houses on the river Onyar are a sight which must be enjoyed from one of the bridges crossing the river, and we approach the Jewish quarter from the Rambla. In the promenade bustle of visitors and locals, strolling, shopping, resting live.
Once entered in the Jewish Quarter, one of the best preserved in Spain, we can enjoy the historic legacy of the city, letting lose through the narrow streets and right steps, discovering corners, gardens, monuments and churches, between steps. The Cathedral, the church of Sant Feliu, the Arab Baths, Sant Pere de Galligants.
host_about:
Hola!!

Soy Anna, una gironina enamorada de su pequeña ciudad.

Vivo en Girona y trabajo en una tienda de antigüedades situada a los pies de nuestra magnifica catedral. Gracias a mi trabajo puedo pasear a diario por estas calles que esconden tantas historias apasionantes.

Soy una amante del arte y de la decoración.

Espero os guste el apartamento que ofrezco que he decorado con tanto cariño.

Os espero pronto!

Hello,

I am Anna and I am in love with my marvelous city.

I live in Girona and I work in an antic shop situated just in front of the Cathedral. 
Thanks to my job I can walk everyday through the streets that hide so many exciting stories.

I am an art lover and I love decorating.

I do hope you like the apartment which I have decorate with so much love

I see you soon!

description:
Apartment in a quiet area, with swimming pool

The space
Apartment located in the area of "El Golfet" in Calella de Palafrugell.


It is suitable for 4 people and is located at a 10 minutes walk from the Golfet beach and 5 minutes drive from the village center.

(The beach of El Golfet is connected by a path at sea front with the center).

The apartment is part of a small and familiar community with garden and pool.

It is a first floor with some sea view, and has got a living-dining room with exit to a large terrace, large and RENEWED kitchen, 1 double bedroom, 1 twin bedroom and 1 bathroom.

To access the community area you have to cross a small cul-de-sac (no traffic), since the community consists of 2 parts separated by this street.

Parking in communal garage.

Community WIFI. We are not responsible for the speed or proper functioning of the system.

Water restrictions: We i
neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.

neighborhood_overview: Es una zona muy tranquila.
host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

description:
La verdad no se como definir mi casa , convertimos un granero lleno de gallinas en una casa adorable, situada a 3 minutos del centro de Castalló d'Empuries y con tanta oferta lúdico, deportiva y cultural que es imposible resumir aqui.

The space
Casa abierta com diferentes zonas de relax, muy recomendable para todo tipo de viajeros, familias, turistas o simplemente pasar unos días de ocio y relax, en una zona tranquila y silenciosa. situada a 3 minutos a pie del un centro histórico que es la envidia de la comarca.

Guest access
La casa tiene dos cuartos de baño uno en el piso inferior y uno con bañera en el superior , equipada con todas las comodidades. las zonas comunes son super amplias con diferentes zonas de relax para que todos encuentren su ambiente. Dispone de lavadora y lavaplatos.Juegos de mesa, películas y musica. Wifi y conectividad con tv

Nosotros y nuestros hijos estamos muy acostumbra
neighborhood_overview:
Situada en una calle muy tranquila de Castelló d'Empúries precioso pueblo medieval en la comarca de l'Alt Empordà, tierra del gran pintor Salvador Dalí y sus tres joyas el "Teatre Museu Dalí", "la Casa de Portlligat" y el "Castell a Púbol" donde poder conocer toda la obra de genial artista. Sus playas de enormes arenales a calas preciosas y escarpadas, su actividad cultural, lúdica y deportiva es constante sobre todo en verano.
Famoso su parque natural "Aiguamolls del Empordà" naturaleza pura.
host_about: Somos una familia de 4 miembros que nos gusta la vida tranquila i familiar.

name: Holiday apartment 150m from beach
description:
Apartment situated 150m to the golden sand beach of SA RIERA with waterfront restaurants and shops. 50m to Supermarket and restaurants,
2km to the charming historic town of BEGUR with its outstanding choice of restaurants, bars, cafes and shops.

The space
The apartment is spacious, bright and airy and has a large terrace at the front, as well as a communal courtyard at the back of the building.
It is ideal for 2 couples or a couple with 2 well behaved kids.

Guest access
It is located on the first floor of the building, so there are a few steps to access the apartment. This means it can be suitable for a elderly person that can walk up a few steps. The apartment itself is all on one level.

Other things to note
The apartment doesn't come with parking. There are parking spaces all around but they tend to get busy during the summer. 150m from the house there is a car park that costs 2€ per day and always has sp
neighborhood_overview:
Sa Riera is one of the largest beaches in Begur, and the closest to the town.
It is excellently located, with the sheltered Port d’Es Pi cove to the right, and the Rei cove to the left . Sa Riera takes its name from a stream dividing the beach in half, it has kept its traditional character with low rise buildings and the pine covered surrounding hills. It offers a range of different sports activities and tourist services.
There are various bars and restaurants to enjoy the gastronomy of the region, and also a few shops, including a supermarket.
From Sa Riera one can walk the costal trail to the beaches of Platja del Racó and Pals.
host_about:
Originally from Barcelona, but I lived many years in the UK and for a few years now I’ve settled down with my husband Richard and our three grown up sons in Besalú, just north of Girona.
I love walking in the nature, practicing yoga and pilates, healthy food and crafts. I adore little villages with cobbled pavements and narrow streets, and balconies full of flowers.  But I also need regular doses of city life!  Shops, bars, cafes, busy streets, and lively markets.
My favourite season is spring, I like it hot and sunny! I love the smell of freshly cut grass and my favourite colour is the tourquoise green-blue of the Costa Brava waters!
I consider myself a social and friendly person, love meeting new people and discovering new places.
I will be delighted to welcome you!

name: Schoenblick Residence
description:
The apartment offers a panoramic view across the bay and is located outside the hustle and bustle of Cadaqués. However, it is only 8 minutes to town centre and beaches as well as a 15 minutes walk to Dali's house in Port Lligat. Hiking trails towards Cap de Creus are also within easy reach. The apartment was extensively renovated and modernized in January 2020.

The space
For more than 30 years our visits to Cadaqués were, above all, about relaxation. This is why the bright apartment above the roofs of Cadaqués is furnished in Mediterranean style and invites you to relax and unwind. And if a little work should be necessary, you can retire to our desk with a splendid view of the bay.

Guest access
We want our guests to feel just as at home in our place as we do. That's why you get access to the entire living space.

Other things to note
We have upgraded several rooms in January 2020, including the kitchen and one of the
neighborhood_overview:
The Neighborhood is quiet and right at the edge of town, above the rooftops of downtown Cadaqués. You’ll be able to enjoy some nice views - but you’ll also have to be prepared to walk uphill after enjoying a day at the beach ;)

Smaller shops and a pharmacy are right around the corner. The larger supermarkets are downtown.
host_about: My name is Sebastian. I am a trained Journalist and Organisational Developer, currently working in the field of international development cooperation. I’m a truly avid traveler and cosmopolitan. In the past years I have lived in South Africa, Ethiopia, Denmark and in my home country, Germany. Over the last few years I have traveled extensively, with Airbnb serving as a great resource to find accommodations and local hosts. Also, it led me to become a Host myself. If you wish to spend some time in beautiful Cadaqués, please feel free to contact me!

neighborhood_overview: It is a very quiet area at any time of the year and has easy access to the beaches and the village center. It is idel to make life in the open air: sea sports, hiking, jogging and cycling tours. Ideal also for families with children. The weather is very good most of the year. In summer you can also enjoy the cultural offerings and in autumn and winter is ideal to discover the typical fiestas of the Empordà and walk along the roads of round. It is advisable to come at Christmas and the end of the year where you can contemplate the sunrise in Cap de Creus. In January you can see the low tides with a wonderful silver sea.

name: Cadaques, spacious apt. - sea view, terrace, wifi.
description:
Very well equipped big apartment, nicely decorated and located in a very quiet residential area of Cadaques. Only five minutes walk to the village center. Just 200 meter from one of the best beaches, Llane Gran. Big terrace and to additional patios. If you come by car, it is normally possible to park the car in the street right outside of the apartment. The parking is free but depends on availability and parking may be difficult in peak seasons.

The space
Our apartment is approx 120 m2 and situated in a very quite area of Cadaques, just five minutes walk to the village center and 200 meters from the best beach in Cadaques, Llane Gran.
The apartment has three good sized bedrooms, one big terrace and two additional outside spaces/patios. Living room, dining room and library as well as two bathrooms and kitchen. The apartment is well equipped and nicely decorated. Parking for car is possible in the quiet street outside the apartment depeding on availibility.
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet residential neighborhood, just a few minutes walk from the village center. Close the the sea as well as the mountains.
host_about:
Born and live in Bergen, Norway. Worked several years abroad and have travelled extensively, staying at  a lot of hotels, but nothing beats staying in a personal home when away from your own home. That´s the reason to join airbnb!

Our second home is in Cadaques, Spain. Fell in love with Cadaques the first time we visited, 18 years ago. Before we had left that time we had bought our flat and never regretted it! Since then, we have had  longer and shorter stays , but always, always, returned whenever possible ........Recently, we visites Huglo, a small island in Stord and instantly fell in love with the property in Haukanes, which we occasionally like to share with others when we don’t have the possibility to be there ourselves.

neighborhood_overview:
The Old Town of Girona is considered the historical center of the city, bounded by the medieval city wall, part of which was demolished in the nineteenth century, and is where we find the most important historic and cultural attractions of the city.
The houses on the river Onyar are a sight which must be enjoyed from one of the bridges crossing the river, and we approach the Jewish quarter from the Rambla. In the promenade bustle of visitors and locals, strolling, shopping, resting live.
Once entered in the Jewish Quarter, one of the best preserved in Spain, we can enjoy the historic legacy of the city, letting lose through the narrow streets and right steps, discovering corners, gardens, monuments and churches, between steps. The Cathedral, the church of Sant Feliu, the Arab Baths, Sant Pere de Galligants.
host_about:
Hola!!

Soy Anna, una gironina enamorada de su pequeña ciudad.

Vivo en Girona y trabajo en una tienda de antigüedades situada a los pies de nuestra magnifica catedral. Gracias a mi trabajo puedo pasear a diario por estas calles que esconden tantas historias apasionantes.

Soy una amante del arte y de la decoración.

Espero os guste el apartamento que ofrezco que he decorado con tanto cariño.

Os espero pronto!

Hello,

I am Anna and I am in love with my marvelous city.

I live in Girona and I work in an antic shop situated just in front of the Cathedral. 
Thanks to my job I can walk everyday through the streets that hide so many exciting stories.

I am an art lover and I love decorating.

I do hope you like the apartment which I have decorate with so much love

I see you soon!

name: Sa Tuna, Spain - your holiday house near Begur
description:
Our detached house is in a quiet location. It has a private dining patio and large sun terrace which leads onto the large shared pool with it's own sun terraces. Parking is on the road by the house and is available all year.
It is a 15 minute walk to the beautiful Sa Tuna cove with its crystal clear water, and cafes and restaurants. Surrounded by wooded hillsides, it is ideal for walks, especially along the Cami De Ronda on the famous "Rugged Coast".

The space
We have a large living room with a small kitchen, a newly refurbished shower room with toilet, one double bedroom and one twin bedded room.
An outside patio - ideal for dining - leads up a few steps to a private large sun terrace with some natural shade, and then onto the large shared pool. Opposite the house is a wooded area and views across the hills with glimpses of the Med.

Guest access
As a guest you have private access to the property through the gate and up a few st
neighborhood_overview:
The "Unique Selling Points" of Tresviso are its quiet setting, its large shared pool, and its proximity to the glorious Costa Brava countryside and, of course, Sa Tuna cove with its quiet, sheltered beach and crystal clear waters. Added to that is the nearby hill top town of Begur - a very special little market town with plenty of excellent restaurants. This is on the Cap de Begur, a small promontory with the idyllic coves and beaches of Playa de Pals, Sa Riera, Aigua Freda, Sa Tuna, Fornells and Aigua Blava.
Further afield are the towns of Figueres and Girona - both about 3/4 hour away, Cadaques - the home of the artist Dali, and not forgetting that Barcelona is only a 90 minutes train ride away and the nearest station is at Flaca (with easy parking) on the Girona road.
host_about:
I'm Graham and Jan is my wife. We're retired and live in North Bedfordshire. Jan was a teacher and I was a school bursar.
Graham loves golf and walking, and Jan loves walking and her allotment. Other than that, our children and 4 grandchildren take a bit of time.
We would like our guests to make full use of our two bedroomed house and its large shared pool. It's set in a delightful part of the Costa Brava, with lots of little coves all offering crystal clear waters, and lots of beautiful walking country. And only about  1 1/2  hours by train to Barcelona!

neighborhood_overview:
Campelles is part of the Ripollès region, in the province of Girona.
It is a very well-preserved natural area with all kinds of fauna, ideal for short excursions along the river, with the option of bathing in its refreshing waters in summer. During the fall, it is a very good place to go looking for mushrooms, or in winter to ski on the nearby slopes of Vall de Núria, La Molina, Masella or Vallter 2000.The town also offers a great variety of local gastronomic products, they highlight its sausages and cheeses, honey or biscuits from Camprodon, near Campelles, are also highly appreciated.

neighborhood_overview:
Empuriabrava sur la Costa Brava, est une agréable zone résidentielle connue également sous le nom de "La Venise espagnole", en raison des quarante kilomètres de canaux qui la parcourent (dont 24 navigables).
C'est la plus grande MARINA d'Europe, avec plus de cinq mille points d'amarrages.
C'est un endroit où il fait bon vivre et qui dispose de plusieurs kilomètres de belles PLAGES.
Quelques activités/équipements/prestations à Empuriabrava (par ordre alphabétique, liste non exhaustive) :
Bowling, équitation, excursion en bateau, golf, gymnase, karting, kite-surf, location de motos, location de vélos, location d'embarcations, mini-golf, plongée sous-marine, randonnée pédestre, tennis, train touristique...

Pour les amoureux de la nature et des balades :
- Promenade sur les CANAUX
Pour admirer les canaux de la ville et ses berges, vous pouvez louer de petites embarcations. Aucun permis n'est nécessaire pour en devenir les capitaines !
- La
host_about:
Bonjour à tous !
Nous sommes Jana et Jean. Nous disposons de deux appartements à Empuriabrava. Nous souhaiterions vous faire profiter de cette belle région de la Costa Brava et de son agréable climat. 
Jana est une femme adorable, très féminine, avec une bonne éducation, sérieuse et consciencieuse dans sa profession mais, surtout, avec une belle joie de vivre ! 
Pour ma part, je crois pouvoir dire que suis quelqu'un de simple, ouvert, travailleur mais sachant également bien profiter des beaux moments de l'existence. 
Petit inventaire à la Prévert de ce que nous aimons : lecture, soirées entre amis, self-defense, guitare, fruits, vin blanc de Sancerre, Histoire, musique, séries policières, documentaires, langues étrangères...

name: Catalan Villa on the Med: Pool, Jacuzzi, Views
description:
Stunning holiday home in Begur, a quaint village 100 miles north of Barcelona. Incredible sea views. Pool, jacuzzi, three sunny terraces, two balconies. Beaches five minutes away. Superbly equipped villa in the coolest village on the Spanish coast. Lots of lovely restaurants, boutiques and bars in the well-preserved village.

Book now for Summer 2023. We are usually fully booked for the high season by the end of January. For summer bookings, we require stays from Saturday to Saturday.

The space
We call it Casa Buenavista because the views are stunning.

We found this house on a whirlwind trip to the Costa Brava in March 2004. We were scheduled to see about ten places that day. This was the third one we visited. We quit looking when we walked onto the terrace and saw the view.

The outlook is not just majestic; it is also a tonic to the soul. Sit on the terrace, sip some Albariño and let the troubles of the world melt away.
neighborhood_overview: We think there’s no nicer place on the Spanish coast.  The Costa Brava (meaning rugged coast) is one of the most beautiful, pollution-free areas that still exist on the Mediterranean. The rocky coves like Aigua Xelida, Sa Tuna, Sa Riera, Platja Fonda and Aiguablava are breathtakingly beautiful.
host_about: I am a retired professor of history at the University of St Andrews and a freelance journalist.  I have rented my villa in Spain to hundreds of happy families over the last 15 years.  There's nothing I enjoy more than hearing how guests enjoy our little corner of paradise.

name: Villa with Private Pool Walk to Beach.
description:
Com Casa Nostra Begur is a 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom villa. Ideally located between Begur and Sa Riera. A seven min walk to lovely Sa Riera beach (uphill on way back) and 5 mins by car to Begur. with authentic bars, restaurants and shops. All four bedrooms have ceiling fans which together with new mattresses and quality bed linen should ensure a good nights rest. An excellent house for a big family group who want a little privacy too. DISCOUNTS FOR UP TO FOUR PEOPLE IN MAY, JUNE OR SEPTEMBER.

The space
The hillside garden at Com Casa Nostra Begur has bougainvillea, oleanders and cacti, fig and lemon tree offers and offers an attractive outlook from the terraces which run the entire width of the property on two levels. Due to the slope of the garden, however, it is not a play area. There is a covered dining area with a large table to seat 8-10 people comfortably and gas barbecue. The private pool (approx. 8m x 4m) with eight sun loungers is in the sun for all o
neighborhood_overview: This is an area of large individual detached houses on the side of a pine-clad valley.  Begur  is the gem of our part of the Costa Brava, attracting visitors from Spain and all its near neighbours. We've been coming here for over 20 years and love the ambience both in high season and the months of June and September.  We use the property as a second home so it is kept up to date. Our local beach, Sa Riera, is unspoilt and traffic free and best of all is walkable from the villa unless you have mobility issues.

The spacious balcony has a dining table which is wonderful for dining during sunny days.

The space

It has a very comfortable double bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and the second bedroom has bunk beds also with a built in wardrobe. The lounge comprises of a spacious seating and dining area. There is also a very nice and spacious, south facing balcony off the lounge where you can dine with views of the parc natural, beach and Medes Islands. The apartment accommodates 4 people very comfortably. The apartment is situated in a very quiet area of L'Estartit. It is
neighborhood_overview:
The Costa Brava has a wealth of wonderful places and cuisine for the visitor to experience. The area has some of the most beautiful beaches and hidden coves in Europe, for guests to explore. There is an unlimited amount of water sports from kayaking, boat hire, windsurfing/boarding and other water-borne sports to enjoy. The Medes islands, just off the coast of Estartit, is a protected marine area and has some of the best diving experiences in the Mediterranean. There are great cycling routes and for the more tranquil pursuits, there are wonderful walks and bird watching opportunities.

Examples of occupying civilisations from the ancient Iberians to the Greeks and Romans, have all left their mark on the landscape of this area. The area also has a wealth of wonderful historical buildings/architecture for guests who wish to explore the history and culture of the area. The medieval towns/villages of Castello d'Empuries, Pals, Peratallada, San Marti and Torroella de Montgri
host_about: Hello, my name is Brent , I am a retired nurse from the United Kingdom.  My partner and I love meeting new people and gain great satisfaction from making people's holidays memorable ones.  We would like to welcome you to the Costa Brava and all that it has to offer.

neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.

name: appartamente san feliu costa brava con piscina
description:
Appartement de 86m2 situé au sixième et dernier étage en haut d'une falaise qui domine le port de Sant Feliu. Vue splendide de jour comme de nuit. Une chambre avec lit double s'ouvrant sur la terrasse, une chambre avec lits superposés. Salon/salle à manger, terrasse équipée de deux canapés et d'une table. Une cuisine et une salle de bain . Très grande piscine et beau jardin fleuri, aire de jeux, pinède, parking privé dans résidence très calme et sécurisée par un portail électrique.

The space
Cet appartement offre une vue imprenable sur le port de Sant Feliu, toute l'année les Lamparos (vieux bateaux de pêche en bois) partent le soir sous nos yeux émerveillés... Au réveil sur la terrasse, vous les verrez revenir suivis des goélands qui tentent de récupérer des poissons. Le matin, vous pourrez descendre en ville à pied jusque la boulangerie et vous laisser tenter par les croissants au chocolat.
La nuit, vous pourrez admirer les étoiles à travers le télescope
neighborhood_overview: La ville de Sant Feliu de Guixols est animée toute l'année. Ses petites ruelles sont agréables et offrent de jolis boutiques et restaurants. La côte est formée de petites criques et de belles plages. On peut visiter le musée du jouet, l'espace Carmen Thyssen dans le monastère... Les tapas sont bonnes et l'ambiance chaleureuse. Je vous invite à trouver plus d'informations sur le site très riche de l'office du tourisme visitguixols

with 120 m2 plus the terrace, is located on the first floor of the building. It can accommodate 8 people in three bedrooms.

The space
La Casa dels Avis, with 120 m2 plus the terrace, is located on the first floor of the building. It can accommodate 8 people in three bedrooms.
The original stone and the rustic finishing give it a special charm. It’s a very bright house.
At the entrance we find a modern and wide kitchen, open to the dining/living room of about 30m2. On the left of the living room, we find a double bedroom with king size bed of 180 cm, and with a warm stone wall. Next to this bedroom, there is a big bathroom with shower.
On the right of the dining room, there is another double bedroom, with king size bed of 160 cm, and with bathroom inside.

description:
Apt. front Rosas Bay, Costa Brava, Girona with pool. Canals, Aiguamolls park and La Rubina wild beach views. 20 minutes walk from beach and services. Near Dalí's Museum, Dalí's house in Portlligat, Cadaqués and Creus Cape.
Located in Santa Margarida with promenade that leads to Rosas (5' car); great residence with very quiet atmosphere.
Small, comfortable and equipped apartment to breathe a lot of calm.
Touristic tax included in the price.

The space
Cleaning is done with bio-alcohol on all surfaces

It is a small, quiet and comfortable apartment. It has ceiling fans and air conditioner that are sufficient to keep the space cool all day long when you are on the 10th floor.

It is a good place to visit both the beautiful beaches
neighborhood_overview:

since we have the sea ahead of us but we're not on the sea front.

host_about:
Since young I have been a lover of travel, to meet new people and cultures. Relying on the kindness of stranger I had precious and unforgettable experiences.
Since we moved to the Costa Brava of Girona with my husband, we have rented or exchanged our house on several occasions with foreign and Spanish families. It has always been a positive experience. Now we live in the city of Girona.
As good travelers we do not require great amenities, but we appreciate the cleanliness and attention to detail and we are always willing to help and share as much as possible.

name: Cal Bisbe, Charming Rural Holiday House
description:
Cal Bisbe house, is situated over two floors connected by an external staircase. It has a patio and outdoor swimming pool, decking and a patio. It has 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2 kitchens equipped with dishwashers. It has a barbecue and wood-burning fireplace, and we provide coal and firewood for your use. The house has heating, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Especially suited for the elderly or people with reduced mobility, the entire ground floor is on the same level and there are no steps.

The house faces the south, protected from the northern wind, with sun all day long, as well in winter as in summer.
Outside there is a yard where you can park your car, a swimming-pool with lawn around, and a resting zone protected by a wooden pergola that allows to enjoy better the time you spend outside.
On the ground floor, you find the yard, with wooden table and chairs, to have your meals outdoor, a vestibule, the kitchen, a bathroom and a large living room with firep
neighborhood_overview: Cal Bisbe house, it's a very beautiful rural whole house for rent. Well equipped and comfortable, it is an ideal place to spend time relaxing or on holiday with family or friends. The house is situated in the small village of Capmany (Girona), which is part of the Alt Empordà region and makes up the northerly part of the Costa Brava. It is very well connected and close to the beaches or mountains, it is also close to the city of Figueres and the shopping areas on the Spanish/French border.

name: De diseño con maravillosas vistas*G*
description:
Magnífico y luminoso apartamento de diseño en pleno centro de Girona, encima del río, con espectaculares vistas a sus pintorescas casas y a la Catedral. Al lado de las principales atraciones, tiendas y restaurantes.

The space
La reciente reforma de este apartamento ha permitido aprovechar al máximo su espacio con diseño exquisito y elementos y materiales de la mejor calidad.

Los ámplios ventanales dan paso a luz natural durante todo el día y además proporcionan unas magníficas vistas de las emblemáticas casas del río capitaneadas por la imponente Catedral y Sant Félix.

Su ubicación es perfecta, en el centro de la ciudad y a 1 minuto del casco antiguo (justo al otro lado del río).

La cocina está completamente equipada con electrodomésticos de alta gama y con todos los elementos necesarios. El salón, cuenta con una mesa redonda y un sofá convertible a cama con capacidad para 2 personas. El dormitorio, que cuenta con dos camas indepe
neighborhood_overview:
En pleno centro de Girona, al lado de "Plaza independencia", una de las más carismáticas de la ciudad, llena de cafeterías y restaurantes debajo de sus típicas arcadas. De la plaza sale una de las principales calles comerciales con todo tipo de tiendas.

Además, al estar al lado del río que separa el casco antiguo de la parte nueva de la ciudad, también se encuentra a 1 minuto andando de las pintorescas casas del río Onyar y del renombrado casco antiguo, a 5 minutos andando de la Catedral y del barrio Judío y a 10 minutos de la Muralla.

A 7 minutos de la estación de tren y AVE.
host_about: Our only objective is to ensure that your stay is even better than you imagined. We are Oscar from Barcelona and Maria from Girona, we married in 2013 and we have 2 wonderful children. Also, together we started Flateli, a little group of properties we love to manage to host our guests and make them feel like home. Ask anything you need and we will make our best to get it for you!

neighborhood_overview:
LA ZONA . LA GARROTXA
La Garrotxa disfruta de dos tipos de paisaje totalmente distintos, peculiares y de una gran belleza.
Por una parte la Zona Volcánica, 40 volcanes y coladas de lava que crean un paisaje absolutamente único y por otra parte el Espacio de Interés Nacional de la Alta Garrotxa, que abarca el Valle del Rio Fluvià hacia el Norte, donde el paisaje cambia radicalmente volviéndose abrupto y escarpado, y donde podemos observar espacios naturales de una especial belleza.
Haz clic aquí para modificar.
Olot (10 mins.)
Bonito mercado local los lunes por la mañana.
Calles peatonales llenas de vida local con sus cafés y tiendas y restaurantes
Edificios modernistas
Multicines
Museos
Fiestas tradicionales.

Volcanes (10-20 mins.)
Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa
Hay más de 40 volcanes inactivos en la zona y diversas coladas de lava, formando un paisaj

name: AF-2 Beautiful house with swimming pool in Calella
description:
Beautiful house with swimming pool in Calella de Palafrugell

The space
Beautiful semi-dettached house near the centre of Calella de Palafrugell.

The house has 3 floors and it's located in a nice residence with swimming pool in Calella de Palafrugell.

Entrance to the house by the private garden.

On the ground floor there's a big living-dinning room, tastefully decorated with an exit to the terrace, a spacious fully quipped kitchen and a toilet.

On the first floor, there's a bathroom and 2 double bedrooms, one with 2 single beds and terrace, and the other one with a single bed (sofa-bed).

On the last floor, there's also a bathroom and 2 double bedrooms, one with a double bed and a terrace with beautiful views, and the other one with 2 single beds.

The house is 750 meters to the beach and 500 meters to all the services and the center of the town.

Capacity for 7 people.

To access
neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.

neighborhood_overview:
The flat is located in the town of l'Escala en la Costa Brava, and more precisely in Cala Montgo.
Cala Montgo is a cove protected from the wind with very thin sand. This place is known for its tranquility and the beautiful animals that you can see, as it is located next to the Montgri natural park. You can have a walk and enjoy the beautiful landscape. You can check the surroundings on the aerial pictures of the website.
Shops are only 200m away from the flat (open from 1 may to 30 september), and restaurant are next to the sea in front of the flat.

host_about:
Real Estate Agency Pals and Begur
Sa Punta Costa Brava is a letting and estate agency helping tenants, landlords and buyer with properties since 1975. We arrange the selling, renting or management of apartments and houses on the Costa Brava, especially in the Playa de Pals and Begur.
Sa Punta Costa Brava is committed to delivering a high level of expertise, customer service, and attention to detail to holiday rentals and luxury properties sales and providing a professional service to clients and buyers alike. Also, we ensure high standard property maintenance in your absence.
Make your house or holiday apartment on the Costa Brava your home away from home.



Agencia Inmobiliaria en Pals y Begur
Sa Punta Costa Brava es una agencia inmobiliaria desde 1975 referente en la venta y alquiler de apartamentos y casas en la Costa Brava, especialmente, en la Playa de Pals y Begur.
Especializados en la venta y alquiler de casas y villas de lujo, Sa Punta Costa Brava es reconocida en el sector por su exclusivo servicio de atención personalizada. Ofrecemos un servicio a medida para cada cliente (conductores, baby-sitters, chefs, etc.) en nuestras propiedades en alquiler, asistencia jurídica y patrimonial en todo tipo de transacciones inmobiliarias o venta de propiedades y servicio de mantenimiento de las propiedades para los clientes que viven en el extranjero.

description:
CostaBravaNatura exclusively offers you this wonderful villa, located on the Costa Brava, in a unique setting, with spectacular sea views. Surrounded by nature and very close to beautiful coves, beaches, forests and botanical gardens.
Family house, spacious and comfortable, 1 km from the beach (15 min. on foot), with private pool, garden, suite with hot tub, high speed wifi (100 MB), smart TV, barbecue, several lounge areas and private parking for four cars.

The space
Enjoy with family and friends this cosy and spacious Villa, with more than 300 m2 built area and 300 m2 of garden with pool.
Distributed on 4 floors, it has 6 rooms (one suite with a hydromassage bathtub and a large terrace), several lounge areas, Wi-Fi, barbecue and private parking for four cars.
In a privileged environment, located in the exclusive area of Corona Santa Cristina, 1 km from the beach. Surrounded by many beautiful coves, beaches, forests and protected areas such as the

The house is located in a privileged area, in Corona de Santa Cristina, in front of the protected area of the Garden of Pinya de Rosa and less than 1 km from the beach, very close to Cala Santa Cristina, Cala Treumal, Cala Sant Francesc and Cala Boadella
5 min. by car from the Blanes town and Lloret de Mar and 1 hour from Barcelona, by car, train or bus.

host_about:
Hola em dic Pitu, sóc diplomat en turisme i he treballat en agencia de viatges 10 anys, des del 2015 ens hem reinventat i ens dediquem a allotjar-vos, al llarg d'aquests anys hem conegut molta gent i és una experiència genial!  Visc amb la Isma, la meva esposa, i els meus fills l'Alexandra i en Jaume que ha nascut enguany. Ens encanta viatjar, el mar i la muntanya! Fins aviat!


Hi! My name is pitu, I have a degree in tourism, and I've been working as a travel agent for 10 year. We enjoy traveling and meeting new people from all over the world. I live with my wife Isma and my daughter alexandra and our new son Jaume wich is born in 2021 We enjoyn traveling,  the mountain, and the sea! 
Hope to meet you soon!

Cerca de zona de deportes de montaña.

Estanos en Sadernes , un valle pequeño y tranquilo atravesado por un rio de agua cristalina y hubicado en el parque natural de la Garrotxa, rodeado de mo
neighborhood_overview:
Estamos en las montañas, a 6km del pueblo de Montagut.
Vivir en medio de la naturaleza es como estar siempre de vacaciones aunque trabajes mucho, te das cuenta de lo preciosa que es la vida y como nos complicamos.Me ha enseñado a disfrutar del tiempo, de admirar cosas que no había visto ni pensado jamas, caminos, senderos, cuevas , cascadas, calidad de vida

host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: 6p Apartment with Wifi and airco, 260 m from beach
description:
Lovely apartment with a large terrace. Panoramic view up to Castell Montgrí! There are three bedrooms. Everything is well maintained. The terrace is facing South, inside is air conditioning. The large beach of Riells with the great boulevard is at only 260 meters.

The space
The apartment lies on the third floor. The living room is large enough for 6 adults. From the living room starts a terrace. It is large and wide. Enjoy the sun together in summer time or in winter time! It is facing the south and gives a panoramic view from Puig Sec on the left, to Castell Montgrí on the right. During the Tramuntana (strong wind from the north) you are well protected on the terrace.
In the living room is a flat screen tv. The room is air conditioned. The first bedroom has a double bed and is air conditioned as well. The bathroom has a shower and toilet. Great to rinse of after a day at the beach.
The kitchen is very well equipped. There is a ceramic hob, microwave, o
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to Platja Riells. The promenade on the beach is lively with nice shops, little cafes and restaurants. The historic center of L'Escala is located within walking distance. A little further next L'Escala are the famous excavations of Empúries. These are very worth to visit. If you like horseback riding is also possible, there is a riding school at the entrance to the village boundary. In the cultural field is a lot to do with its Museo Dalí Figueres, Girona with its beautiful cathedral and a little further course Barcelona with Gaudi.
Sports, there's a lot possible. Watersports Sea like canoeing, jet-skiing, scuba diving or snorkeling. Excellent bike paths to the beach of Sant Pere Pescador, where you can kite surfing, wind surfing or just soaking up the sun.
Moreover Girona Airport is 40 minutes from L'Escala.
host_about:
Hallo reiziger, 

Even voorstellen: Wij zijn Vakantiehuis l'Escala.
We verhuren huizen en appartementen in l'Escala, l'Estartit en Pals waaronder de onze. l'Escala is vooral in de zomer druk bezocht maar wij willen het ook buiten het hoofdseizoen promoten. Er is hier zoveel meer te doen dan op het strand liggen. Cultureel en sportief een waanzinnig gebied. Probeer het eens uit!
Hopelijk beleeft u er net zoveel plezier als wij!

Andries ter Hennepe
Oprichter van Vakantiehuis l'Escala

Bonjour voyageur,

On se présente: Vakantiehuis l'Escala (Maison de vacances à l'Escala)
Nous louons des maisons et des appartements à L'Escala, l'Estartit et Pals, y compris la nôtre. L'Escala est particulièrement fréquentée en été, mais nous voulons aussi promouvoir en dehors la saison principale. Il y a tellement plus à faire ici que de bronzer sur la plage. Culturels ou sportifs, ceci est une magnifique région. Essayez le!
Nous espérons que vous ferez l'expérience d'autant de plaisir que nous faisons!

Andries ter Hennepe
Vakantiehuis l'Escala


Hello traveler,

Let us introduce ourselves: We are Vakantiehuis l'Escala.
We rent holidayhomes in L'Escala, l'Estartit en Pals. L'Escala is especially crowded in the summer but we like to promote it also outside the main season. There is so much more to do here than lie on the beach. Cultural and sporting activities, this is a very diverse environment. Try it out!

Hopefully you will experience just as much fun as we always have!

Andries and Inge ter Hennepe

name: Costa Brava/Empordà. Palau Sator. Medieval Castle.
description:
Castillo del S X-XI situado en el centro del casco medieval de Palau Sator, a 10 km del mar y en plena campiña. Se trata de un castillo pre románico,con deliciosos jardines y una agradable alberca a la sombra de un naranjo. Ideal para familias.Un estudio suite con baño en planta baja junto a la piscina y el garaje. Habitación doble con baño en la planta de la cocina y una suite principal con baño y terraza en la tercera planta.Para eventos y visitas a la bodega de productos orgánicos, preguntar.

The space
El alojamiento dispone de garaje privado de 1 plaza.
Piscina privada.
2 patios y 2 terrazas.
Barbacoa.
Hay que tener en cuenta que hay bastantes escaleras por la distribución vertical del castillo, y ello reduce un poco la presión del agua en la zona alta.

Guest access
Todo lo que aparece en la imágenes y descripción está disponible para los huéspedes. Hay una zona del castillo restringida a los huéspedes.

-
neighborhood_overview: Pueblo medieval de 100 habitantes y de interés histórico, en un entorno netamente rural con todos los servicios y amplia oferta de ocio, gastronómica, cultural, etc en los alrededores. Los huéspedes pueden llegar paseando a las Huertas del pueblo donde adquirir fruta y verdura fresca de temporada. (Hortícola Marisa )
host_about: Nadiu de l’Empordà, feina i passions m’han dut pel món a través dels anys sense oblidar mai aquest racó de terra i mar on desenvolupo diversos treballs i activitats de recerca amb la història, natura i paisatge com a matèries primeres. Des d’una formació antropològica i des de l’experiència,  estic obert a compartir els temes que em fascinen tals com l’etnobotànica, apicultura, sureres i Silvicultura Mediterrània, cavalls i fauna autòctona, vinyes i cellers, producció orgànica...

Menjador sala d'estar, cuina, bany i dues habitacions, una amb un llit doble i l'altre de tipus golfa amb dos llits i un sofà llit niu de dues places, ideal per jugar els nens.

Els establiments de serveis a menys de 10' son: botiga de queviures i revistes, farmàcia, perruqueria, bar, restaurants i servei de taxi.

description:
Small country house 6 km to Banyoles lake in the Girona countryside . Forty minutes to the Costa Brava beaches of Empúries, L'Escala and the Dalí city Figueres. Located in our big garden with a swimming pool and a beautiful view. It has a fully-fitted kitchen and bathroom.

The space
The small cuntry house is suitable for a couple . It is fully-equipped for a comfortable stay.

Guest access
Our guests will have access to a swimming pool and to the different quite areas (under fruit trees) in our very big garden. Barbacue can also be aivaible.

Other things to note
Interesting area for bicycle , horse routes and excursions.

name: Casa  con bonito jardín, wifi y aire acondicionado
description:
Hola somos Fernando y Eva una pareja de Barcelona, que ha encontrado en el Estartit ese paraíso particular donde los fines de semana disfrutar al máximo de todos los encantos que tiene el Emporda y especialmente nuestro jardín con su olivo centenario

The space
La casa totalmente nueva esta esperando que viajeros con ganas de tranquilidad vengan a disfrutar de la calma de su jardín, el lugar en el que seguro disfrutarán tumbados en la zona Chile out acompañados de unacopa de vino del Emporda que gustosamente pondremos a su disposición.
Dispone de mucha luz durante todo el dia en todos los espacios ya que es completamente exterior.
Dispone de dos dormitorios dobles: Uno con una cama de matrimonio de 1,50 metros y otro con dos camas individuales de 0,90 metros cada una.
En el salón comedor hay disponible un sofa cama doble de 1,60 metros.
Con aire acondicionado en las 2 plantas, tanto en el salón comedor como en el dormitorio principal, ademas di
neighborhood_overview:
Zona muy tranquila, por la mañana te despiertas con el canto de los pájaros ya que esta situada dentro del parque natural del montgri.
A 500 metros se encuentra un supermercado que esta abierto todos los días de año.
host_about:
Me gusta disfrutar de mi tiempo libre rodeado de las personas que me hacen sentir bien, por eso suelo compartir muchos momentos agradables con mis amigos. Mi casa del Estartit suele ser uno de los lugares de reunión, en ella siempre hay alguna botella de vino preparada para descorchar y acompañarla de un buen queso.
Mis grandes pasiones son viajar, el futbol y una buena comida maridada con un buen vino.

name: Deluxe apartment Del vi
description:
Live like a real citizen.
Let yourself be fascinated by the attractions of the city, by our gastronomy and enjoy the warmth of the people.
A quiet and elegant house of 70 m2 that can accommodate up to 4 people and are equipped with a comfortable living room with flat tv and comfortable sofa, kitchen all in one same space with all utensils for cook, oven, microwave, dishwasher, toaster, wash machine, dry manchine and iron.

The space
The two double rooms lead to a small space of calm, independent and very cozy where you can relax at any time of day, king size hotel beds fitted wardrobes, linen and integrated shelves. Full bathroom with professional hairdryer, towels, amenities for the bathroom, large vertical shower.

Guest access
You can access the common areas and services that we offer in the Hotel Ciutat de Girona, 5 minutes walk from the apartment Plaça del Vi.
Among its services we can find an indoor heated swimming pool
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the most emblematic area in the historical and cultural center of Girona. Surrounded by the most charismatic places and the best restaurants and shops of the city.
Take a tour of the historic center, visiting its monuments and museums, walking easily along its streets and plazas disfrutando de los servicios tourist, cultural festivals, restaurants etc are only some of the activities you can do in Girona
host_about: 8 luxury apartments in the center of Girona to make you feel like an authentic citizen. We like comfort, customer service, decor and attention to detail, we offer all the services to feel like your home in your country, and to show you all the gastronomy, bars, and ancient buildings of Girona, also we offer you many services such as we are pet friendly, special babies entertainment and bike services to enjoy the city by bike.

name: SEAFRONT just in front beach WIFI
description:
Precioso apartamento en el paseo marítimo de L’Estartit, céntrico y justo frente la playa, y a sólo 2 minutos del Club Náutico.
Totalmente reformado y equipado. Con aire acondicionado. Magnífico porche y espectaculares vistas de las islas Medas.
Incluye parking privado.

The space
Seafront es un precioso apartamento totalmente reformado de 55 metros cuadrados con un cómodo porche a nivel de jardín y frente el mar. Tiene una habitación de matrimonio con cama doble, una segunda habitación con 2 camas individuales, cocina independiente completamente equipada, baño con ducha, y un amplio salón-comedor con un sofà cama doble.
Seafront es luminoso y tranquilo y, además del porche privado, tiene un amplio jardín compartido con césped. Está a primera línea de mar justo ante la playa. A su vez es céntrico, a 2 minutos de la principal calle comercial (calle santa Anna) y el puerto.
Disponemos de parking privado para nuestros huéspedes. Televisión,aire ac
neighborhood_overview:
La situación geográfica es increíble.
Permite disfrutar de un espacio luminoso con unas vistas del mar y las islas Medas inmejorables.
Es una zona tranquila y de uso residencial.
host_about:
Hola,
Mi nombre es Marc. Tengo 44 años.
Estoy licenciado en historia y durante años he trabajado en el ámbito del deporte y el ocio infantil.
Actualmente también gestiono en airbnb el proyecto "Seafront L'Estartit Apartments" con mi familia. Me considero un anfitrión atento, respetuoso y amable. Y creo que airbnb es una fantástica plataforma para establecer una relación basada en estos principios.
Abrimos las puertas de dos apartamentos familiares, céntricos y a primera línea de mar. Con unas privilegiadas vistas del Mediterraneo y las islas Medas.
En nuestro espacio recibiréis un trato hospitalario y caluroso, y a su vez una gestión moderna del alojamiento y sus servicios.
Rehuimos del modelo turístico a gran escala en favor de una relación respetuosa y afectuosa.
Bienvenidos!

name: Studio ART (Fenals beach - 200m, pool, Wifi)
description:
New and bright apartment in Lloret de Mar. Perfect for a romantic evening, weekends, holidays! It features a pool in the common part of the building. Near the beach Fenals and within walking distance city center.

The space
New and bright apartment in Lloret de Mar (for 1 - 3 people or 1 - 2 adults + baby)

Guest access
- Cozy living room with double sofa bed (160x200 cm) and an armchair (90x200 cm), flat screen TV, dining table and chairs, built-in cupboard; Crib for baby included if required. The room with elegant decoration has plenty of light and natural ventilation, panoramic view of the garden and playground.
- Electric cooker fully equipped with all necessary implements for cooking during your stay: fridge, microwave, kettle, coffee maker, and a washing machine.
- Bathroom with bathtub, hairdryer.
- Internet WIFI.
- It has a pool in the common part of the building.
- 2nd floor, exterior; Of elevators.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the popular district of Fenals, is a quiet comfortable area to access and close to everything:
CAPRABO supermarket, Carrefour-EXPRESS, DIA, CONSUM; Fruteria, pharmacy, cafes, restaurants, souvenir shops and beach accessories, playground, weekly market (Tuesday), bus (to go to Blanes, Barcelona, Girona, Figueres and etc).
Close to all major attractions of Lloret:
• beaches, variety of water sports, diving, sightseeing boats;
• discos, games and Casino Lloret;
• aquapark (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• dolphinarium;
• playground "Gnome Park";
• karting "GO KARTS Lloret" (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• Botanical Gardens of Santa Clotilde, with a magnificent view of the sea.
Perfect to be near the beach Fenals (400 m) and within walking distance of the city center, you can enjoy the nightlife in the center and walk back to the apartment.

name: CAU DEL LLOP 11 Fantastic apartment in the sea front
description:
Fantastic apartment in the sea front.

The space
This apartment has two bedrooms (one with a double bed and another one with a bunk bed), one bathroom with shower, an open kitchen, a dining room with air conditioning, a great terrace with barbecue, a sea front patio and WiFi included at the price. Pets accepted.
This cosy apartment is located at Cau del Llop a quite zone at the outside of Llançà. It is near to Cau del Llop beach, in front the seaside path, a 5 minutes by car form the Port's urban zone, where you will find the principal restaurants and shops, the Port and Gola beach, the Port Marina and another important see sights.
Llançà is a coast and familiar village, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)This little village it’s between the Cap de Creu
neighborhood_overview:
This magnificent apartment with fantastic sea views it’s located at Cau del Llop zone in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) ant mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…) This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes. Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.
It’s only a 5 minutes by car to the urban centre, where you will find the principals restaurants and shops!!
host_about: Somos una agencia inmobiliaria con mas de 50 años de experiencia en el sector turístico y especializados en alquiler vacacional. Un lugar único, exclusivo y con privacidad. Un antiguo molino de cereal restaurado para que la familia pueda disfrutar de la tranquilidad y la belleza del alt' emporda.
Piscina con água termal, cerca de Figueras, a 40mins de la playa.

The space
La casa dispone de 4 habitaciones, 2 son suites. Piscina, huerto, oliveras, cerezos entre otras cosas. Lugar perfecto para estar en familia o con amigos queridos. Al rededor de la propiedad se pueden hacer excursiones de bicicleta o a pie y sobretodo una visita a un antiguo castillo del pueblo que esta muy cerca de la casa. En verano se puede disfrutar de un pozo con agua termal. La casa dispone de cunas, sillas de coche para niños y otras comodidades. Tenemos también una sala de juegos con futbolín y billar.

name: Apartment Golf Mar
description:
The Golf Mar apartments are located close to the port of L´Escala on the beautiful Costa Brava.
The Golf Mar apartment complex has a communal pool located in well kept gardens with plenty of sun. The apartment is on the first floor and consists of one bedroom with double bed and one bedroom with two single beds.
The double bedroom has access to the rear balcony overlooking the pool and gardens.
This apartment boasts a large lounge, dining area and kitchen area which has access to a balcony overlooking pine woods and with a sea view of the bay of Roses.
The beach of Riells is located at about 15 mins walk.
The beach front has numerous bars and restaurants. Local supermarket are also located here. In peak season a funfair is located at the far end of Riells beach which is approx 20 mins walk. The old village of L`Escala approx a further 15 mins walk.

name: LOS ARCOS
description:
Casa de vacaciones en SantMori bonito pueblo medieval del Alt Empordà, a medio camino de Figueres (con su magnifico museo Dali) y Girona( con su fascinante Barri Vell), y la proximidad de las playas de la Costa Brava la convierten en un lugar ideal.

License number
HUTG-003604
neighborhood_overview:
Sant Mori es un pueblo rural de unos doscientos habitantes que se halla en la comarca del Ampurdán, situado a medio camino entre Figueras (25 km), hogar de la Casa Museo Dalí, y Gerona (38 km), una pequeña ciudad amurallada con interesantes museos y restaurantes, donde encontramos el Call o barrio judío, uno de los más extensos y mejor conservados de Europa.

Las playas de la Costa Brava y las ruinas de Ampurias se encuentran a menos de 10 km.

Situado a 130 km de Barcelona. Por el norte, la frontera con Francia a solo 60 km. y Perpignan, la ciudad francesa más cercana, se encuentra a 84 km.

neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.

neighborhood_overview:
Calonge is gelegen aan de Costa Brava , in de provincie Girona en op een paar kilometer van Palamos en Palafrugell. De plaatsen Calonge en Sant Antoni de Calonge zijn nog weinig bekend bij de buitenlandse toeristen.

Sant Antoni de Calonge ligt op ongeveer 1u50 van de Franse grens . Het ligt ten zuiden van Cap de Begur ( 20 km ) ten noorden van Sant Feliu de Guixols (16 km ) en 45 km van Girona. Het is verdeeld in twee delen , Sant Antoni de Calonge is de kust met grote zandstranden en Calonge is het historische centrum met een middeleeuws kasteel .

In de afgelopen jaren verdiende Sant Antoni de Calonge het etiket van " destinal of Family toerisme" door zijn vele activiteiten tijdens de zomermaanden. De omgeving van Sant Antoni de Calonge is uitzonderlijk met grote zandstranden , kleine baaien , en veel fietsroutes in de vlakte van Calonge midden tussen de wijngaarden. Richting Palamos , is er het strand van Es Monestri wat doorloopt in het strand van Sant Antoni e
host_about:

Tijdens uw vakantie zijn wij uw aanspreekpunt en kunnen je alles vertellen over de mooie omgeving, heerlijke restaurantjes en de mooiste stranden!

neighborhood_overview: Disfrute de la Costa Brava,Que desea? hacer turismo activo, turismo familiar, turismo de playa ? Las playas como la de Lloret, Fenals, Sa Boadella, Santa Cristina o Canyelles hace que esta villa marinera el mejor lugar para pasar las vacaciones bajo el sol de la Costa Brava. En Lloret de Mar es uno de los destinos turísticos más visitados de Cataluña. Los turistas que llegan a esta localidad, lo hacen en gran parte atraídos por sus hermosas playas, la belleza de la costa y la vibrante vida nocturna. En la localidad también hay numerosos monumentos, obras de arte y de interés histórico, así como una lista interminable de lugares de ocio, ideal para enriquecer sus vacaciones con actividades diferentes a lo habitual.\r\nLloret de mar es un destino ideal para hacer escapadas y venir en familia, tiene parques de atracciones, campos de golf, delfinarios, museos, parques acuáticos, hípicas, en Lloret de mar podrá disfrutar de las vacaciones practicando actividades acuáticas como esquí náutico

name: Farmhouse in the countryside.
description:
A self contained apartment within a unique catalan farmhouse at the foot of the San Roc mountain nestles in a stunning valley in St.Climent D’ Amer.

It s separated from the bustle and grime of civilization, an ideal location to disconnect and enjoy.

Next door there is another house, which can be seen in the main photo, this is also a space for guests, in case we also have tenants, they will only share the pool area, each accommodation has its privacy and its garden area .

The space
This delightful and homely apartment is in a truly privileged environment at the heart of the mountain. Ideal for all types of rural activities such as walking, mountain biking, rock climbing and many more to be enjoyed with family and friends.

There is a barbecue, wood burner, private garden and access to the pool.

Local activities and information is also provided.

Guest access
The apartment is part of a stunning farmh
neighborhood_overview:
You are in the heart of the Catalan country side a stones throw from an unparalleled amount of hiking , including the routes of ‘Las tres Hermites’, ‘Santa Brigida’, ‘Santa Lena and San Roc’. You can also enjoy the ‘via verde’ and the ‘Carrilette’ famous for its extensive bike routes.

ParaGliding activities can also be booked from Santa Brigida.

Nearby there is also the stunning waterfalls and natural pools of ‘Els Gorgs del moli dels Murris’ for an invigorating dip.

It offers the rustic charme of Spanish inventory for relaxed living together with the necessities of modern life like free Wifi, intl. TV, washing machine, dishwasher etc.

The space
Apartment in Cap Roig area, a very special place in Costa Brava for the beauty in the sea shore and beaches. You are in Calella de Palafrugell, an enchanted and beautiful maritim town. If you still have not visited Calella, what are you waiting for?

The apartment has a capacity of 4 people, and it has two bedrooms and two complete bathrooms. There is a room with a master bed and another one with two individual beds. Both bedrooms have outdoor light and a wardrobe. About the bathrooms, one has a shower and the other

Calella de Palafrugell has a lot of restaurants, beach, supermarkets, and other services. You can snorkel in the beach and also in Cala Golfet, which is very beautiful. Also you can hike in Camí de Ronda through Palamós.

Outside Calella town you can visit Sant Sebastià Lighthouse, Begur, Peratallada, Pals beach and a lot of other places in Costa Brava and Empordà. We are sure you are goign to repeat the visit in our place.

In the heart of the Empordà region, the town of Begur and its municipality form one of the most wonderful places on the Costa Brava. Bounded by the Gavarres massif and the sea, with an area that extends inland to the foot of the mountain and the other open to the most beautiful seafront of the coast, the municipality of Begur, along with the small town of Esclanyà and the coves that make it up, form a set and a unique landscape environment.
Studio located on the first floor on yoga center in the Urb. 'Residencial Begur' 20 m from the Municipal swimming pool and tennis (both extras). Restaurant 100 m. Supermarket 200m. Center Begur 400 m. Beaches between 3-6 km. very quiet place.
Nice studio for 2 people consisting of: Living room / bedroom with TV.
